cands: The fact that the movement for the defence of human rights continues to make progress, even in difficult times, reflects the long-term scope of
inp: Le fait que le mouvement en faveur de la défense de ces droits continue à faire des avancées, même lors des moments difficiles, traduit la portée à long terme de ce qui a été réalisé en 1948 quand presque tous les pays de la planète ont déclaré que les droits de l'homme sont universels.
ref: The fact that the movement continues to secure advances even in difficult times is an indication of the enduring significance of what was achieved in 1948 when the world’s governments declared that rights are universal.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a century, and has been a major contributor to the global economy since the early
inp: Les pauvres ayant peu d’argent à dépenser, les sociétés pharmaceutiques, selon les arrangements actuels, sont peu enclines à effectuer des recherches sur les maladies qui les affectent.
ref: Because the poor have so little money to spend, drug companies, under current arrangements, have little incentive to do research on the diseases that afflict them.

cands: The decisions to appoint, rather than elect, regional governments, to introduce a system of voting for parties rather than individuals, to raise the thre
inp: Les décisions de nommer, au lieu de d’élire, les gouvernements régionaux, d’introduire un système de vote pour des partis, au lieu d’individus, d’augmenter le seuil électoral pour qu’un parti entre à la Duma, et d’annuler l’imposition d’un taux de participation électorale minimum ont créé un système politique hermétique aux réactions de la société ; d’autant que toutes ces décisions furent accompagnées d’une manipulation endémique des élections et des mass médias.
ref: The decisions to appoint, rather than elect, regional governors, to introduce party-list voting, to raise the electoral threshold for parties to enter the Duma, and to repeal the minimum-turnout requirement – all accompanied by rampant manipulation of elections and the mass media – created a political system closed to feedback from society.

cands: The Atlantic Alliance has been on a roll over the years, but we have always been able to resolve the most difficult issues.
inp: L’Alliance atlantique a navigué sur une forte houle au fil des années, mais nous avons toujours su résoudre les questions les plus difficiles.
ref: Our Atlantic Alliance has navigated through some choppy seas over the years, but we have always been able to resolve the toughest issues.

cands: Let us look at the historical events of the past year and the role played by the United States and Europe.
inp: Considérons un instant les évènements historiques qui se sont produits durant l’année qui vient de s’écouler et le rôle joué par les États-Unis et l’Europe.
ref: Consider the historic events that have taken place in the past year and the role played by the United States and Europe.

cands: Unfortunately, the DPJ abandoned a PLD-backed civil service reform bill, which would have allowed the DPJ to replace the mandarins with an
inp: Malheureusement, le PDJ a abandonné un projet de loi soutenu par le PLD sur la réforme du service civil, ce qui aurait permis au PDJ de remplacer les mandarins par une armée de fonctionnaires.
ref: Unfortunately, the DPJ scrapped an LDP-sponsored civil-service reform bill, which would have allowed the DPJ to replace mandarins with an army of political appointees.

cands: The US has already launched several international processes to help establish the new post-2015 goals in an open, participatory, and knowledge-based manner.
inp: Le secrétaire général Ban Ki-moon a déjà amorcé plusieurs processus à l’échelle internationale pour aider à établir les nouveaux objectifs post-2015 d’une manière ouverte, participative et fondée sur le savoir.
ref: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon has already initiated several global processes to help establish the new post-2015 goals in an open, participatory, and knowledge-based way.

cands: As President of the World Bank, Wolfensohn has consistently argued that the world cannot be divided between rich and poor.
inp: En tant que président de la Banque mondiale, Wolfensohn a soutenu constamment que le monde ne peut pas être divisé entre les riches et les pauvres.
ref: As World Bank president, Wolfensohn argued consistently that the world cannot be divided into “haves” and “have-nots.”

cands: Furthermore, poorly designed and negotiated contracts not only prevent countries from benefiting from the incomes of their natural resources in the long term
inp: Par ailleurs, des contrats mal conçus et mal négociés empêchent non seulement les pays de profiter des revenus de leurs ressources naturelles sur le long terme, mais enracinent aussi la pauvreté, la corruption et même les conflits, particulièrement lorsque les systèmes de gouvernance sont inadéquats.
ref: On the other hand, poorly conceived and negotiated contracts not only prevent countries from enjoying the full long-term benefits of their natural resources, but also help to entrench poverty, corruption, and even conflict, particularly when governance systems are inadequate.

cands: No one in South Korea’s conservative movements doubts that Park is one of them.
inp: Personne dans les mouvements conservateurs de la Corée du Sud ne doute que Park est l’une d’entre eux.
ref: No one in South Korea’s conservative movement doubts that Park is one of them.

cands: A Saudi Survival Strategy
inp: Une stratégie de survie saoudienne
ref: A Saudi Survival Strategy

cands: This scene remains shocking, but like much of science fiction, it has also aged.
inp: Cette scène reste choquante, mais comme une grande partie de la science-fiction, elle a aussi vieilli.
ref: This scene remains shocking, but, like most science fiction, it has aged.

cands: Strategic constraints are likely to undermine the implementation of this measure.
inp: Les contraintes stratégiques risquent fort de saper la mise en oeuvre de cette mesure.
ref: Strategic constraints would almost certainly overwhelm enforcement.

cands: The massive debt of these countries’ banks and governments – the distinction between the two sectors has become blurred across Europe – makes it utopi
inp: La dette massive des banques et gouvernements de ces pays – la distinction entre les deux secteurs est devenue floue partout en Europe – rend utopique d’espérer une croissance rapide et soutenue.
ref: These countries’ massive combined bank and government debt – the distinction everywhere in Europe has become blurred – makes rapid sustained growth a dream.

cands: But how far will it go, how long will it last, and how much will it hit emerging and developing countries?
inp: Mais jusqu'où ira-t-elle et combien de temps durera-t-elle  ? A quel point va-t-elle frapper les pays émergeants et les pays en développement ?
ref: But how long and deep will this recession be, and how badly will it affect emerging and developing nations?

cands: In addition to an orderly resolution regime for banks, Europe must also organise early restructuring of the public debt of states in difficulty.
inp: Ainsi, outre un régime de résolution ordonnée pour les banques, l’Europe doit également organiser des restructurations précoces de la dette publique des états en difficulté.
ref: Thus, in addition to an orderly resolution regime for banks, Europe must also implement early orderly restructurings of distressed sovereigns’ public debt.

cands: We have known for at least a generation that the planet must change course.
inp: Nous savons depuis au moins une génération que la planète doit changer de trajectoire.
ref: We have known for at least a generation that the world needs a course correction.

cands: The US economy is in fact much weaker than that figure suggests, as the US announces a third-quarter GDP rise of
inp: NEW YORK – Alors que les Etats-Unis annoncent une remontée du PIB au troisième trimestre à 3,5%, suggérant que la récession la plus sévère depuis la Grande Dépression touche à sa fin, l’économie américaine est en fait bien plus affaiblie que ne le montre ce chiffre.
ref: NEW YORK – While the United States recently reported 3.5% GDP growth in the third quarter, suggesting that the most severe recession since the Great Depression is over, the American economy is actually much weaker than official data suggest.

cands: There is no doubt that Kirchnerism fears Pope Francis. Fernández’ supporters know that Bergoglio feels closer to the United States
inp: Il ne fait aucun doute que le Kirchnerisme craint le pape François. Les partisans de Fernández savent que Bergoglio se sent plus proche des Etats-Unis que de n’importe quelle autre puissance mondiale.
ref: Kirchnerismo no doubt fears Francis I. Fernández’s supporters know that Bergoglio feels closer to the United States than to any other world power.

cands: American politicians have become brands dressed up as breakfast cereal.
inp: Les hommes politiques américains sont désormais devenus des marques que l’on habille comme des céréales pour petit déjeuner.
ref: American politicians are now brand names, packaged like breakfast cereal.

cands: Given Europe's political heterogeneity, it is unlikely that a single party will succeed in gaining a foothold in the European Parliament.
inp: Etant donné l'hétérogénéité politique de l'Europe, il est peu probable qu'un seul parti réussisse à s'imposer au sein du Parlement européen.
ref: Given Europe's political heterogeneity, the European Parliament is unlikely to be ruled by a single-party majority.

cands: China's rise is a fact, and the lasting peace of that rise must be a priority for China, for its neighbours
inp: La montée de la Chine est un fait. La tranquillité durable de cette montée doit être une priorité pour la Chine, pour ses voisins, pour l'Occident et surtout pour les États-Unis.
ref: China’s rise is a fact; the enduring peacefulness of that rise must be a priority for China, its neighbors, the West, and, most importantly, the US.

cands: The US, Poland's NATO partner, had given him all the details of the attack in advance.
inp: Tous les détails de l'offensive lui avaient été communiqués à l'avance par les USA qui sont maintenant partenaires de la Pologne au sein de l'OTAN.
ref: All the details of the attack were provided in advance by the US, now Poland's NATO ally.

cands: On the contrary, the illusionary appearance led experts to invoke these symptoms as evidence of the effectiveness of these vital remedies.
inp: Au contraire, l'aspect illusoire amena les experts à invoquer ces symptômes comme la preuve de l'efficacité de ces remèdes vitaux.
ref: On the contrary, wishful thinking led experts to adduce "discontinuation symptoms" as evidence of the effectiveness of vital remedies.

cands: Of course, government spending on infrastructure is often wasted.
inp: Certes, les dépenses des gouvernements pour les infrastructures sont souvent gaspillées.
ref: True, government infrastructure spending is often wasted.

cands: There is no doubt, on the other hand, that concerns about Syrian opposition actors are justified.
inp: Nul doute d’un autre côté quant au caractère justifié des inquiétudes relatives aux acteurs de l’opposition syrienne.
ref: There also is no doubt about the legitimacy of concerns about elements of the Syrian opposition.

cands: Debt write-offs and guarantees will inevitably inflate Germany’s public debt, when the authorities are forced to bail out German banks
inp: Les effacements de dette et garanties gonfleront inévitablement la dette publique de l'Allemagne, lorsque les autorités se verront contraintes de renflouer les banques allemandes (et probablement les banques de certains pays voisins).
ref: Debt write-downs and guarantees will inevitably bloat Germany’s government debt, as the authorities are forced to bail out German banks (and probably some neighboring countries’ banks).

cands: In addition to the millions of people who fell into poverty in 2008-2009, some 64 million more could fall into extreme poverty in 2010 as a result of the combine
inp: En plus des millions de personnes qui sont tombées dans la pauvreté en 2008-2009, quelques 64 millions d’autres personnes pourraient tomber dans l’extrême pauvreté en 2010 en conséquence des effets combinés prolongés de la crise.
ref: In addition to the millions already pushed into poverty in 2008-09, another 64 million could fall into extreme poverty during 2010 as a result of the combined, lingering effects of the crisis.

cands: After all, we are in the Philippines, a country where Imelda Marcos can still live freely and without fear.
inp: Après tout, nous sommes aux Philippines, pays où Imelda Marcos peut encore vivre librement et sans être inquiétée.
ref: This is, after all, the Philippines, where Imelda Marcos is still living free and easy.

cands: We Europeans must be able to react positively, quickly and effectively.
inp: Nous, Européens, devons être en mesure de réagir de manière positive, rapide et efficace.
ref: We Europeans need to respond favorably, quickly, and effectively.

cands: With the economic slowdown, widening income disparities, rising unemployment, and rising popular anger against corruption, China’
inp: Avec le ralentissement économique, l'écart grandissant des revenus, la hausse du chômage et la montée de la colère populaire à l'encontre de la corruption, les dirigeants chinois ont du pain sur la planche.
ref: And, given the economic slowdown, widening income disparity, rising unemployment, and growing popular discontent over corruption, China’s leaders will have their hands full.

cands: The T3 in Beijing is the world's largest terminal, measuring one million square metres, but it was built at a much lower cost than
inp: Avec un million de mètres carrés, le T3 de Beijing est le plus grand terminal du monde, mais sa construction a pourtant été bien moins coûteuse que celle du T5 de Londres.
ref: At one million square meters, T3 in Beijing is the largest terminal in the world, but was much less costly to build than T5 in London.

cands: Efficiency tells us that it is better to have fewer currencies, but larger ones (foreign investors, who are rightly
inp: L'efficience nous dit qu’il vaut mieux avoir moins de devises, mais des devises plus importantes (les investisseurs étrangers, méfiants à juste titre des monnaies faibles et volatiles, le demandent).
ref: Efficiency dictates the use of fewer and larger currencies (and foreign investors, understandably wary of weak and volatile currencies, demand it).

cands: As a result, the DPJ has already announced that it will not apply the PLD guidelines to the budget ceiling in order to reformulate its own
inp: En conséquence, le PDJ a d’ores et déjà annoncé qu’il refusait d’appliquer les lignes directrices du PLD pour plafonner le budget afin de reformuler son propre budget. Il procèdera aussi à une révision du budget complémentaire.
ref: As a result, the DPJ has announced plans to revoke the LDP’s guidelines for a ceiling on budget requests so as to formulate its own budget from scratch.  It will also revise the supplementary budget as well.

cands: For Iran, the objective will be to obtain recognition of its right to civilian use of nuclear energy, in accordance with the provisions and protocols of the
inp: Pour l’Iran, l’objectif sera d’obtenir la reconnaissance de son droit à l’emploi civil de l’énergie nucléaire, conformément aux dispositions et protocoles du Traité sur la non-prolifération des armes nucléaires (TNP).
ref: For Iran, the focal point of its efforts will be recognition of its right to civilian use of nuclear energy, in keeping with the provisions of the Non-Proliferation Treaty and its protocols.

cands: Would the national teams of the two "ill men of Europe" have felt the need to change their image with the world?
inp: Les équipes nationales des deux « hommes malades de l’Europe » auraient-elles ressenti le besoin de changer leur image auprès du monde entier ?
ref: It looks as if the national teams of the two “sick men of Europe,” felt obliged to change their countries’ images in the world.

cands: Surprisingly, prices have jumped here and there in 2009.
inp: Étonnement, les prix ont connu un sursaut ici et là en 2009.
ref: Surprisingly, prices rebounded in some places in 2009.

cands: In all the debates on the European Union Constitutional Treaty, for example, neither its supporters nor its opponents have taken the trouble to
inp: Dans tous les débats sur le traité constitutionnel de l’Union européenne, par exemple, ni ses supporters ni ses détracteurs n’ont pris la peine ne serait-ce que de mentionner la Stratégie de Lisbonne.
ref: For example, in all of the debates on the EU’s constitutional treaty, neither its supporters nor its opponents have so much as mentioned the Lisbon Strategy.

cands: Experts disagree on the rate of growth needed to create the jobs for the millions of Chinese who move to China's cities every year.
inp: Les spécialistes ne sont pas d'accord entre eux sur le taux de croissance nécessaire pour créer les emplois voulus pour les millions de Chinois qui affluent chaque année dans les villes du pays.
ref: Experts on China differ on the rate of economic growth needed to create employment for the millions of Chinese who flock into the country’s cities every year.

cands: Turkey is facing a moment of truth.
inp: La Turquie est face à un moment de vérité.
ref: This is Turkey’s moment of truth.

cands: The creation of a South American Defence College is also being considered for this purpose.
inp: On envisage à ces mêmes fins la création d'un Collège sud-américain de défense.
ref: One potential mechanism for advancing these objectives is a South American Defense College, now under consideration.

cands: The plot then takes a different turn, Caesar becoming too big and aggressive to live in the company of a man, he is moved to what is supposed to
inp: L'intrigue prend alors une autre tournure, César devenant trop gros et trop agressif pour vivre enfermé en compagnie d’un homme, il est déplacé vers ce qui est supposé être une réserve pour primates, mais qui est en réalité un dépotoir tenu par des hommes qui font preuve de cruauté envers les grands singes, qui y ont abandonnés et gardés captifs.
ref: The plot then takes another turn when Caesar becomes too big and aggressive to live in a human home, and is taken to what is supposed to be a primate sanctuary, but is in fact a dumping ground for unwanted apes, run by humans who display cruelty to the captive animals.

cands: New investment vehicles, such as sovereign wealth funds and Islamic finance, could also help finance companies in need of credit.
inp: De nouveaux véhicules d’investissement, tels que les fonds souverains et la finance islamique, pourraient également contribuer à financer des entreprises en manque de crédit.
ref: New investment vehicles, such as sovereign wealth funds and Islamic finance, can contribute financing to credit-starved firms.

cands: True, gold prices have soared, as have world real estate prices – before they collapsed.
inp: Vrai, le cours de l’or a connu une belle envolée, tout comme les prix mondiaux de l’immobilier – avant qu’ils s’effondrent.
ref: Yes, gold has had a great run, but so, too, did worldwide housing prices until a couple of years ago.

cands: A new World Bank for a new world
inp: Une nouvelle Banque mondiale pour un nouveau monde
ref: A World Bank for a New World

cands: Is it not time to start laying the foundations for future growth, particularly in the poorest regions that are still waiting to share in the present prosper
inp: Le temps n'est-il pas venu de commencer à jeter les fondations d'une croissance future, notamment dans les régions les plus pauvres qui attendent encore leur part de la prospérité actuelle ?
ref: Has the time come to start laying the groundwork to sustain future growth, especially in poorer regions that have not yet shared in today’s prosperity?

cands: For them, given Israel's narrow and vulnerable geographical shape and the continuing Arab hostility, control of the West Bank and Gaza was not
inp: Pour eux, étant donné la forme géographique étroite et vulnérable d'Israël et l'hostilité continue des Arabes, le contrôle de la Cisjordanie et de Gaza ne constitue pas un impératif idéologique, mais répond à des considérations de sécurité.
ref: For them, given Israel's narrow and vulnerable geographic shape and continuing Arab enmity, controlling the West Bank and Gaza is not an ideological imperative, but is driven by security considerations.

cands: The US has been a major player in the global economy for decades, and has been a major contributor to the global economy since the early 1990’
inp: Les trop hauts espoirs sont des espoirs voués à la déception : prenons par exemple l’ancien secrétaire britannique aux Affaires étrangères, Robin Cook, et sa « politique étrangère éthique », au début du mandat de Tony Blair.
ref: Expectations raised too high are expectations bound to be disappointed: think of former British Foreign Secretary Robin Cook’s “ethical foreign policy” at the start of Blair’s premiership.

cands: These adjustment measures are often adopted without real consideration for their social impact.
inp: Ces mesures d’ajustement sont souvent adoptées sans réelle considération pour leur impact social.
ref: These adjustment measures are often adopted without carefully examining their social impact.

cands: Isn't the unification of Germany a story of ``blood and iron''?
inp: L'unification de l'Allemagne ne compose-t-elle pas une histoire de `` sang et de fer '' ?
ref: Wasn't Germany's unification a matter of ``blood and iron''?

cands: We need to make an unquestionable, public, meaningful and convincing breakthrough that speaks to the heart and mind and can be a
inp: Il nous faut faire une percée incontestable, publique, significative et convaincante, qui parle au cœur et à l’esprit et qui puisse témoigner de sa réussite.
ref: We need a breakthrough that is demonstrable, public, clear, and convincing, that can mobilize the public’s hearts and minds, and that can demonstrate success.

cands: Maintaining an undervalued currency has the advantage of supporting the production of such goods and the disadvantage of burdening domestic consump
inp: Maintenir une devise sous-évaluée a l’avantage de soutenir la production de tels biens et l’inconvénient de grever la consommation intérieure – ce qui explique la naissance d’un excédent commercial.
ref: Maintaining an undervalued currency has the upside that it subsidizes the production of such goods; but it also has the downside that it taxes domestic consumption – which is why it generates a trade surplus.

cands: A large proportion of these weapons remain deployed or are intended for use in the Euro-Atlantic region.
inp: Une grande partie de ces armes restent déployées ou sont destinées à servir dans la région euro-atlantique.
ref: Many of these weapons remain deployed or designed for use within the Euro-Atlantic region.

cands: PALO ALTO – Gene-splicing technology has enabled a group of European scientists to create an extraordinary tomato.
inp: PALO ALTO – La technique de l’épissage des gènes a permis à un groupe de scientifiques européens de créer une tomate extraordinaire.
ref: PALO ALTO – A group of multi-national European scientists has used gene-splicing techniques to create an extraordinary tomato.

cands: Not only is the US military in Iraq, but the way in which the US has engaged in Iraq, which has proved to have less military nuclear capability
inp: Non seulement l'armée américaine est occupée en Irak, mais la façon dont les Américains se sont engagés en Irak, qui s'est révélé posséder une capacité nucléaire militaire moins importante que celle de l'Iran, a sapé la crédibilité américaine : cela rend difficile le recrutement d'alliés pour contenir les ambitions nucléaires iraniennes.
ref: Not only is the US military busy trying in Iraq, but the way the US went into Iraq - which proved to have fewer nuclear capabilities than Iran - undermined American credibility, making it difficult to recruit allies to contain Iran's nuclear ambitions.

cands: Legislators, prosecutors and judges need to understand what the natural sciences, social sciences and engineering have to offer or not.
inp: Les législateurs, les procureurs et les magistrats, ont particulièrement besoin de comprendre ce que les sciences naturelles, les sciences sociales et le génie ont à offrir ou non.
ref: Legislators, prosecutors, and judges, in particular, need to understand what natural sciences, social sciences, and engineering can and cannot offer.

cands: Even before Estrada’s conviction, polls showed that 48% of Filipinos wanted him to be tried with mercy, or even pardoned.
inp: Même avant la condamnation d’Estrada, les sondages montraient que 48 % des Philippins voulaient qu’ils soient jugé avec clémence, voire gracié.
ref: Even before Estrada’s conviction, opinion polls showed that 48% of Filipinos wanted clemency, if not a guaranteed pardon from Arroyo.

cands: A few years of limited exchange rate flexibility are a small substitute for rapid implementation of structural reforms.
inp: Quelques années d'une flexibilité limitée du taux d'échange constituent un faible substitut à une rapide exécution des réformes structurales.
ref: A few years of limited exchange rate flexibility is a poor substitute for rapid completion of structural reforms.

cands: Now that the international community's attention is focused on one of the countries that has benefited from Pakistani technology, Iran is considered the most likely country to
inp: Maintenant que toute l'attention de la communauté internationale est concentrée sur l'un des pays ayant bénéficié de la technologie pakistanaise, l'Iran est considéré comme le pays le plus susceptible de créer son propre arsenal nucléaire.
ref: Now the world's attention is focussed on Iran, one recipient of Pakistani technology, as the country seemingly keenest to create its own nuclear arsenal.

cands: All citizens should have access to quality, healthy and affordable food.
inp: Tous les citoyens devaient avoir accès à une nourriture de qualité, saine, et à prix modéré.
ref: Good, healthy, and cheap food had to be accessible for all citizens.

cands: Extremists simply have enough weight to undermine a process based solely on trust.
inp: Les extrémistes ont simplement assez de poids pour miner un processus fondé sur la confiance uniquement.
ref: Extremists simply have enough power to undermine a process based on trust alone.

cands: Of course, initiatives at European Union and/or euro area level cannot be replaced by stronger mechanisms of discipline between member states, the responsibility for
inp: Bien sûr, on ne peut substituer des initiatives prises à l’échelle de l’Union européenne et/ou de la zone euro, à des mécanismes plus solides de discipline entre Etats membres, dont la responsabilité, en fin de compte, incombe aux hommes politiques des différentes nations.
ref: To be sure, initiatives at the EU and/or eurozone level cannot substitute for stronger mechanisms of discipline in the member states, which are ultimately the responsibility of national politicians and publics.

cands: Everyone agrees that Iran has a right to do so.
inp: Tout le monde s’accorde à dire que l’Iran en a le droit.
ref: Everyone agrees that Iran has the right to do so.

cands: After a year in Holland, France is witnessing a fundamental political revolution.
inp: Après une année de Hollande, la France assiste à une révolution politique fondamentale.
ref: After a year of Hollande, France is witnessing a fundamental political revolution.

cands: The assassination of the President of the Governing Council of Iraq is a clear testimony to the inability of the United States to establish the minimum law
inp: L'assassinat du président du Conseil gouvernant d'Irak atteste sans détours de l'incapacité des Etats-Unis à instaurer l'ordre public minimal requis pour le transfert discipliné de pouvoir qui doit avoir lieu d'ici le 30 juin.
ref: The assassination of the President of Iraq's Governing Council makes it crystal clear that the US is failing to create the minimal law-and-order needed for any sort of orderly transfer of power to take place by June 30th.

cands: But the economic slowdown, which is tending to defuse threats of strikes, will make private sector workers feel soft, regardless of the rhe
inp: Mais le ralentissement économique, qui tend à désamorcer les menaces de grève, fera que les travailleurs du secteur privé fileront doux, quels que soient les discours des dirigeants syndicaux.
ref: But the global slowdown, which takes the fangs out of the strike threat, will keep private-sector workers in line no matter how much their leaders may rant and rave.

cands: Two of them offset each other, but the third threatens what America will need most in the coming years: economic growth.
inp: Deux d’entre elles se compensent l’une l’autre, mais la troisième menace ce dont l’Amérique aura le plus besoin au cours des prochaines années : la croissance économique.
ref: Two of them offset each other, but the third threatens what America needs most in the coming years: economic growth.

cands: Fortunately, he is sufficiently intelligent to be aware of this.
inp: Par chance, il est suffisamment intelligent pour en être conscient.
ref: Fortunately, he is smart enough to know this.

cands: But in practice, the five permanent members of the Council agree on a candidate and their decision simply receives the approval of the Security Council and then the
inp: Mais en pratique, les cinq membres permanents du Conseil se mettent d'accord sur un candidat et leur décision reçoit simplement l'aval du Conseil de sécurité et ensuite de l'Assemblée générale.
ref: In practice, however, the five permanent members now agree on a candidate, and their decision is rubber-stamped first by the Security Council and then by the General Assembly.

cands: The current backward left can realize Che Guevara’s old dream: not “one, two, many Vietnams” but “one, two, many
inp: La gauche rétrograde d’aujourd'hui peut concrétiser le vieux rêve du Che Guevara : non pas « un, deux, de nombreux Vietnam » mais « un, deux, de nombreux Venezuelas », en accédant au pouvoir par les urnes et en s’y maintenant grâce à des changements constitutionnels, à la création de milices armées et de partis monolithiques.
ref: The retrograde left today can realize Che Guevara’s old dream: not “one, two, many Vietnams,” but “one, two, many Venezuelas,” winning power by the ballot and then conserving and concentrating it through constitutional changes and the creation of armed militias and monolithic parties.

cands: As members of an advisory committee for the Spanish initiative, my colleagues and I have advocated the creation of a single international account, which we call the
inp: En tant que membres d’un comité consultatif pour l’initiative espagnole, mes collègues et moi-même avons préconisé la création d’un compte unique international, que nous désignons du nom de Financial Coordination Mechanism (FCM) , et sur lequel les donateurs pourraient centraliser leurs fonds.
ref: My colleagues and I, serving on an advisory committee for the Spanish initiative, have recommended that donors pool their funds into a single international account, which we call the Financial Coordination Mechanism (FCM).

cands: Yet episodes of endemic famine are still pervasive, and for these same countries, those most affected by poor harvests and volatile food
inp: Pourtant les épisodes de famine endémique demeurent omniprésents, et ce, pour ces mêmes pays, ceux qui pâtissent le plus des mauvaises récoltes et de la volatilité des prix des denrées alimentaires.
ref: But chronic hunger remains pervasive, particularly in developing countries, which are affected most by crop shortages and food-price volatility.

cands: For example, he was strongly opposed to the regime of President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner and that of her husband and predecessor, Né
inp: Il s’est par exemple fermement opposé au régime de la présidente Cristina Fernández de Kirchner et à celui de son mari et prédécesseur, Néstor Kirchner.
ref: For example, he has been very vocal in voicing discontent with the rule of Argentine President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner and that of her husband and predecessor, Néstor Kirchner.

cands: If she succeeds, she will be the most powerful woman in Asia, perhaps even in the world, by the end of next year.
inp: Si elle y parvient, elle sera la femme la plus puissante de l’Asie, peut-être même du monde, dès la fin de l’année prochaine.
ref: If she does, she will be Asia’s most powerful woman, perhaps the most powerful in the world, at the end of next year.

cands: The US has been a major player in the Middle East peace process, and it has been a major contributor to the peace process in the region.
inp: ROME – Le grand discours d'Obama sur les conséquences du Printemps arabe est un défi pour l'Europe.
ref: ROME – US President Barack Obama’s major speech on the consequences of the Arab Spring is also a challenge for Europe.

cands: The extensive tax relief for Yukos was therefore only one way to achieve this objective.
inp: Le redressement fiscal considérable de Ioukos n’étaient donc qu’un moyen pour parvenir à cet objectif.
ref: The massive tax claims against Yukos used for this purpose were precisely that – the means rather than the end.

cands: In other words, the main objective of the League is to marginalise these two countries from world affairs.
inp: En d'autres termes, l’objectif principal de la ligue est de marginaliser ces deux pays des affaires mondiales.
ref: In other words, the League’s main purpose is to marginalize Russia and China in world affairs.

cands: The beginning of his papacy coincided with a weakening of populist governments, which were hard hit by the recent disappearance of Hugo Chávez.
inp: Le début de sa papauté coïncide avec une fragilisation des gouvernements populistes, frappés durement par la disparition récente de Hugo Chávez.
ref: The start of his papacy finds the populist governments in a vulnerable situation, hit hard by Chávez’s recent death.

cands: The NAFTA was conceived on the assumption that trade expansion would redistribute all benefits to the three countries.
inp: L'ALENA a été conçu en partant de l'hypothèse que l'expansion du commerce permettrait de redistribuer tous les bénéfices aux trois pays.
ref: NAFTA was conceived under the assumption that expanded trade would trickle down benefits to all in the three countries.

cands: Combating Drug Trafficking Violence requests that it work with Mexican telecommunications mogul Carlos Slim to develop tools that allow ordinary citizens to report
inp: Contrer les violences liées au narcotrafic demande de travailler avec le mogol des télécommunications mexicain Carlos Slim en vue de développer des outils permettant aux citoyens ordinaires de dénoncer des actes de violence de manière anonyme via SMS et à la police de cartographier les résultats.
ref: Countering narco-gang violence includes working with Mexican telecommunications mogul Carlos Slim to develop tools that allow ordinary citizens to report violence anonymously by text message and enable police to map the results.

cands: So what is the added value of the ADB, and who does it serve?
inp: Alors, quelle est la valeur ajoutée de la BAD, et qui sert-elle ?
ref: So, what is the ADB’s added value, and whom does it serve?

cands: Demand from U.S. employers for a low-cost Mexican workforce and the 10 to 1 wage gap between the two countries are driving 3
inp: La demande des employeurs américains pour une main-d'oeuvre mexicaine à bas prix et le fossé salarial de 10 contre 1 entre les deux pays poussent 350 000 Mexicains à risquer leur vie chaque année pour obtenir des emplois mieux payés au nord de la frontière.
ref: Demand for low-cost Mexican labor by US employers and the 10-1 wage gap between the two countries pushes 350,000 Mexicans to risk their lives every year for better paid jobs north of the border.

cands: It is opposed to civil union for homosexual couples, strongly defends the religious prohibition of abortion and the exclusion of women from priest
inp: Il s’oppose à l’union civile pour les couples homosexuels, défend avec fermeté l’interdiction religieuse d’avorter et l’exclusion des femmes de la prêtrise.
ref: He opposes civil unions for gay couples, and strongly defends the church’s prohibition of abortion and its ban on women priests.

cands: For the resources of nature and the tools of men are as fertile and productive as they were.
inp: Car les ressources de la nature et les outils des hommes sont tout aussi fertiles et productifs qu’ils ne l’étaient.
ref: For the resources of nature and men’s devices are just as fertile and productive as they were.

cands: If the DPJ can free itself from mandarin control by reorienting power around the Prime Minister, as it intends, Japan can become a stronger
inp: Si le PDJ peut se libérer du contrôle des mandarins en recentrant le pouvoir autour du Premier Ministre, comme il en a l’intention, le Japon peut devenir une démocratie plus solide avec un système politique véritablement bi-parti et une plus grande volonté à assumer son rôle de leader international.
ref: If the DPJ can break free of mandarin control by centralizing policy formation in the office of the prime minister, as it intends, Japan can emerge as a more resilient democracy with a full-fledged two-party system and greater willingness to assume an international leadership role.

cands: Let’s get started.
inp: Commençons les travaux
ref: A Time to Build

cands: This is the case with the US commitment to combating human-induced climate change as a signatory to the 1992 UN Framework Convention on Climate Change.
inp: C'est le cas de l'engagement des USA à lutter contre le changement climatique dû à l'activité humaine en tant que signataire de la convention-cadre de l'ONU sur le changement climatique de 1992.
ref: The US promised action to fight man-made climate change as a signatory to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCC) in 1992.

cands: In 2010, for example, consumption accounted for 81.6% of their GDP.
inp: Ainsi, en 2010, la part de la consommation dans leur PIB avait atteint 81,6%.
ref: As a result, in 2010 the share of consumption in their GDP had reached 81.6%.

cands: The deadlines are approaching for Kosovo.
inp: Les échéances se rapprochent pour le Kosovo.
ref: Time is running out in Kosovo.

cands: Iran claims that its membership in the Non-Proliferation Treaty gives it the right to enrich uranium for non-military purposes.
inp: L'Iran prétend que sa qualité de membre du Traité sur la non prolifération lui donne le droit d'enrichir de l'uranium à des fins non militaires.
ref: Iran claims that as a party to the Non-Proliferation Treaty, it has the right to enrich uranium for peaceful purposes.

cands: Obama has top-notch economists on his side, which will help to avoid any bias.
inp: Obama dispose à ses cotés d'économistes de premier ordre, ce qui permettra d'éviter toute bévue.
ref: Obama has a first-rate group of economists on his side, which ensures that he will not do anything silly.

cands: No criticism of Islam, however offensive, should be banned in the name of “politically correctness.”
inp: Aucune critique à l'égard de l'islam, aussi offensante soit-elle, ne doit être interdite au nom du "politiquement correct".
ref: No criticism of Islam, however offensive, should ever be hampered by political correctness.

cands: At the end of 2009, the unemployment rate was over 10%, and the average length of unemployment had never been higher since the Great De
inp: Fin 2009, le taux de chômage a dépassé 10% et la durée moyenne de chômage n'a jamais été aussi élevée depuis la Grande dépression.  Des millions de salariés se sont retrouvés au chômage partiel et des millions d'autres étaient tellement découragés qu'ils ne cherchaient même plus du travail.
ref: The unemployment rate at the end of 2009 was above 10%, duration of joblessness was the longest since the Great Depression, millions had had their working hours cut, and millions more were too discouraged by a lack of jobs to seek work.

cands: I do not agree with those who say that we should not be interested in the dark episodes of a great writer’s life.
inp: Je ne suis pas de l’avis de ceux qui disent qu’on ne doit pas s’intéresser aux épisodes sombres de la vie d’un grand écrivain.
ref: I don’t agree with those who say we should not be interested in the dark episodes in the life of a great writer.

cands: From Mississippi to Maine, and from New York to New Orleans, the United States shares the same written language and the language spoken is understandable to all
inp: Depuis le Mississippi jusque dans le Maine, et de New York jusqu’à la Nouvelle Orléans, les Etats-Unis partagent la même langue écrite et la langue parlée est compréhensible de tous.
ref: From Mississippi to Maine, and from New York to New Orleans, America’s written language is the same and the spoken language is understandable to all.

cands: The US has been a major player in the global financial crisis, and the US has been a major player in the global financial crisis.
inp: Pourquoi ces outils antitrust ne sont-ils pas utilisés contre les géants bancaires d’aujourd’hui, lesquels sont devenus tellement puissants qu’ils peuvent lourdement influencer la législation et la réglementation, tout en recevant des aides généreuses financées par les contribuables ?
ref: Why are these antitrust tools not used against today’s megabanks, which have become so powerful that they can sway legislation and regulation massively in their favor, while also receiving generous taxpayer-financed bailouts as needed?

cands: But the big question remains: how to do it?
inp: Toutefois, une grande question demeure. Comment y parvenir ?
ref: But the big question remains: How?

cands: Making research and development an integral part of the climate change response portfolio would make mitigation efforts more effective and increase their ability to reduce carbon emissions over
inp: Faire en sorte que la recherche et le développement soient une partie intégrante du portefeuille de la réponse au changement climatique rendrait les efforts d’atténuation plus efficaces et augmenterait d’autant leur capacité à réduire les émissions de carbone au cours du siècle prochain.
ref: Ensuring that research and development is part of the world’s climate change response portfolio would make mitigation efforts more efficient and significantly enhance their ability to reduce carbon emissions over the next century.

cands: Obama is capable of getting himself into a rut and crying.
inp: Obama est capable de s’enrager et de pleurer.
ref: Obama can rage and weep.

cands: However, no state was a true nation, with its own history deeply rooted in the identity of all its citizens.
inp: Cependant, aucun état ne constituait une véritable nation, disposant d’une histoire propre profondément enracinées dans l’identité de tous ses citoyens.
ref: But one’s state was not a fully formed nation, with its own shared and deeply ingrained history, culture, ethnic identity, and religion.

cands: I did not waste my time asking the Israeli authorities for permission to travel to Europe: I was told that only patients in need of emergency medical evacuation
inp: Je n'ai pas perdu mon temps à demander aux autorités israéliennes la permission de voyager vers l'Europe : on m'a dit que seuls les malades ayant besoin d'une évacuation médicale d'urgence seraient autorisés à quitter le territoire – non les étudiants.
ref: I wasted no time in asking the Israeli authorities for permission to travel to Europe. But I was told that only patients in need of emergency medical evacuation would be allowed out – not students.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a decade, and the US has been a major contributor to the global economy
inp: Ils doivent mettre en priorité des mesures pour faciliter le lancement d'entreprises, éliminer les obstacles au capital de risque et introduire des déductions temporaires d’amortissement à 100 % afin d’inciter les entreprises à devancer leurs plans d’investissement.
ref: They should prioritize measures to make it easier to start a business, lift barriers to venture capital, and introduce temporary 100% capital allowances to encourage businesses to bring forward investment.

cands: The best policies that are strictly oriented towards Latin America are source-driven and easily achievable.
inp: Les meilleures politiques strictement axées sur l'Amérique latine coulent de source et sont facilement réalisables.
ref: The best, strictly Latin America-focused steps, are self-evident, if not easily achievable.

cands: Conspiracy theories usually arise when people are poorly educated and there is a lack of an independent, high-quality press.
inp: Les théories conspirationnistes apparaissent généralement lorsque les gens sont peu éduqués et qu'une presse indépendante de qualité fait défaut.
ref: Usually, conspiracy theories surface where people are poorly educated and a rigorous independent press is lacking.

cands: By linking and putting their training programs online, universities around the world can become even more effective in discovering and promoting science-based solutions to complex
inp: En tissant des liens et en mettant leurs programmes de formation en ligne, les universités du monde entier peuvent devenir encore plus efficaces pour découvrir et promouvoir des solutions fondées sur la science pour résoudre des problèmes complexes.
ref: By linking together, and putting their curricula online, the world’s universities can become even more effective in discovering and promoting science-based solutions to complex problems.

cands: It is simply beautiful, and hopefully after the final whistle blow in Berlin on 9 July, the Germans will retain some of that spirit.
inp: C’est tout simplement beau. Espérons qu’après le coup de sifflet final à Berlin le 9 juillet, les Allemands garderont en eux un peu de cet état d’esprit.
ref: Let’s hope that when the last whistle blows at the final in Berlin on July 9, we Germans retain as much of this positive spirit as possible.

cands: It should support the economy with a different fiscal policy to prevent the country from living above its means.
inp: Il devrait soutenir l'économie par une politique fiscale différente destinée à éviter que le pays ne vive au-dessus de ses moyens.
ref: The Bush Administration should admit this, and redesign a tax program to strengthen the economy by making the country live within its means.

cands: Given energy concerns, any conflict in Azerbaijan would also have repercussions in Europe.
inp: Compte tenu des préoccupations énergétiques, tout conflit en Azerbaïdjan aurait également des répercussions en Europe.
ref: Given energy-security concerns, any Azerbaijani conflict would also seriously affect Europe.

cands: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon is addressing this issue with an unprecedented unity of position at the crossroads of international politic
inp: Le secrétaire général des Nations Unies Ban Ki-moon s’attaque à cette question sans précédent par une position unique à la croisée des chemins de la politique et de la société internationales.
ref: United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon is taking on this unprecedented challenge from his unique position at the crossroads of global politics and society.

cands: Versions of some of the other options are currently available.
inp: Des versions de certaines des autres options sont actuellement à l’ouvre.
ref: At present, versions of the other options can be seen.

cands: The government funds health research to the extent that better drugs are in the public interest.
inp: L’État finance la recherche liée à la santé dans la mesure où de meilleurs médicaments sont synonymes d’intérêt général.
ref: Government finances health-care research because improved medicines are a public good.

cands: It could also begin by reassessing its Tibetan policy rather than by strengthening controls and allegations.
inp: Il pourrait aussi commencer par réévaluer sa politique tibétaine plutôt que de renforcer contrôles et allégations.
ref: And it could start reassessing its Tibetan policies instead of increasing controls and allegations.

cands: The 20 or more bilateral or multilateral donor agencies for agriculture are very fragmented and insufficiently large, individually and collectively.
inp: La vingtaine, ou plus, d’agences bilatérales ou multilatérales de donneurs en faveur de l’agriculture sont très fragmentées et d’envergure insuffisante, individuellement et collectivement.
ref: The more than 20 bilateral and multilateral donor agencies for agriculture are highly fragmented and of insufficient scale individually and collectively.

cands: Brazil cannot, however, rely exclusively on soft power to defend its interests.
inp: Néanmoins, le Brésil ne peut pas compter exclusivement sur la "puissance douce" pour défendre ses intérêts.
ref: Yet no country can rely on soft power alone to defend its interests.

cands: Another equally important challenge is cooperation between NATO and Russia, which at the last NATO summit in Lisbon agreed to cooperate on the Atlantic Alliance’s miss
inp: Un autre défi, tout aussi important, est celui de la coopération entre l’Otan et la Russie, qui lors du dernier sommet de l’Otan à Lisbonne, a accepté de collaborer au projet de défense antimissile de l’Alliance atlantique.
ref: Another, equally important challenge is cooperation between NATO and Russia, which agreed at NATO’s Lisbon summit in November to collaborate on the Alliance’s anti-missile defenses.

cands: Rwanda, Mozambique and Sierra Leone are other examples that can guide the Panel.
inp: Le Rwanda, le Mozambique et le Sierra Leone sont d’autres exemples qui peuvent guider le Panel.
ref: Other inspiring models can be found in Rwanda, Mozambique, and Sierra Leone.

cands: They too face major uncertainties.
inp: Elles aussi sont confrontées à des incertitudes majeures.
ref: They are also facing huge uncertainties.

cands: This bank would be only a first step, which would have to be followed by an agreement to shift all enrichment and reprocessing activities from national to
inp: Cette banque ne serait qu’une première étape, qui devra être suivie d’un accord faisant passer l’ensemble des activités d’enrichissement et de retraitement du contrôle national au contrôle exclusivement multinational.
ref: It should be followed by an agreement that all new enrichment and reprocessing activities will be placed exclusively under multinational control, and that all existing such facilities will be converted from national to multinational control.

cands: In The Planet of the Monkeys: Origins, however, Rodman is portrayed, in Franco’s words, as “a cold, soli
inp: Cependant, dans La planète des singes : les origines, Rodman est dépeint, selon les termes employés par Franco, comme “ une personne froide et solitaire. ”
ref: Rise of the Planet of the Apes, however, portrays Rodman as, in Franco’s words, “a cold, isolated person.”

cands: Will developing countries suffer?
inp: Les pays en développement vont-ils en pâtir ?
ref: Will this spell doom for developing countries?

cands: Despite the chronic pessimism surrounding it, the move towards a future “Water and Energy Community,” coupled with the adoption of the
inp: En dépit du pessimisme chronique ambiant, le cap sur une future “Communauté de l’eau et de l’énergie,” associée à l’adoption de l’Initiative de paix arabe, feraient évoluer les mentalités.
ref: Despite today’s chronic pessimism, the pursuit of a Middle East Water and Energy Union, coupled with adoption of the Arab Peace Initiative, would change mindsets.

cands: A New Deal for Poor Farmers
inp: Un New Deal pour les agriculteurs pauvres
ref: A New Deal for Poor Farmers

cands: After all, as a field investigative journalist, she has instilled in many people besides Putin, including the current Chechen Prime Minister Ramzan Kad
inp: Après tout, en tant que journaliste d'investigation en campagne, elle a enragé beaucoup d'autres gens outre Poutine, parmi lesquels l'actuel Premier ministre tchétchène Ramzan Kadyrov n'est pas des moindres, qu'elle a accusé de mener une politique d'enlèvements contre rançons.
ref: After all, as a campaigning investigative journalist she made many people angry besides Putin, not least of which is the current Chechen Prime Minister, Ramzan Kadyrov, whom she accused of a policy of kidnapping for ransom.

cands: The new engine of the world economy is no longer the US consumer but China, and as this engine is smaller, the world economy will grow more slowly, but
inp: Le nouveau moteur de l’économie mondiale n’est plus le consommateur américain mais la Chine. Dans la mesure où ce moteur est d’une taille plus modeste, l’économie du monde connaitra une croissance plus lente, mais l’influence de la Chine, elle, devrait grimper très rapidement.
ref: China is replacing the American consumer as the motor of the world economy.  Since it is a smaller motor, the world economy will grow slower, but China’s influence will rise very fast.

cands: At the same time, Saudi public opinion is inflaming, largely because of its leaders’ apparent apathy for the plight of the Palestinian people,
inp: Au même moment, l'opinion publique saoudienne s'enflamme, principalement à cause de l'apathie apparente de ses gouvernants envers la détresse du peuple palestinien, surtout quand elle est mise en perspective avec la propagande dangereuse d'Oussama ben Laden. Depuis les attaques terroristes du 11 septembre, les dirigeants saoudiens se sentent dans l'obligation de se concilier le dégoût populaire issu des mauvais traitements infligés aux Palestiniens, mais s'inquiètent qu'ainsi leurs relations maintenant fragiles avec l'Amérique ne soient encore plus compromises.
ref: At the same time, Saudi public opinion has been inflamed, mostly because of their rulers’ apparent apathy toward the plight of the Palestinian people, particularly when contrasted with Osama bin Laden’s lethal propaganda.  Since the terrorist attacks of September 11th, Saudi leaders have felt pressed to accommodate public revulsion about the mistreatment of the Palestinians, but worry that doing so may even further jeopardize their now brittle relations with America.

cands: In an unpredictable world where old threats are accompanied by new challenges, policymakers cannot afford to ignore "hard power".
inp: Dans un monde imprévisible où les anciennes menaces s'accompagnent de nouveaux défis, les responsables politiques ne peuvent se permettre d'ignorer la "puissance dure".
ref: Indeed, in an unpredictable world, where old threats are compounded by new challenges, policymakers cannot disregard hard power.

cands: A true civil society did not emerge until 1868 and the restoration of the Meiji era, which brought the balance of power to a definitive state-to
inp: Une véritable société civile ne s’est constituée qu’à partir de 1868 et la restauration l’ère Meiji qui a fait pencher la balance du pouvoir en faveur de l’état de façon définitive.
ref: Indeed, full-fledged “society”-building started only after the 1868 Meiji Restoration, which tipped the balance of power definitively in favor of the state.

cands: This is a slap in the face for the most widespread mind, which continues to claim that the only way to combat climate change is to impose carbon
inp: Il y a là comme une gifle au visage de la pensée la plus répandue, qui continue d’affirmer que l’imposition de réductions du carbone – au moyen d’un système de plafonnement et d’échanges de droits d’émission de gaz à effet de serre, ou à travers une taxe carbone – constituerait la seule manière de lutter contre le changement climatique.
ref: This flies in the face of conventional thinking, which continues to claim that mandating carbon reductions – through cap-and-trade or a carbon tax – is the only way to combat climate change.

cands: Sustainable development is a generational challenge, not a short-term task.
inp: Le développement durable est un défi d’une génération et non une tâche à court terme.
ref: Sustainable development is a generational challenge, not a short-term task.

cands: The impact of this user-generated information is very significant: in 2003, a pharmaceutical company revised its 2002 estimates of the incidence
inp: L'impact de cette information produite par les utilisateurs est très important : en 2003, une entreprise pharmaceutique a revu ses estimations de 2002 sur l'incidence des réactions au sevrage de 0,2 % à 25 % (même si le fabricant d'un médicament semblable continue de proclamer que le médicament n'est pas une drogue à accoutumance).
ref: The impact of this user intelligence has been profound: in 2003, one pharmaceutical company revised its 2002 estimate of the incidence of withdrawal reactions from 0.2% to 25% (even as the manufacturer of a similar drug continues to claim that it is "not habit forming" at all).

cands: Despite the efforts made in the "World War on Terrorism", the main developments of the last decade have been the introduction and deploy
inp: Malgré les efforts dépensés dans la « Guerre mondiale contre le terrorisme », les évolutions principales des dix dernières années ont été l’introduction et le déploiement de technologies de l’information innovantes, la mondialisation, les guerres en Iraq et en Afghanistan, ainsi que les bouleversements politiques au Moyen-Orient.
ref: Despite the attention devoted to the “Global War on Terrorism,” the most important developments of the last ten years have been the introduction and spread of innovative information technologies, globalization, the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, and the political upheavals in the Middle East.

cands: In this case, Roman Abramovich’s Sibneft – the company most vulnerable because of its oligarchical leadership and the tax methods that caused
inp: En l’occurrence Sibneft, de Roman Abramovich - compagnie la plus vulnérable en raison de sa direction oligarchique et du recours aux méthodes fiscales qui ont causé la perte de Ioukos – fait l’objet d’une procédure préliminaire pour des arriérés.
ref: As it is, even Roman Abramovich’s Sibneft – potentially the most vulnerable company due to its oligarch ownership and its use of the same tax minimization schemes that were the undoing of Yukos – merely faces a preliminary claim for back taxes.

cands: I remember the years when, as a teenager, I worked in a pediatric centre, and I witnessed the deaths of children with diseases such as
inp: Je me remémore les années où, adolescente, j’exerçais dans un centre pédiatrique, et où j’ai été témoin du décès d’enfants atteints de maladies comme la polio, la rougeole et le tétanos – toutes facilement évitables par vaccin.
ref: I remember working at a pediatric ward as a teenager and watching children die from diseases like polio, measles, and tetanus – all easily prevented by vaccines.

cands: In addition, many public and private institutions are undertaking the infrastructure and finance projects that the ADB now wants to focus on.
inp: En outre, nombre d’institutions publiques et privées entreprennent les projets d’infrastructure et de finances sur lesquels la BAD veut aujourd’hui se concentrer.
ref: Besides, plenty of other public and private institutions undertake the infrastructure and finance projects that the ADB now wants to focus on.

cands: Through a reward system, innovators would be rewarded for their new advances, but would not retain any monopoly over the exploitation of those
inp: Au travers d’un système de récompense, les innovateurs se verraient rétribués pour leurs nouvelles avancées, mais ne conserveraient aucun monopole pour l’exploitation de celles-ci.
ref: With a prize system, innovators are rewarded for new knowledge, but they do not retain a monopoly on its use.

cands: Both Chu and Locke are aware that the United States and China are now the world’s largest producers of greenhouse gases, and that a solution to
inp: Tant Chu que Locke sont conscients du fait que les Etats-Unis et la Chine sont aujourd’hui les principaux producteurs mondiaux d’émissions de gaz à effet de serre, et que pour trouver une solution au problème du changement climatique mondial, il est urgent que les deux pays trouvent un terrain d’entente.
ref: Both Chu and Locke are aware that the US and China are now the world’s largest emitters of greenhouse gases, and that, if there is any hope of remedying global climate change, the two countries must quickly find a way to collaborate.

cands: Throughout this period, the brightest students were attracted from outside their countries of origin by the prospect of better career and research opportunities.
inp: Pendant toute cette période, les étudiants les plus brillants ont été attirés hors de leurs pays d'origine par la perspective de meilleures opportunités de carrière et de recherches.
ref: Throughout this period, the brightest students were drawn away from their native lands, attracted by superior research universities and opportunities.

cands: It is high time to consider new approaches.
inp: Il est grand temps de considérer de nouvelles approches.
ref: It is high time to consider novel approaches.

cands: We humans are so aggressively fishing, hunting, cutting down forests and cultivating the land in all parts of the world that we are
inp: Nous autres humains nous pêchons, chassons, abattons les forêts et cultivons la terre de façon si agressive dans toutes les parties du monde que nous sommes littéralement en train de chasser les autres espèces de la planète.
ref: We humans are now so aggressively fishing, hunting, logging, and growing crops in all parts of the world that we are literally chasing other species off the planet.

cands: The Germans do not seem to be affected by years of bad news.
inp: Les Allemands ne semblent pas affectés par des années de mauvaises nouvelles.
ref: Years of bad news appear to have passed the Germans by without a trace.

cands: But these surges will not wake up a corpse.
inp: Mais ces sursauts ne pourront pas réveiller un cadavre.
ref: But these spasms will not revive the corpse.

cands: A Fair Deal for Africa’s Resources.
inp: Une transaction équitable pour les ressources de l’Afrique
ref: A Fair Deal for Africa’s Resources

cands: The world watched as thousands of Iraqis were massacred.
inp: Le monde a alors regardé des milliers d’Irakiens se faire massacrer.
ref: The world watched as thousands of Iraqis were slaughtered.

cands: Taken from this perspective, countering terrorism involves, among other things, refuting terrorist propaganda through a strategic communications campaign.
inp: Si l’on prend cette perspective, contrer le terrorisme implique entre autres de réfuter la propagande terroriste au moyen d’une campagne de communication stratégique.
ref: Viewed from this perspective, countering terrorism includes rebutting terrorist propaganda with a strategic communications campaign.

cands: In a world of "multiple identities", choosing your team is about deciding who you are.
inp: Dans un monde « d’identités multiples », choisir son équipe revient à décider qui on est.
ref: In a world of “multiple identities,” to choose one’s team is in part to decide who one is.

cands: The Lisbon Treaty must also be re-launched, with a focus on market reforms, and the EU must seriously consider reviewing certain measures
inp: Il faut également remettre en ouvre le traité de Lisbonne, en mettant l’accent sur les réformes de marché, et l’UE doit envisager sérieusement de se raviser sur certaines mesures – notamment celles qui concernent la politique climatique et la dérive vers une politique sociale européenne – qui risquent d’alourdir les fardeaux qui pèsent sur son économie et/ou de gêner la flexibilité de ses marchés.
ref: Moreover, the Lisbon Agenda should be reinvigorated, with a focus on market reforms, and the EU should urgently reconsider measures – particularly regarding climate policy and the drift toward an EU-wide social policy – that risk imposing additional burdens on their economies and/or hamper the flexibility of markets.

cands: Since then, Kurds have suffered under the despotic rule of rival ethnic groups.
inp: Depuis lors, les Kurdes ont souffert sous le règne despotique de groupes ethniques rivaux.
ref: Since then, the Kurds have suffered under the despotic rule of rival ethnic groups.

cands: The United States cannot continue with the failed policies of the last 50 years.
inp: Les États-Unis ne peuvent poursuivre les politiques défaillantes des 50 dernières années.
ref: The US cannot continue with the failed policies of the past half-century.

cands: And as scientists become more concerned and insist on the urgency of tackling climate change, economists are increasingly optimistic about the opportunities of a
inp: Et à l’heure où l’inquiétude des scientifiques se fait plus grande et qu’ils insistent sur l’urgence de s’attaquer au changement climatique, les économistes sont de plus en plus optimistes sur les opportunités induites par un avenir à faible empreinte carbone.
ref: And, as scientists become gloomier and underline the urgency of tackling climate change, economists are becoming increasingly optimistic about the opportunities implied by a low-carbon future.

cands: No, but do they have to?
inp: Non, mais le doivent-ils ?
ref: No, but must they?

cands: We know that American finance is determining the outcome of economic growth in different parts of the world, that Chinese carbon dioxide emissions are eventually affecting
inp: Nous savons que les tenants de la finance américaine déterminent les aboutissants de la croissance économique des différentes parties du globe, que les émissions de dioxyde de carbone chinoises finissent par influencer les récoltes et le moyen de subsistance de beaucoup d’habitants du Vietnam, du Bangladesh, des Maldives et d’ailleurs, qu’une épidémie survenant au Mexique met en danger le rythme de la vie publique aux Etats-Unis et que la poussière des volcans islandais perturbe le trafic aérien en Europe.
ref: We have seen how financial engineering in the United States can determine economic growth in every part of the world; how carbon-dioxide emissions from China end up influencing crop yields and livelihoods in Vietnam, Bangladesh, the Maldives, and beyond; how an epidemic in Mexico endangers the rhythm of public life in the US; or how volcanic ash from Iceland affects travel across Europe.

cands: The business sector now has two facets.
inp: Le secteur des entreprises a désormais deux facettes.
ref: Now the corporate sector has two faces.

cands: China’s stubborn refusal to accept the Asian territorial status quo only underscores the futility of political negotiations.
inp: Par son refus obstiné d’accepter le statu quo territorial asiatique, la Chine ne fait que souligner la futilité des négociations politiques.
ref: Through its overt refusal to accept Asia’s territorial status quo, China only highlights the futility of political negotiations.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a century.
inp: Ces économies ont besoin de mesures pour aider à garder les pauvres hors des pièges de la pauvreté, et pour leur donner des occasions réalistes d'améliorer leur bien-être économique.
ref: These economies need measures that help to keep the poor out of poverty traps, and that give them realistic opportunities to improve their economic well-being.

cands: First, the five major nuclear states have not taken seriously the obligation to take disarmament measures under the NPT.
inp: Premièrement, les cinq grands Etats nucléaires n’ont pas pris au sérieux l’obligation de mesures de désarmement souscrite avec le TNP.
ref: First, the five main nuclear-weapon states have not taken seriously their NPT obligation to work for nuclear disarmament.

cands: The crowd had gathered along the road.
inp: La foule s’était amassée le long de la route.
ref: All along the road were throngs of people.

cands: But his courage and example can help to accelerate the day when China's participation in world affairs can be based on expertise and under the eyes of civil
inp: Mais son courage et son exemple peuvent contribuer à accélérer l'avènement du jour où la participation de la Chine aux affaires du monde pourra s'appuyer sur l'expertise et sous le regard de groupes issus de la société civile, de médias indépendants et de citoyens engagés pouvant exprimer leurs points de vue avec leur bulletin de vote.
ref: But his courage and example may help to accelerate the dawn of the day when China’s participation in international affairs is aided by the expertise and oversight of civil-society groups, an independent media, and an engaged citizenry able to express its views through the ballot box.

cands: When there is no evidence that a matter of personal morality can affect the performance of a corporate executive or government official, we should respect that person’s privacy
inp: Quand rien ne laisse penser qu’une affaire de moralité personnelle peut avoir un impact sur les performances d’un responsable d’entreprise ou d’un fonctionnaire du gouvernement, nous devrions respecter la vie privée de cette personne.
ref: Where there is no suggestion that a matter of personal morality has had an impact on the performance of a business executive or government official, we should respect that person’s privacy.

cands: Poor countries, especially Third World democracies - Brazil, South Africa, India, Mexico, Ghana and the Philippines - should say: 'We must act on
inp: Les pays pauvres, notamment les démocraties du Tiers Monde - le Brésil, l'Afrique du Sud, l'Inde, le Mexique, le Ghana et les Philippines - devraient déclarer :"Nous devons agir sur les problèmes qui nous concernent et pas seulement sur ceux qui préoccupent l'Amérique."
ref: Poor countries, especially the democracies of the developing world--Brazil, South Africa, India, Mexico, Ghana, the Philippines--should say, "We need to act on the issues that concern us, not just on the issues that concern the US."

cands: They will not be the only ones.
inp: Ils ne seront pas les seuls.
ref: In better shape, but not alone.

cands: Flags symbolize hopes of victory, but they also serve to dry the tears of defeat.
inp: Les drapeaux symbolisent les espoirs de victoire, mais servent aussi à sécher les larmes de la défaite.
ref: Flags are flown in hope of victory, but also serve to dry the tears of defeat.

cands: Only a reduction in budgetary reserves would have an inflationary impact, and this would not be due to a price/wage spiral, but
inp: Seule une baisse des réserves du budget aurait un impact inflationniste, et cela ne serait pas dû à une spirale prix/salaires, mais à une augmentation des dépenses publiques, ce qui ne serait pas nécessairement négatif pour une économie confrontée à la possibilité d’un fléchissement économique sévère.
ref: Only if the budget surplus diminishes would there be an inflationary impact, and that would not be due to a wage-price spiral, but to an increase in net government demand, which actually might not be a bad thing for an economy facing a potentially severe economic slowdown.

cands: The eurozone is often seen as the experience of monetary union without political unity.
inp: WARSAW – La zone euro est souvent considérée comme l’expérience d’une union monétaire sans unité politique.
ref: WARSAW – The eurozone is often considered an experiment – a monetary union without political unification.

cands: In the Far East, China’s growth model is in a state of flux, with its economy threatening to collapse in 2013 as investment continues to
inp: En Extrême-Orient le modèle de croissance de la Chine est à bout de souffle, son économie pourrait s'écrouler en 2013 alors que la chute des investissements se poursuit et que les réformes destinées à stimuler la consommation représentent trop peu de choses et viennent trop tard.
ref: In the east, China, its growth model unsustainable, could be underwater by 2013, as its investment bust continues and reforms intended to boost consumption are too little too late.

cands: A major decision by Medvedev suspended the construction of a highway through the Khimki forest near Moscow following widespread civil opposition.
inp: Une importante décision de Medvedev a suspendu la construction d’une autoroute traversant la forêt Khimki près de Moscou suite à une large opposition civile.
ref: Medvedev's decision to suspend construction of a highway through the Khimki forest near Moscow in the face of widespread civic protest was important.

cands: In the absence of full fiscal unification – or its variant in the form of eurozone bonds – this increase in official resources would be achieved through
inp: En l’absence d’une unification fiscale complète – ou de sa variante sous la forme d’obligations eurozone – cette augmentation de ressources officielles se ferait à travers un élargissement de la Facilité de Stabilité Financière Européenne et par un engagement beaucoup plus important de la Banque Centrale Européenne à effectuer des achats d’obligations de long terme et des opérations de liquidité destinées à soutenir les banques.
ref: Short of full fiscal unification – or a variant of it in the form of eurozone bonds – this increase in official resources would occur through a much-enlarged European Financial Stability Facility and a much greater commitment by the European Central Bank to long-term bond purchases and liquidity operations to support banks.

cands: A long period of high unemployment, painful for a country, runs counter to what most experts assume the US flexible economic model will produce.
inp: Une longue période de taux de chômage élevé, douloureuse pour un pays, va à l'encontre de ce que le modèle économique américain basé sur la flexibilité est supposé produire selon la plupart des spécialistes.
ref: A long, painful period of high unemployment runs counter to what most experts believed the flexible US economic model would ever produce.

cands: As economic historian Alexander Field has shown, many firms have taken advantage of the downturn in activity resulting from weaker demand for their products
inp: Comme l’a démontré l’historien économique Alexander Field, de nombreuses entreprises ont profité du creux d’activité résultant de l’affaiblissement de la demande pour leurs produits pour se réorganiser.
ref: As the economic historian Alexander Field has shown, many firms took the “down time” created by weak demand for their products to reorganize their operations.

cands: My hosts explained to me that they had to maintain their level of technological advancement at the level of China.
inp: Mes hôtes m'expliquèrent qu'ils devaient maintenir leur niveau d'avancement technologique au niveau de la Chine.
ref: My hosts replied that they needed to keep up with China.

cands: But this will not happen by imposing necessarily harsh sanctions, or by using a Cold War logic on the part of the United States, in the idea
inp: Mais cela ne se fera pas en imposant des sanctions forcément boiteuses, ou par le recours à une logique de Guerre froide de la part des Etats-Unis, dans l’idée de ruiner l’Iran en l’entraînant dans une course aux armements ruineuse.
ref: This would not be achieved, however, through an inevitably imperfect sanctions regime, or by America’s resort to Cold War logic aimed at breaking Iran’s backbone by drawing it into a ruinous arms race.

cands: In fact, the latest Eurobarometer survey on the Lisbon Strategy shows that the European public sees little link between EU policies and economic competitiveness.
inp: En fait, le dernier sondage Eurobaromètre sur la Stratégie de Lisbonne montre que le public européen voit peu de liens entre les politiques de l’Union européenne et la compétitivité économique.
ref: Indeed, the last Eurobarometer survey on the Lisbon Strategy found that the European public sees little relation between EU policies and economic competitiveness.

cands: But the founders of the ICC considered that the war of aggression (the highest international crime according to the Nuremberg Military Court) was outside the
inp: Mais les fondateurs du TPI ont estimé que la guerre d'agression (le crime international suprême selon le tribunal militaire de Nuremberg) n'était pas du ressort de cette juridiction, ce qui est une garantie d'immunité pour les dirigeants qui ont décidé d'envahir l'Irak.
ref: But the ICC’s creators deemed the waging of aggressive war – which the International Military Tribunal at Nuremberg called “the supreme international crime” – to be outside the court’s jurisdiction. This guaranteed legal immunity for the leaders who carried out the invasion of Iraq.

cands: But his statements are only a first step towards formulating a new agenda for Russia, the first element of which must be renewal and acceleration of the
inp: Mais ses déclarations ne représentent qu’un premier pas vers la formulation d’un nouveau programme pour la Russie, dont le premier élément doit être un renouvellement et une accélération du mouvement vers une démocratie réelle et efficace.
ref: But his statements are only a first step toward formulating a new Russian agenda, the first point of which must be a renewal and acceleration of movement toward real and effective democracy.

cands: EU membership affects a country, its economy and society as a whole, and the war on terrorism requires a different approach to diplomacy and security.
inp: L'appartenance à l'UE affecte globalement un pays, son économie et la société, et la guerre contre le terrorisme suppose d'envisager autrement la diplomatie et la sécurité.
ref: Because EU membership affects every aspect of a state, economy, and society, while the war on terror demands a completely new way to conduct diplomacy and security policy.

cands: For too long, Arab governments have been content to settle the problems with money, as the rich Gulf states have subsidized the public services of their
inp: Pendant trop longtemps, les gouvernements arabes se sont contentés de régler les difficultés au moyen d’argent, les États riches du Golfe ayant en effet subventionné les services publics de leurs voisins en difficulté.
ref: For too long, Arab governments have simply thrown money at problems, with the rich Gulf countries effectively subsidizing their troubled neighbors’ public services.

cands: This new strategy is a policy reversal from the late 1990s, when the AfDB changed its objectives from “economic growth” to “poverty
inp: Cette nouvelle stratégie est un renversement des politiques de la fin des années 1990, époque où la BAD avait modifié ses objectifs pour passer de la “croissance économique” à la “réduction de la pauvreté.”
ref: The new strategy is a reversal of the policies of the late 1990’s, when the ADB changed its objective from “economic growth” to “poverty reduction.”

cands: In some cases, up to 100 houses can be stacked on top of each other.
inp: Dans certains cas, une centaine de maisons peuvent en effet être entassées les unes sur les autres.
ref: In some cases 100 homes can, in effect, be stacked on one another.

cands: Similarly, despite the NPT, little progress has been made towards nuclear disarmament.
