inp: De la même manière, en dépit du Traité de non-prolifération nucléaire, peu d'avancées ont été réalisées sur la voie du désarmement nucléaire.
ref: Likewise, little progress toward nuclear disarmament has been made, in disregard of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty.

cands: One of the advantages of this modest proposal is that it would not prejudice the conclusions of the Working Group on broader reforms, such
inp: L’un des avantages de cette modeste proposition est qu’elle ne porterait pas préjudice aux conclusions du groupe de travail sur des réformes plus larges, comme de nouvelles formules de distribution pour les DTS.
ref: One advantage of this modest proposal is that it would not prejudice the outcomes of the working group on broader reforms, like new distribution formulas for SDRs.

cands: Yet to describe the T3 as the success of socialism and the T5 as the failure of capitalism would be to miss a fundamental point.
inp: Pourtant, qualifier le T3 de succès du socialisme et le T5 d’échec du capitalisme reviendrait à passer à côté d’un point fondamental.
ref: But to call T3 a success for socialism and T5 a failure of capitalism would be to miss a fundamental point.

cands: Similarly, while competition improves the quality of research and education, it does not imply a reduction in public subsidies, a loss of the dominan
inp: De même, alors que la concurrence améliore la qualité de la recherche et de l’éducation, cela n’implique pas la réduction des subventions publiques, la perte de prépondérance de la recherche fondamentale ni l’élimination des bourses universitaires.
ref: Similarly, while competition will improve the quality of research and education, this does not imply reduced public funding, a lower priority for basic research, or the elimination of scholarships.

cands: Both governments know that the stakes are too high for their economies, and Obama and Hu will continue to make every effort to move things forward in a
inp: Les deux gouvernements savent que les enjeux sont trop élevés pour leurs économies, et Obama et Hu continueront de fournir tous les efforts nécessaires pour faire avancer les choses de façon constructive.
ref: Both governments know the stakes are too high for both economies, and Obama and Hu will continue to work hard to try to keep things moving in a constructive direction.

cands: A recent UNICEF survey of 126 countries shows that a significant number of low- and middle-income countries are expected to reduce their public expenditures in 2010
inp: Une récente enquête de l’UNICEF portant sur 126 pays montre qu’un nombre significatif de pays aux revenus faibles à moyens devraient réduire leurs dépenses publiques en 2010-2011.
ref: A recent UNICEF survey of 126 countries shows that a significant number of low- and middle-income countries are expected to reduce public expenditures in 2010-2011.

cands: This combination of high-yielding seeds, fertilizer and irrigation is not magic.
inp: Cette association de semences à fort rendement, d’engrais et d’irrigation n’a rien de magique.
ref: There is nothing magic about this combination of high-yield seeds, fertilizer, and small-scale irrigation.

cands: However, what appealed to the outside world was not always an advantage at the heart of Israel's rugged and collapsing policy.
inp: Toutefois, ce qui plaisait au monde extérieur ne constituait pas toujours un avantage au coeur de la rudesse et de l'effondrement de la politique israélienne.
ref: Yet what appealed to the outside world was not always an asset in the rough and tumble of Israeli politics.

cands: Many government ministers, and many representatives of the Bank and NGOs, have experienced his direct criticism and warm praise.
inp: Bien des ministres de gouvernement, et bien des représentants de la Banque et des ONG, ont fait l'expérience de ses critiques directes ainsi que de ses louanges chaleureuses.
ref: Many a government minister, Bank officer and NGO representative has experienced his blunt criticism, as well as his effusive praise.

cands: But, unlike Yukos, the amounts claimed do not exceed the company’s cash, and the company’s existence is therefore not threat
inp: Mais contrairement à ce qui s’est passé pour Ioukos, les sommes réclamées ne dépassent pas l’encaisse de la société, dont l’existence n’est donc pas menacée.
ref: In contrast to Yukos, the claim does not exceed the company’s cash on hand and so poses no threat to its existence.

cands: Most physicians in North America and Europe do not see a single case of vitamin A deficiency in their entire careers.
inp: La plupart des médecins d’Amérique du Nord et d’Europe ne voient pas un seul cas de carence en vitamine A de toute leur carrière.
ref: Most physicians in North America and Europe never see a single case of vitamin A deficiency in their professional lifetimes.

cands: Some argue that membership in TCM II should be seen as a long-term proposal - perhaps until 2010 - to the advantage of candidates.
inp: Certains soutiennent que l'adhésion au MTC II doit être considérée comme une proposition à long terme - sans doute jusqu'en 2010 - à l'avantage des candidats.
ref: Some argue that ERM II membership should be viewed as a longer-term proposition - possibly lasting until 2010 - for the benefit of candidates themselves.

cands: Entrepreneurs like Teamlease’s Manish Sabharwal, and Flipkart’s Binny and Sachin Bansal, are fundamentally changing
inp: Des entrepreneurs comme Manish Sabharwal de Teamlease, et Binny et Sachin Bansal de Flipkart, une boutique en ligne, sont fondamentalement en train de changer la façon de conduire les affaires en Inde.
ref: Entrepreneurs like Manish Sabharwal of Teamlease, and Binny and Sachin Bansal of Flipkart, an online retailer, are fundamentally changing the way India does business.

cands: Cuba must regain its place among the regional powers, but it must also accept the rules of the game.
inp: Cuba doit retrouver sa place parmi les puissances régionales mais aussi accepter les règles du jeu.
ref: Cuba needs to return to the regional concert of powers, but it must accept this concert’s rules.

cands: One of the most important of these priorities is education.
inp: Parmi ces priorités, une des plus importantes est l’éducation.
ref: Among these priorities, one of the most important is education.

cands: For example, to make his threats of interest rate hikes credible in the context of a global economic slowdown, the ECB President uses press
inp: Par exemple, pour rendre ses menaces de hausse des taux d’intérêt crédibles dans le contexte d’un ralentissement économique global, le président de la BCE profite des conférences de presse pour dire au monde à quel point la croissance européenne est forte.
ref: For example, to make his threats of an interest-rate hike in the midst of a global slowdown credible, the ECB president is using his press conferences to tell the world how strong European growth is.

cands: It is therefore important that European leaders face two challenges.
inp: Il importe donc que les dirigeants européens relèvent deux défis.
ref: European leaders must therefore take up two challenges.

cands: One cannot help but wonder how Europe’s political leaders have embarked on this wrong path.
inp: On ne peut s’empêcher de se demander comment les dirigeants politiques européens se sont engagés sur cette mauvaise pente.
ref: One cannot help but wonder how thoughtlessly Europe’s politicians have started down this slippery slope.

cands: Many European countries, as well as Australia, Canada, Israel and New Zealand, have passed legislation creating a "public right of loan" - that is,
inp: De nombreux pays européens, ainsi que l’Australie, le Canada, Israël et la Nouvelle Zélande, ont adopté une loi qui crée un « droit public de prêt  » - c’est à dire que le gouvernement a admis que permettre à des centaines de personnes de lire un exemplaire d’un livre constitue un bien public, mais que cela entrainera probablement une baisse des ventes pour cet ouvrage.
ref: Many European countries, as well as Australia, Canada, Israel, and New Zealand, have adopted legislation that creates a “public lending right” – that is, the government recognizes that enabling hundreds of people to read a single copy of a book provides a public good, but that doing so is likely to reduce sales of the book.

cands: Britain has continued to support EU enlargement, closer ties with Turkey and development in Africa, but has not launched any original initiatives to gain
inp: La Grande-Bretagne a continué d'appuyer l'élargissement de l’UE, le resserrement des liens avec la Turquie et le développement en Afrique, mais elle n'a lancé aucune initiative originale pour obtenir l'appui d'autres états membres ou pour orienter le débat de l’UE.
ref: Britain has continued to support EU enlargement, closer links with Turkey, and development in Africa, but it has not launched any creative initiatives to bring other member states along or change the terms of the EU debate.

cands: The Republican finalist should have the wisdom to incorporate the best ideas of his opponents into his program, and to join the best members of their teams.
inp: Le finaliste Républicain devrait avoir la sagesse d’incorporer à son programme les meilleures idées de ses opposants, et de s’adjoindre les meilleurs membres de leurs équipes.
ref: The eventual nominee would be wise to incorporate his opponents’ best ideas and top people into his campaign.

cands: In the era of global media and international criminal justice, the criteria for states to use force are of unprecedented complexity.
inp: A l’ère de la mondialisation des médias et de la justice pénale internationale, les critères permettant aux Etats d’employer la force sont d’une complexité sans précédent.
ref: Moreover, in an era of global media and international war crimes courts, the criteria for states’ use of military force have become more complex than ever.

cands: It is therefore vital to deal with this problem and not to ignore it or criminalise it.
inp: Il est donc vital de traiter ce problème et de ne pas l'ignorer ni le criminaliser.
ref: The issue must be addressed, not ignored and criminalized.

cands: Concrete action should be taken if disillusionment is to be avoided.
inp: Une action concrète devrait être entreprise si l’on ne veut provoquer une désillusion.
ref: A failure to take concrete action would risk breeding disillusionment.

cands: Only an imperial Russia would, however, dare to reabsorb Ukraine.
inp: Seule une Russie impériale oserait toutefois réabsorber l'Ukraine.
ref: Only an imperial Russia, however, would dare reabsorb Ukraine.

cands: At this stage, only a few additional technical steps and a political decision in this direction are sufficient for a state to become a nuclear power.
inp: A ce stade, seules quelques étapes techniques supplémentaires et une décision politique en ce sens suffisent pour qu’un État devienne une puissance nucléaire.
ref: From here, then, all that is required to become a nuclear power are a few small technical steps and political leaders’ decision to take them.

cands: But, for that to happen, a new programme for Russia must be developed this year.
inp: Mais, pour que cela se produise, un nouveau programme pour la Russie doit être développé cette année.
ref: But, in order for that to happen, a new agenda for Russia must be developed this year.

cands: The countries of the Mediterranean basin are at a more advanced stage, the outline of a partnership is already in place.
inp: Les pays du bassin méditerranéen en sont à un stade plus avancé, l'esquisse d'un partenariat est déjà en place.
ref: The situation in the Mediterranean region is at a more advanced stage.

cands: PARIS – One quarter of the world’s population lives in fragile states and/or conflict-affected areas.
inp: PARIS – Le quart de la population de la planète vit dans des Etats fragiles et/ou dans des zones affectés par des conflits.
ref: PARIS – Today, roughly one-quarter of the world’s population lives in conflict-affected and fragile states.

cands: The energy future of nine billion people – the world’s population by the middle of this century – is not based on fossil fuels or nuclear energy,
inp: L’avenir énergétique de neuf milliards de personnes – la population mondiale vers le milieu du siècle présent – ne repose pas sur les combustibles fossiles ou l’énergie nucléaire, mais sur les énergies renouvelables et des améliorations draconiennes de l’efficacité énergétique.
ref: The energy future of nine billion people, which is what the world population will be in the middle of the century, lies neither in fossil fuels nor in nuclear energy, but in renewable energy sources and dramatic improvements in energy efficiency.

cands: In the name of the principle of subsidiarity, wherever possible, decision-making power must be placed closest to the citizens.
inp: Au nom du principe de "subsidiarité", chaque fois que cela est possible le pouvoir de décision doit être placé au plus près des citoyens.
ref: This is the principle of ``subsidiarity'' which supports placing decision-making power, wherever and whenever possible, in governmental bodies nearest to the individual citizen.

cands: The savings rates are far too low.
inp: Les taux d'épargne beaucoup trop bas.
ref: America's appallingly low savings rate.

cands: At present, the best thing to do is to stop investing in the coal industry.
inp: À l’heure actuelle, la meilleure chose à faire consiste à cesser les investissements dans l’industrie du charbon.
ref: Right now, ending investment in the coal industry is the right thing to do.

cands: Although the enlargement to the east of the European Union has not yet taken place, the subject of the debate is already moving to focus on what
inp: Bien que l'agrandissement vers l'est de l'Union européenne n'ait pas encore eu lieu, l'objet du débat se déplace déjà pour se centrer sur ce qui va suivre : à quel moment les nouveaux membres, majoritairement postcommunistes, devront-ils adopter l'euro ?
ref: Although the EU's eastward enlargement has not yet happened, the debate is already shifting to ask what will follow: when should the new, predominantly postcommunist, members adopt the euro?

cands: What a change since the collapse of communism in 1989!
inp: Quel changement depuis l'effondrement du communisme en 1989 !
ref: What a distance Poland has travelled since communism's collapse in 1989!

cands: The visit will, however, highlight different characteristics of this bilateral relationship.
inp: La visite mettra néanmoins en lumière différentes caractéristiques de cette relation bilatérale.
ref: Nonetheless, the visit will highlight several important features of the bilateral relationship.

cands: Energy derived from the fission of uranium and plutonium atoms was originally used to design the ultimate weapon, the atomic bomb.
inp: L’énergie dérivée de la fission des atomes d’uranium et de plutonium a été utilisée à l’origine pour concevoir l’arme ultime, la bombe atomique.
ref: The energy derived from splitting uranium and plutonium atoms was originally used for the ultimate weapon, the atomic bomb.

cands: On either side, large majorities, two-thirds or even three-quarters of the population, would accept Israel's return to its pre-
inp: De chaque côté, de grosses majorités, les deux-tiers ou les trois-quarts mêmes des populations, accepteraient qu'Israël revienne à ses frontières d'avant 1967 en échange d'une paix réelle.
ref: Large majorities on both sides--perhaps two-thirds or even three-fourths of each population--would accept a return by Israel to something like its pre-1967 borders in exchange for real peace.

cands: Unfortunately, like many international agreements, the Convention on Biological Diversity remains largely ignored, unchallenged and inadequate.
inp: Malheureusement, à l’instar de beaucoup d’accords internationaux, la convention sur la diversité biologique reste pour l’essentiel ignorée, non défendue et inaccomplie.
ref: Unfortunately, like so many other international agreements, the Convention on Biological Diversity remains essentially unknown, un-championed, and unfulfilled.

cands: It is full of technical vague terms on monitoring, binding clauses, countries in or outside Annex 1, and a lot of legal jargon,
inp: Elle est jonchée de termes techniques abscons sur le suivi, les clauses contraignantes, les pays appartenant ou non à l’annexe 1, et d’une masse de jargon juridique, sans avoir pour autant donné à l’humanité le langage lui permettant de discuter de sa propre survie.
ref: It is littered with technical arcana about monitoring, binding obligations, annex-I and non-annex-I countries, and thousands of other legalisms, but has failed to give humanity the language to discuss our own survival.

cands: But it should not be only Estonians, Latvians and Lithuanians who feel this discomfort.
inp: Mais les Estoniens, les Lettons et les Lituaniens ne devraient pas être les seuls Européens à ressentir ce sentiment de gêne.
ref: But Estonians, Latvians, and Lithuanians are not the only Europeans who should feel this way.

cands: But the international community must be more respectful of Iran’s current industrial objectives if it is to ensure its cooperation.
inp: Mais la communauté internationale doit être plus respectueuse des objectifs industriels actuels de l’Iran si elle veut s’assurer de sa coopération.
ref: But the international community must be more respectful of Iran’s current industrial aims if it wants Iranian cooperation.

cands: Last year, the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) published a remarkable report on the Ogoniland, an important eth
inp: L'année dernière, le programme des Nations unies pour l'environnement (PNUE) a publié un rapport remarquable sur l'Ogoniland, région ethnique importante du delta du Niger qui est à l'épicentre d'un conflit entre les communautés locales et les grandes compagnies pétrolières.
ref: Last year, the United Nations Environment Program (UNEP) issued a remarkable report on Ogoniland, a major ethnic homeland in the Niger Delta that has been at the epicenter of conflict between local communities and international oil.

cands: But America would do better to get used to this kind of trickery.
inp: Mais l’Amérique ferait mieux de s’habituer à ce genre de jeu de ficelles.
ref: But America had better get used to these types of diplomatic cat’s cradles.

cands: The current Tibetan governor acknowledged that some of last year’s demonstrators were not "satisfied with [their] measures"
inp: Le gouverneur actuel du Tibet a reconnu que certains des manifestants de l’an dernier n’étaient pas « satisfaits par [leurs] mesures » sans pour autant les qualifier d’ennemis de l’état. La Chine concédait alors pour la première fois que les manifestations pouvaient être liées à l’impopularité de ses mesures.
ref: A retired prefectural governor from Kardze told the Singapore paperZaobao that “the government should have more trust in its people, particularly the Tibetan monks,” and the current Tibet governor admitted that some protesters last year “weren’t satisfied with our policies,” rather than calling them enemies of the state, the first official concession from within China that some of its policies might be connected to the recent protests.

cands: But while such weapons have political weight, the science on which they are based is banal and old.
inp: Mais alors que de telles armes ont un poids politique, la science sur laquelle elles reposent est banale et ancienne.
ref: But while such weapons carry political weight, the science behind them is mundane and old.

cands: In a world of conflict, development efforts are still insufficient.
inp: Dans un monde éprouvé par les conflits, les efforts de développement sont toujours insuffisants.
ref: In a world roiled by conflict, development efforts will always fall short.

cands: As the 90th anniversary of the movement approaches, China has made great scientific advances, but it still has a long way to go in terms of demo
inp: Alors que le 90° anniversaire de ce mouvement approche, la Chine a certes réalisé de grandes avancées scientifiques, mais elle a encore un long chemin à parcourir en terme de démocratie.
ref: As the 90th anniversary approaches, China has made great strides in science, but still has a long way to go in terms of democracy.

cands: Many Israelis, from all walks of life, joined the campaign for the release of Gilad Shalit, and demonstrations and meetings were held
inp: De nombreux Israéliens, toutes classes sociales confondues, se sont joints à la campagne pour la libération de Gilad Shalit. Des manifestations et des réunions ont été organisées.
ref: Many Israelis, from all social classes, joined the campaign for Shalit’s release.

cands: Today, the world seems to be entering a period when not hundreds, but at least dozens of Weltpolitiks are pursued by both the major
inp: Aujourd’hui, le monde semble entrer dans une période où non pas des centaines, mais au moins des dizaines de Weltpolitik sont poursuivies tant par les grandes puissances que les puissances émergeantes.
ref: Today, the world seems to be entering a period when, if not a hundred, at least a dozen varieties of Weltpolitik are being pursued by great and emerging powers alike.

cands: We left Saudi Arabia where my father worked as a teacher, and returned to Palestine in 1996.
inp: Nous avons quitté l'Arabie Saoudite où mon père travaillait comme enseignant, pour retourner en Palestine en 1996.
ref: We returned to Palestine in 1996 from Saudi Arabia, where my father had been working as a teacher.

cands: We also know that the impact of climate change will not be felt equally everywhere in the world.
inp: Nous savons également que l’impact du changement climatique ne se fera pas sentir de manière égale partout dans le monde.
ref: We also know that the impact of climate change will not be evenly distributed across the globe.

cands: The United Nations is torn by internal tensions.
inp: L'ONU est déchirée par des tensions internes.
ref: The United Nations is torn apart by internal tensions.

cands: The Chinese government has been unable to make any progress in the area of economic development, and has been unable to implement the reforms that it has been
inp: Après tout, si le système politique chinois peut encore être qualifié de socialiste, c’est au mieux “un socialisme à la chinoise” qui incarne une augmentation de l’activité économique orientée vers le marché et une plus grande ouverture et transparence économique.
ref: After all, if China’s political system can still be called socialism, it is at best “socialism with Chinese characteristics,” which embodies an increasing amount of market-oriented economic activity and greater economic openness and transparency.

cands: Immediate solution!"
inp: Solution immédiate ! »
ref: Solution now!”

cands: The more the US defies the inevitable expansion of China’s “security perimeter,” the better Russia will do, or so Kreml
inp: Plus les Etats-Unis défient l’inévitable expansion du « périmètre de sécurité » de la Chine, mieux la Russie s’en portera, ou du moins c’est ce que semblent croire les stratégistes du Kremlin.
ref: The more the US challenges the inevitable expansion of China’s “security perimeter,” the better for Russia, or so the Kremlin’s strategists appear to believe.

cands: The fact that we have kept the pound does not mean that we are opposed to the euro or that we want it to fail.
inp: Le fait que nous ayons conservé la livre ne signifie pas que nous sommes opposés à l'euro ou que nous souhaitions son échec.
ref: Keeping the pound does not mean that we oppose the Euro, or hope for its failure.

cands: Becoming a leader requires much more than enormous economic and military power.
inp: Devenir un chef de file requiert bien plus qu’un énorme pouvoir économique et militaire.
ref: Leadership entails more than the possession of enormous economic and military power.

cands: In the supposedly “radical” interpretation, the relationship between Israel and the Palestinians is rarely seen as a conflict between two groups with sometimes tragically
inp: Dans la supposée interprétation “radicale”, la relation entre Israël et les Palestiniens est rarement vue comme un conflit entre deux groupes avec des intérêts parfois tragiquement opposés.
ref: In the putatively “radical” interpretation, the relationship between Israel and the Palestinians is rarely seen as a conflict between two groups with sometimes tragically opposed interests.

cands: The partnership with the East is based on the deep values of democracy, human rights and the rule of law.
inp: Le partenariat avec l'est est basé sur les valeurs profondes de la démocratie, des droits de l'homme et des règles de droit.
ref: The Eastern Partnership is based on the profound values of democracy, human rights, and the rule of law.

cands: WASHINGTON, DC – As the 2015 deadline for the Millennium Development Goals approaches, the United Nations is stepping up its efforts to facilitate
inp: WASHINGTON, DC – À l’approche de la date butoir de 2015 des Objectifs du Millénaire pour le développement, les Nations Unies intensifient leurs efforts pour faciliter les débats sur ce que devrait devenir la promotion du développement mondial.
ref: WASHINGTON, DC – As the 2015 target date for the Millennium Development Goals approaches, the United Nations is intensifying its efforts to foster debate about what comes next for promotion of development worldwide.

cands: It is strange, however, to see that your senses are not giving way to this macabre and terrifying universe.
inp: Il est cependant étrange de constater que vos sens ne cèdent aucun terrain à cet univers macabre et terrifiant.
ref: But what is strange is that your senses are not dulled by this dead and dreadful world.

cands: The US administration tends to view the World Bank as an extension of US foreign policy and trade interests.
inp: L’administration américaine a tendance à considérer la Banque mondiale comme une extension de la politique étrangère et des intérêts commerciaux des Etats-Unis.
ref: American officials have traditionally viewed the World Bank as an extension of United States foreign policy and commercial interests.

cands: When the rich become less rich, the poor become even poorer.
inp: Quand les riches deviennent moins riches, les pauvres deviennent encore plus pauvres.
ref: When the rich get less rich, the poor get poorer.

cands: More likely, America will do well than badly – here a new small measure for students struggling to survive and homeowners on the brink of seiz
inp: Plus probablement, l'Amérique va s'en tirer tant bien que mal - ici une nouvelle  petite mesure pour les étudiants qui se débattent pour survivre et pour les propriétaires de maison qui se retrouvent au bord de la saisie ; là, la fin des baisses d'impôts de l'ère Bush en faveur des millionnaires. Mais pas de réforme globale de la fiscalité, pas plus que de sérieuses coupes dans le budget de la défense ou de progrès significatifs dans la lutte contre le réchauffement climatique.
ref: Americans should hope for all of this, though I am not sanguine that they will get much of it.& More likely, America will muddle through – here another little program for struggling students and homeowners, there the end of the Bush tax cuts for millionaires, but no wholesale tax reform, serious cutbacks in defense spending, or significant progress on global warming.

cands: If the IIGS countries cannot use inflation, growth, devaluation or savings to solve their problems, Plan A will fail.
inp: Si les pays du PIIGS ne peuvent avoir recours ni à l'inflation, ni à la croissance ni à la dévaluation ni à l'épargne pour résoudre leur problème, le plan A ne peut qu'échouer.
ref: If the PIIGS can’t inflate, grow, devalue, or save their way out of their problems, Plan A is either failing or is bound to fail.

cands: The United Nations is there to protect states from unlawful behaviour, including by the United States.
inp: Or, les Nations unies sont là pour protéger les États contre les comportements hors-la-loi, y compris des États-Unis.
ref: But the UN exists to protect all states from lawless behavior, including by the US.

cands: Yukos autopsy.
inp: Autopsie de Ioukos
ref: A Yukos Autopsy

cands: The decline in confidence has therefore had real economic consequences.
inp: La baisse de confiance a donc eu de véritables conséquences économiques.
ref: So falling trust had real economic consequences.

cands: The nature of suffering across the globe hardly justifies such a narrow strategy.
inp: La nature des souffrances à travers la planète ne justifie guère une stratégie aussi étroite.
ref: The nature of suffering around the world hardly justifies this narrow strategy.

cands: It seems that restoring confidence in the Federal Reserve and the SEC [the US stock market policeman] is more important than restoring confidence in Citybank or
inp: Il semble que régénérer la confiance dans la Réserve fédérale et dans la SEC [le gendarme de la Bourse américain] est plus important que régénérer la confiance dans la Citybank ou dans AIG.
ref: It would seem that rebuilding confidence in the Federal Reserve and the Securities and Exchange Commission is economically more important than rebuilding trust in Citibank or AIG.

cands: In Britain, where many minors were unemployed, the expansion of the automotive and engineering industries was hampered by a lack of
inp: En Grande Bretagne, où un grand nombre de mineurs étaient au chômage, l’expansion des industries automobile et de l’ingénierie fut freinée par le manque de mécaniciens compétents.
ref: In Britain, where coalminers were unemployed in large numbers, the expansion of the motor-vehicle and engineering industries was hindered by a shortage of skilled mechanics.

cands: The expected cost of the flux inducing fixed annual costs was $800 billion, but the amount of damage avoided by this approach was only $685 billion.
inp: Le coût escompté du flux induit des coûts annuels fixes s’élevaient à 800 milliards de dollars, mais le montant des dommages évités par cette approche ne s’élevait qu’à 685 milliards de dollars.
ref: The discounted cost of the resulting stream of fixed annual costs totaled $800 billion, but damages avoided by this approach amounted to a discounted value of only $685 billion.

cands: Although rice plants do not normally synthesize beta-carotene in the endosperm (seeds), they do so in the
inp: Bien que les plants de riz ne synthétisent ordinairement pas le béta-carotène dans l’endosperme (les graines), ils le font dans les parties vertes de la plante.
ref: Although rice plants do not normally synthesize beta-carotene in the endosperm (seeds), they do make it in the green portions of the plant.

cands: Together with Mohamed ben Zayed ben Sultan, the Crown Prince of the Al Nahyan family in Abu Dhabi, we attach great importance to the
inp: De concert avec Mohamed ben Zayed ben Sultan, le Prince héritier de la famille Al Nahyan d’Abu Dhabi, nous attachons une grande importance au premier sommet mondial, qui se tiendra à Abu Dhabi, et qui vise à assurer que tous les enfants aient accès à tous les avantages que les vaccins peuvent procurer.
ref: Along with Mohamed bin Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan, Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi, we attach great importance to the world’s first global summit, being held this week in Abu Dhabi, aimed at ensuring that all children have access to the full benefits of vaccines.

cands: This is the only possible basis for transatlantic relations, for the enlarged EU and for relations between the 'old' and the 'new' Europe
inp: C'est le seul fondement possible des relations transatlantiques, de l'UE élargie et des relations entre la "vieille" et la "nouvelle" Europe.
ref: They are the only possible bedrock in transatlantic relations, in an expanded Union, and in relations between the ``New'' and ``Old'' Europe.

cands: A bomb in each reactor.
inp: Une bombe dans chaque réacteur
ref: A Bomb in Every Reactor

cands: Meanwhile, even though France is losing its relative power over Germany on economic issues, it still plays a decisive role in foreign policy.
inp: Pendant ce temps, même si la France est en train de perdre son pouvoir relatif par rapport à l’Allemagne sur les questions économiques, elle joue encore un rôle décisif en politique étrangère.
ref: Meanwhile, as France experiences a loss of power relative to Germany on economic issues, it continues to play a decisive role in foreign policy.

cands: Sustainable and moderate inflation would help to lower real property values more quickly, and potentially allow German wages to rise more easily than those
inp: Une inflation durable et modérée aiderait à faire baisser la valeur réelle de l'immobilier plus rapidement, et potentiellement permettre plus facilement aux salaires allemands d’augmenter plus vite que ceux des pays périphériques.
ref: Sustained moderate inflation would help to bring down the real value of real estate more quickly, and potentially make it easier for German wages to rise faster than those in peripheral countries.

cands: The German tricolour flag – black, red and gold – is flying throughout the country as never before, but with almost no nationalist connotations
inp: Le drapeau tricolore allemand – noir, rouge et or – flotte partout dans le pays, comme jamais auparavant, mais presque sans aucune connotation nationaliste.
ref: The black, red, and gold German tricolor adorns the entire country as never before, but almost nowhere are there nationalist undertones.

cands: After he came to power, the AKP leaders, former Islamists who reinvented themselves as "conservative democrats," put all their energy into
inp: Après son arrivée au pouvoir, les leaders de l'AKP, d'anciens islamistes qui se réinventèrent sous l'étiquette de « démocrates conservateurs », ont mis toute leur énergie dans des négociations avec les États-Unis, l'UE et l'ONU sur des sujets aussi variés que Chypre et l'Irak, les droits linguistiques des Kurdes et d'autres questions de Droits de l'homme propre à la Turquie.
ref: After coming to power, the AKP's leaders, former Islamists who had reinvented themselves as "conservative democrats," energetically engaged with the US, the EU, and the UN on issues ranging from Cyprus to Iraq, from Kurdish language rights to other human rights issues within Turkey.

cands: The conference will also have to consider re-establishing the International Monetary Fund to better reflect the new hierarchy of countries and to review its operation
inp: Cette conférence devra aussi réfléchir à la refondation du Fond Monétaire International afin qu’il reflète mieux la nouvelle hiérarchie des pays et pour revoir ses méthodes opérationnelles.
ref: It would also have to reconstitute the International Monetary Fund to reflect better the prevailing pecking order among states and to revise its methods of operation.

cands: In a less turbulent time than today, no one was offended by Queen Beatrix’s speech, such as that delivered at Christmas when she advocated
inp: A une époque moins agitée qu'aujourd'hui, personne ne s'offusquait du discours de la reine Beatrix, tel celui qu'elle a prononcé à Noël quand elle a plaidé pour la tolérance et "le respect des minorités".
ref: In less feverish times than these, no one could possibly have taken exception to Queen Beatrix’s speech last Christmas, when she pleaded for tolerance and “respect for minorities.”

cands: The current Republican governors are proposing similar and equally innovative state-level solutions – for example, on spending, debt and unfunded retirement and
inp: Les Gouverneurs républicains actuellement en poste proposent des solutions similaires tout aussi innovantes au niveau de l’état – par exemple, en matière de dépense, d’endettement et de pensions de retraite et de garanties de santé non financées – comme modèles pour le pays.
ref: The current cohort of Republican governors offers similarly innovative state-level solutions – for example, on spending, debt, and unfunded pension and health liabilities – as models for the country.

cands: Or at least to consider perhaps a completely different question: what would be a reasonable future for the European Union?
inp: Ou tout au moins de considérer peut-être une question entièrement différente : que serait un futur raisonnable pour l'Union européenne ?
ref: Or at least, to consider perhaps a quite different question: where would it be reasonable for the EU to move?

cands: In terms of the deployment capacity of the military, the number of military bases and allied agreements in Asia, no power or combination of power
inp: En terme de capacité de déploiement de la force militaire, du nombre de bases militaires et d’accords alliés en Asie, aucune puissance ni combinaison de puissances n’est réellement à même de se comparer aux Etats-Unis dans le prochain quart de siècle.
ref: In terms of power-projection force capabilities or the range of military bases and security allies in Asia, no power or combination of powers is likely to match the US in the next quarter-century.

cands: Others may simply not know how to follow suit.
inp: D’autres ne savent peut-être simplement pas comment suivre l’exemple.
ref: Still others may simply be unaware of how to precisely follow suit.

cands: But, while this scenario has some truth to it, any break would certainly be very traumatic, causing the euro to plummet before it recovers its
inp: Mais alors que ce scénario a un certain accent de la vérité, toute rupture serait certainement très traumatisante, causant un plongeon de l'euro avant qu’il ne recouvre sa valeur de base.
ref: But, while this scenario has a certain ring of truth, surely any breakup would be highly traumatic, with the euro diving before its rump form recovered.

cands: It can finance all this with the help of Venezuela’s public oil company, implementing attractive social policies in the short term but lacking long-term insight
inp: Elle peut financer tout cela avec l’aide de la compagnie pétrolière publique du Venezuela, en mettant en œuvre des politiques sociales attrayantes à court terme mais peu perspicaces à long terme, en particulier si elles sont menées par des médecins, des enseignants et des instructeurs cubains.
ref: It can finance all of this with the support of Venezuela’s state oil company, implementing social policies that are misguided over the long term but seductive in the short run, especially when carried out by Cuban doctors, teachers, and instructors.

cands: Russia, despite Siberia's immense oil and gas wealth, is not even investing enough to support healthy growth in its energy industries,
inp: La Russie, malgré les richesses immenses en pétrole et en gaz de la Sibérie, n'investit même pas assez pour soutenir une croissance saine dans ses industries énergétiques, encore moins le développement humain dans les régions pauvres du pays (y compris l'infortunée Sibérie).
ref: Russia, despite Siberia’s massive oil and gas riches, isn’t even investing enough to support healthy growth in its energy industries, much less human development in the country’s impoverished areas (including hapless Siberia).

cands: The Chinese government has been unable to prevent the rise of the Taliban in the past few years.
inp: NEW YORK – La Chine a survécu, sans grandes manifestations, au 50e anniversaire du soulèvement tibétain manqué de 1959 contre la tutelle chinoise.
ref: NEW YORK – China has survived the 50th anniversary of the failed uprising by Tibetans against Chinese rule in 1959 without major protests.

cands: I started my career at China Youth Daily in 1979, and I witnessed the whole process of opening up and reforming China.
inp: J’ai commencé ma carrière auChina Youth Dailyen 1979, et j’ai été témoin de l’ensemble du processus d’ouverture et de réforme de la Chine.
ref: I started my career with China Youth Dailyin 1979 and have experienced the whole process of China’s opening up and reformation.

cands: A Long Walk with China
inp: Une longue marche avec la Chine
ref: A Long March with China

cands: The US has been a major player in the global economy since the 1970’s, and has been a major contributor to the global economy since the 1990’
inp: Pour atteindre son but, elle préfère insister sur son “essence,” faisant ainsi contrepoids au côté “acteur” cher à Sarkozy.
ref: To achieve her goal, she prefers to emphasize her “essence,” thereby countering Sarkozy’s stress on his record as a “doer.”

cands: Yet, upon his arrival in Scotland, the Pope was attacked by a multitude of sympathizers, both Catholic and non-Catho
inp: Pourtant, dès son arrivée en Ecosse, le Pape s’est vu assailli par une foule de sympathisants, catholiques et non-catholiques confondus.
ref: But, from the moment that the Pope arrived in Scotland, he was overwhelmed by enthusiastic crowds of well-wishers, Catholic and non-Catholic alike.

cands: Their governments have not only followed "fundamental" goods (such as macroeconomic stability and openness to the outside world), but also
inp: Leurs gouvernements n’ont pas seulement suivi de bons « fondamentaux » (comme une stabilité macroéconomique et une ouverture sur l'extérieur), mais aussi ce qu’on pourrait appeler des mesures « productivistes » : devises sous-évaluées, politiques industrielles et contrôles financiers.
ref: Their governments pursued not just good “fundamentals” (e.g., macroeconomic stability and an outward orientation), but also what might be called “productivist” policies: undervalued currencies, industrial policies, and financial controls.

cands: The “divergence” was very pronounced during the colonial era.
inp: Cette « divergence » était très prononcée pendant l'époque coloniale.
ref: This “divergence” was very pronounced in colonial times.

cands: Giovanni Bisignani, General Manager of the International Air Transport Association, an industry group, criticised the closure of airports, arguing that no risk
inp: Giovanni Bisignani, directeur général de l’Association internationale du transport aérien, un groupe industriel, a critiqué la fermeture des aéroports, argumentant qu’aucune évaluation des risques n’avait été entreprise.
ref: Giovanni Bisignani, the head of the International Air Transport Association, an industry group, criticized the shutdown, saying that no risk assessment had been undertaken.

cands: Worse, discretionary spending outside of defence includes programs that are essential to economic growth – and economic growth is essential to America’s future prosper
inp: Pire encore, les dépenses discrétionnaires hors défense comprennent des programmes qui sont indispensables à la croissance économique – et la croissance économique est indispensable à la prospérité future et au positionnement global de l’Amérique.
ref: Worse yet, discretionary non-defense spending includes programs that are indispensable for economic growth – and economic growth is indispensable for America’s future prosperity and global standing.

cands: Symbolically situated between modernity and tradition, secularism and Islam, democracy and tyranny, Turkey is also physically a bridge
inp: Symboliquement située entre modernité et tradition, laïcité et islam, démocratie et tyrannie, la Turquie est aussi physiquement un pont entre l’orient et l’occident.
ref: Situated figuratively between modernity and tradition, secularism and Islam, and democracy and tyranny, Turkey also is an actual physical bridge between East and West.

cands: We know that the challenge is great, but the game is worth the stakes and Europe must understand that this is our objective.
inp: Nous savons que le défi est grand mais le jeu en vaut la chandelle et l’Europe doit comprendre que c’est là notre objectif.
ref: We know the challenge is great, but the prize is worth the struggle, and Europe should know that this is our goal.

cands: In particular, however, few had predicted that the Arctic ice cap would melt as quickly as it is evidently doing now.
inp: Toutefois, peu avaient notamment prédit que la calotte glaciaire de l’Arctique fonderait aussi vite qu’à l’heure actuelle, manifestement.
ref: But few saw, for instance, the Artic ice cap melting as rapidly as now seems to be the case.

cands: Former Czech President Václav Havel and enlightened international celebrities, who have joined forces in defence of the idea of a union of
inp: L’ancien Président tchèque Václav Havel et des célébrités internationales éclairées, groupées dans la défense de l’idée d’une union de la région autour de l’eau, également.
ref: So, too, have former Czech president Václav Havel and a group of global luminaries who support the idea of regional integration through water.

cands: But his term will end next year and he cannot be reappointed.
inp: Mais son mandat prendra fin l'année prochaine et il ne pourra pas le renouveler.
ref: But his term ends next year and he cannot run again.

cands: There are ways to spend less money.
inp: Il existe pourtant des moyens de moins gaspiller.
ref: But there are ways to waste less.

cands: However, a new form of antitrust is emerging today – in the form of the Kanjorski amendment, which incorporates the terms of the
inp: Une nouvelle forme d’antitrust apparaît cependant aujourd’hui – sous la forme de l’amendement Kanjorski, dont les termes intègrent ceux du projet Dodd-Frank.
ref: Now, however, a new form of antitrust arrives – in the form of the Kanjorski Amendment, whose language was embedded in the Dodd-Frank bill.

cands: In an atmosphere of anxiety and uncertainty, policymakers must ensure that they communicate and coordinate their actions in a clear manner, avoid policies
inp: Dans le climat présent d’anxiété et d’incertitude, les décideurs doivent s’assurer de communiquer et de coordonner leurs actions de manière claire, éviter les politiques de « mendier chez le voisin » et résister aux tentations protectionnistes.
ref: In the current climate of anxiety and uncertainty, policymakers must ensure strong communication and coordination, avoid beggar-thy-neighbor policies, and guard against protectionism.

cands: Such actions are essential to the national security of States and to global efforts to mitigate these threats.
inp: De telles actions sont essentielles à la sécurité nationale des États et aux efforts mondiaux pour atténuer ces menaces.
ref: Such actions are crucial to these states’ national security and global efforts to mitigate threats.

cands: And it was the UN Security Council that brought the issue of Darfur to the ICC’s attention in 2005.
inp: Et c’est le Conseil de sécurité de l’ONU qui a porté la question du Darfour à l’attention de la CPI en 2005.
ref: And the Security Council referred the Darfur case to the Court in 2005.

cands: The same demands must be made of multinationals operating in poor countries, because they are more powerful than the governments of those countries, and can act
inp: Il faut avoir les mêmes exigences à l'égard des multinationales qui opèrent dans les pays pauvres, car plus puissantes que les gouvernements de ces pays, elles peuvent agir en toute impunité et détruire l'environnement sans guère avoir de compte à rendre.
ref: The same standards for environmental cleanup need to be applied to global companies operating in poorer countries, where their power has typically been so great relative to that of governments that many act with impunity, wreaking havoc on the environment with little or no accountability.

cands: Indeed, the men currently fighting to maintain the union are the infirm King Fahd (84 years old), his half-brother Crown Prince Abdullah (
inp: En effet, les hommes qui luttent actuellement pour maintenir l'union sont le roi infirme Fahd (84 ans), son demi-frère le prince héritier Abdullah (79 ans) et ses frères, le ministre de la Défense Sultan (78 ans) et le ministre de l'Intérieur Naif (75 ans).
ref: Indeed, the men now struggling to hold things together are the incapacitated King Fahd (84 years old), his half-brother Crown Prince Abdullah (79 years old), and his full brothers, Defence Minister Sultan (78 years old), and Interior Minister Naif (75 years old).

cands: The Nigerian pound was introduced with the establishment of the Central Bank of Nigeria in 1959.
inp: La livre nigériane fut introduite avec la création de la banque centrale du Nigeria en 1959.
ref: With the establishment of the Central Bank of Nigeria in 1959, the Nigerian pound was introduced.

cands: This deployment has been accompanied by an increase in armed violence against the police, the army and journalists, as well as
inp: Ce déploiement s’est accompagné d’un accroissement de la violence armée contre la police, l’armée et les journalistes ainsi que par des incursions dans la vie politique du pays et une diversification des revenus du crime par des enlèvements, des extorsion, des actes de piratage et le trafic d’hommes.
ref: This was accompanied by an increase in armed violence against the police, the military, and journalists, as well as by incursions into politics and diversification of criminal income through kidnappings, extortion, piracy, and human trafficking.

cands: The problem is that Turkey closed its borders precisely because of Nagorno-Karabakh, not for bilateral reasons.
inp: Le problème est que la Turquie a fermé ses frontières précisément à cause du Haut-Karabakh, et non pour des raisons bilatérales.
ref: The problem is that Turkey initially closed the border precisely because of Nagorno-Karabakh, rather than any bilateral issue.

cands: In addition to becoming the world’s industrial park, China now has more mobile phone users than the populations of the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada
inp: En plus d’être devenue le parc industriel du monde, la Chine possède dorénavant plus de détenteurs de téléphones portables que les populations des États-Unis, du Royaume-Uni, du Canada et de Nouvelle-Zélande réunies, et son nombre d’utilisateurs d’Internet vient juste de dépasser celui des États-Unis.
ref: In addition to having become the world’s industrial park, China now has more mobile phone subscribers than the combined populations of the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia and New Zealand, and the number of Internet users has just surpassed that in the US.

cands: Just as legislation does not do enough to address the problem of chronic and rising US budget deficits, the damage it will do to the economy in the
inp: De même que la législation n’en fait pas assez pour solutionner le problème des déficits budgétaires chroniques et en augmentation aux USA, le dommage qu’elle infligera à l’économie à court terme sera probablement limité.
ref: While the legislation does too little to address America’s problem of chronic and rising budget deficits, the damage that it inflicts on the economy in the short term is likely to be limited.

cands: Rajan, 50, will be the first RBI Governor born after the Republic declared independence in 1950.
inp: Rajan, 50 ans, sera le premier gouverneur de la RBI né après la déclaration d’indépendance de la république en 1950.
ref: Rajan, just 50, will be the first RBI governor born after India became a republic in 1950.

cands: But the European nation states will not disappear for some time, because they are centres of power.
inp: Mais les états-nations européens ne vont pas disparaître pendant un certain temps car ils constituent descentres de pouvoir.
ref: But Europe's nation states are not going to disappear for a while because they arecenters of power.

cands: The eurozone economy contracted in the last three months of 2011, even in Germany.
inp: L’économie de la zone euro s’est contractée les trois derniers mois de 2011 ; même celle de l’Allemagne.
ref: The eurozone’s economy contracted in the last three months of 2011; even Germany’s shrank.

cands: Since the ECB’s common monetary policy cannot respond to the macroeconomic problems of all member countries, the euro area countries need macroprudential regulations
inp: Comme la politique monétaire commune de la BCE ne peut répondre aux problèmes macro-économiques de tous les pays membres, il faut aux pays de la zone euro des régulations macro-prudentielles, visant à réduire la croissance excessive du crédit.
ref: As the ECB’s common monetary policy cannot fit the macroeconomic conditions of all the member countries, the eurozone countries need macro-prudential regulations that aim at reducing excessive credit growth.

cands: Would EFSF really reduce debt at discounted prices or would it simply provide guarantees to existing bondholders?
inp: L'EFSF réduirait-elle vraiment la dette à des prix escomptés ou ne ferait-elle qu'offrir des garanties aux détenteurs actuels d'obligations?
ref: Would the EFSF be retiring Greek debt at bargain prices or would it be providing insurance to current bondholders?

cands: Fortunately, their propaganda campaign was a failure.
inp: Heureusement, leur campagne de propagande fut un échec.
ref: Fortunately, their propaganda campaign has been a failure.

cands: There is probably some truth – and also some irony – in this view.
inp: Il y a sans doute une part de vrai – et également une certaine ironie – dans ce point de vue.
ref: There is probably some slight truth – and also a certain degree of irony – to this argument.

cands: BERLIN: As old horses return to the sound of the clearing, Cold War strategists feel their adrenaline levels rise as missile de
inp: BERLIN: Comme de vieux chevaux redevenant fringants au son du clairon, les stratèges de la Guerre Froide, sentent leur taux d’adrénaline augmenter tandis que la défense antimissiles revient à la une des journaux.
ref: BERLIN: Like old battle horses feeling young as the bugle sounds, Cold War strategists are feeling the adrenalin mount as missile defense becomes front page news.

cands: Although these statements were once again nothing more than a mere slander, they were nevertheless a new language for a Likud prime minister.
inp: Bien que ces déclarations ne s'apparentaient une fois encore qu'à un simple verbiage, elles n'en ont pas moins constitué un langage nouveau pour un premier ministre Likud.
ref: Although this was still merely verbiage, it was novel language for a Likud prime minister.

cands: The need for immediate action is clear.
inp: Le besoin d’intervenir immédiatement est clair.
ref: The need for immediate action is clear.

cands: But this motivation entails high social and economic costs, a motivation that is no longer within the remit of the IMF’s mandate.
inp: Mais cette motivation entraîne des coûts sociaux et économiques élevés, une motivation qui n'est plus du ressort du mandat du FMI.
ref: But there are high economic and social costs to this agenda, one that goes far beyond the IMF's mandate.

cands: The Arab League officials approved the proposal.
inp: Les officiels de la Ligue arabe ont approuvé cette proposition.
ref: Arab League officials approved the proposal.

cands: Moreover, the scope of the impact of managing this potential instability far exceeds Pyongyang.
inp: De plus, la portée des incidences de la gestion de cette potentielle instabilité dépasse largement Pyongyang.
ref: Moreover, responsibility for managing that potential instability extends far beyond the leadership in Pyongyang.

cands: But with the anti-Chinese demonstrations in Tibet in the past 12 months numbering more than 150, it does not seem fanciful to worry about
inp: Mais comme les manifestations tibétaines antichinoises de ces 12 derniers mois s'élèvent à plus de 150, il ne semble pas du tout fantaisiste de s’en inquiéter.
ref: But after more than 150 protests in Tibet against Chinese rule over the past 12 months, concerns about the area seem anything but fanciful.

cands: Politicians in all countries have understood the impact of the World Cup: winning a football match is part of a country’s "attractive power."
inp: Les hommes politiques de tous pays ont bien saisi l’impact de la Coupe du monde : remporter une victoire au football fait partie du « pouvoir attractif » d’un pays.
ref: Football success has become part of countries’ “soft power.”

cands: It is rare for a scientist to be a specialist in more than one field, as worlds and languages are different.
inp: Il est rare qu'un scientifique soit spécialiste en plus d'un domaine, tant les mondes et les langages sont différents.
ref: Rarely is a scientist an expert in more than one area, because the worlds and languages are so different.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a decade.
inp: BRASILIA –"Le Brésil est un pays pacifique et le restera", c'est là sans doute un truisme pour les Brésiliens.
ref: BRASILIA – It is, perhaps, a truism for Brazil’s citizens that their country is and always will be a peaceful one.

cands: It is certainly full of gaps that need to be filled, but we do not need a league of democracies for that.
inp: Elle est certes pleine de lacunes qu'il convient de combler, mais nous n'avons pas besoin d’une ligue de démocraties pour cela.
ref: It is full of faults, which need to be corrected. But we don’t need a League of Democracies to do this.

cands: That is why the idea of an electoral college is so important.
inp: C'est pourquoi l'idée d'un collège électoral est si importante.

cands: For example, articles in the South Metropolitan Daily resulted in the abolition of an outdated housing law. Continuing coverage of the SARS
inp: Par exemple, les articles duSouth Metropolitan Daily ont entraîné l’abolition d’une loi obsolète sur le logement. La couverture continue de l’épidémie de SRAS par le magazineCai Jing a permis au public chinois de découvrir la vérité.
ref: For example, reporting by theSouth Metropolitan Daily led to the abolition of an outdated housing ordinance issued by the State Council.Cai Jing magazine’s continuous reporting on SARS enabled the Chinese public to learn the truth about this epidemic.

cands: The Treaties also provide for cooperation on cyber security, terrorism, satellite communications and maritime security, all key points of the Lisbon Tre
inp: Les traités prévoient par ailleurs une coopération sur la cyber-sécurité, le terrorisme, les communications par satellite, et la sécurité maritime, autant de points clés du traité de Lisbonne.
ref: Moreover, the agreements foresee cooperation on cyber-security, terrorism, satellite communications, and maritime security, which are also key elements of the Lisbon Treaty.

cands: A closer look at the problem suggests that the division over Iraq is not simply an isolated incident, but rather reflects a whole range of deep-
inp: Un examen plus attentif du problème suggère que la division sur l'Irak ne constitue pas simplement un incident isolé, mais reflète plutôt toute une plage de difficultés profondément enracinées.
ref: A closer look at the problem suggests that the division over Iraq is not merely an isolated incident, but reflects a range of deep-seated difficulties.

cands: How do I know if a free trade agreement is wrong?
inp: Comment savoir si un accord de libre échange est mauvais?
ref: When is a free-trade agreement bad?

cands: Of the many measures needed in this area, the most important is a strong effort to complete the European single market and to avoid economic nationalism at all costs
inp: Des nombreuses mesures nécessaires dans ce domaine, la plus importante consiste en un puissant effort pour finaliser le marché unique européen et se garder, à tous prix, du nationalisme économique.
ref: Of the many necessary measures in this area, the most important include a vigorous effort to complete the Single Market, coupled with avoidance of economic nationalism at all costs.

cands: So, despite my doubts and difficulties, I have an unwavering faith in Europe.
inp: Ainsi, malgré les doutes et les difficultés, je conserve une confiance indéfectible en l’Europe.
ref: So, despite today’s doubts and difficulties, I retain an abiding faith in Europe.

cands: There has never been any talk of war between the two countries, but Chinese officials have allowed nationalist demonstrations to escalate into boycotts of Japanese
inp: Il n’a jamais été question d’une guerre entre ces deux pays, mais les responsables chinois ont laissé des manifestations nationalistes se muer en boycott des produits japonais et autorisé des actes de vandalisme contre les sociétés japonaises.
ref: The two sides were never in danger of going to war, but Chinese officials allowed nationalist protests to develop into boycotts of Japanese products and acts of vandalism against Japanese companies.

cands: Indeed, by closing their skies, European governments seem to have given top priority to security.
inp: En effet, en fermant leurs cieux, les gouvernements européens semblent avoir accordé la priorité absolue à la sécurité.
ref: Indeed, in closing their skies, European governments seem to have given safety absolute priority over everything else.

cands: A Tribute to James Wolfensohn
inp: Un hommage à James Wolfensohn
ref: A Tribute to James Wolfensohn

cands: In October 2007, Cherkessov (now head of the Federal Drug Agency, one of the most obscure and powerful agencies) published another forum in which he
inp: En octobre 2007, Tcherkessov (désormais chef de l’Agence fédérale antidrogue, l'un des services les plus obscures et puissants) publiait une autre tribune dans laquelle il regrettait l'avilissement de ses collègues : les guerriers sont devenus des commerçants, s'est-il plaint.
ref: In October 2007, Cherkesov (now chief of one of the most obscure and powerful services, the Federal Anti-Drug Administration) published another essay in which he lamented his colleagues’ degradation: warriors had turned into traders, he complained.

cands: The Security Council could recommend several candidates from which the General Assembly would select the Secretary-General, or the General Assembly could propose several candidates to
inp: Le Conseil de sécurité pourrait recommander plusieurs candidats parmi lesquels l'Assemblée générale choisirait le secrétaire général, ou bien c'est l'Assemblée générale qui pourrait proposer plusieurs candidats au Conseil de sécurité.
ref: The Security Council might agree to recommend several candidates from which the General Assembly would select one.

cands: As the current US Secretary of Defense, it is clear to me that the Atlantic partnership is as relevant and essential as it has been in the past.
inp: En ma qualité de Secrétaire de la Défense américain en poste, il m’apparaît clairement que le partenariat atlantique est toujours aussi pertinent et essentiel que par le passé.
ref: As America’s current Secretary of Defense, it is clear to me that the transatlantic partnership is as relevant and essential as ever.

cands: The World Bank must have a competent specialist at its head ready to meet the major challenges of sustainable development as soon as it takes office.
inp: La Banque mondiale doit  avoir à sa tête un spécialiste compétent prêt à relever les grands défis du développement durable et ce, dès son entrée en fonction.
ref: The Bank needs an accomplished professional who is ready to tackle the great challenges of sustainable development from day one.

cands: The world cannot, however, simply hold its breath while Putin and China change their attitudes, and it is therefore necessary that the establishment of an air exclu
inp: Le monde ne saurait toutefois se contenter de retenir son souffle dans l’attente d’un changement d’attitude de Poutine et de la Chine. C’est pourquoi il est nécessaire que la mise en place d’une zone d’exclusion aérienne soit envisagée et examinée en tant qu’option militaire.
ref: But the world cannot hold its breath waiting for a change of heart by Putin and China, which is why a no-fly zone should be examined as a military option.

cands: The time for boldness is now.
inp: Le temps de l\u0027audace
ref: A Time to Experiment

cands: On the contrary, Russia, like Turkey, will be welcome to participate in some of the work of this multilateral partnership.
inp: Bien au contraire, la Russie, comme la Turquie, sera bienvenue pour participer à certains travaux de ce partenariat aux dimensions multilatérales.
ref: On the contrary, Russia, like Turkey, will be welcome to take part in relevant activities within the Partnership’s multilateral dimensions.

cands: The disagreement concerns defence, with the United States showing increasing irritation at what it considers to be a pretentious attitude on the part
inp: Le désaccord concerne la défense, les Etats-Unis faisant montre d'une irritation croissante sur ce qu'ils considèrent comme une attitude prétentieuse de la part de la soi-disant Initiative européenne de défense.
ref: There is discord on defence, with growing irritation in the US over what it views as the pretentious posturing of the so-called European Defence Initiative.

cands: Is it true that democracies have never fought each other?
inp: Est-il vrai que les démocraties n'ont jamais combattu les unes contre les autres ?
ref: Is it true that democracies never fight each other?

cands: When interviewed on the spot, travellers stranded at airports almost unanimously said they preferred to be stranded at an airport rather than
inp: Interrogés sur place, les voyageurs bloqués dans les aéroports disaient, presque unanimement, préférer être coincés dans un aéroport que dans un avion en chute libre.
ref: Stranded travelers, interviewed at airports, typically said that they would rather be stuck at an airport than in a plane falling out of the sky.

cands: He recently said in London that 'the credibility of the UN depends on its willingness to deliver on its commitments and to act when it is needed
inp: Il a déclaré récemment à Londres que"la crédibilité de l'ONU dépend de sa volonté à tenir ses engagements et à agir quand il le faut."
ref: He declared in London recently that "the credibility of the UN depends on a willingness to keep its word and to act when action is required."

cands: They are no longer competitive in manufacturing, but blame other countries for their huge trade deficit.
inp: Ils ne sont plus concurrentiels dans le secteur manufacturier, mais blâment les autres pays pour son énorme déficit commercial.
ref: It is no longer competitive in manufacturing, but blames others for its huge trade deficit.

cands: But, while no one in Europe today can contemplate war in the light of the conflicts that set it on fire and bled it to death in the
inp: Mais, tandis que plus personne aujourd’hui en Europe ne peut envisager une guerre compte tenu des conflits qui l’ont mis à feu et à sang dans la première moitié du 20ème siècle, les guerres de la seconde moitié du 20ème siècle en Asie, loin de résoudre les disputes, n’ont fait qu’accentuer les amères rivalités.
ref: But, whereas the Europe’s bloody wars in the first half of the twentieth century have made war there unthinkable today, the wars in Asia in the second half of the twentieth century, far from settling or ending disputes, only accentuated bitter rivalries.

cands: Such a programme, which would be implemented over a period of at least 15 years, would be a strong signal in itself.
inp: Un tel programme, appliqué sur une période de 15 ans au moins, serait un signal fort en lui-même.
ref: Designed for at least a 15-year period, such a program would be a strong signal in itself.

cands: But one cannot exist without the other.
inp: Mais l'une ne peut exister sans l'autre.
ref: Each, indeed, is unsustainable without the other.

cands: Of course, some of our neighbours are difficult.
inp: Bien sur certains de nos voisins sont difficiles.
ref: To be sure, some of our neighbors are difficult.

cands: The arrest warrant is not a step forward.
inp: Le mandat d'arrêt ne constitue en rien un pas en avant.
ref: The warrant was no leap forward.

cands: 1.     The EU needs an innovative and knowledge-based policy that will strengthen European agricultural competitiveness
inp: 1.      L’UE a besoin d’une politique innovante et de connaissance qui renforcera la compétitivité agricole européenne.
ref: 1.      The EU needs a knowledge and innovation policy that strengthens European agriculture’s competitiveness.

cands: That is why the "most powerful peoples of the world" will now find it most difficult to work together to meet today’s difficult challenges.
inp: C’est pourquoi les « peuples les plus puissants du monde » auront désormais le plus grand mal à travailler ensemble pour répondre aux difficiles défis d’aujourd’hui.
ref: That is why the “world’s most powerful people” will now have a much harder time working together to meet today’s toughest challenges.

cands: Lawyers for Estrada.
inp: Des barreaux pour Estrada
ref: A Star is Jailed

cands: It increases susceptibility to common childhood infections such as measles and diarrhoeal diseases, and is the leading
inp: Elle augmente la prédisposition aux infections infantiles communes comme la rougeole et les maladies diarrhéiques, et c’est la principale cause de cécité infantile dans les pays en développement.
ref: It increases susceptibility to common childhood infections such as measles and diarrheal diseases, and is the single most important cause of childhood blindness in developing countries.

cands: The polluters must pay!
inp: Les pollueurs doivent payer !
ref: Polluters Must Pay

cands: The DPJ government will face the mandarins head-on, partly because the party will have some difficulty recruiting enough qualified legislators.
inp: Le gouvernement du PDJ se confrontera tête la première avec les mandarins, en partie parce que le parti aura quelques difficultés à recruter un nombre suffisant de législateurs qualifiés.
ref: The DPJ government will collide head-on with the mandarins, partly because the party will find it hard to recruit sufficiently qualified policymakers.

cands: Indian defence officials have reported a sharp increase in Chinese military incursions along the highly disputed 4,057-kilometre Himalayan border and
inp: Les hauts responsables de la défense indienne ont fait état d’une nette augmentation des incursions militaires chinoises le long de la très disputée frontière himalayenne longue de 4 057 kilomètres et de patrouilles agressives.
ref: Indian defense officials have reported a sharp increase in Chinese military incursions across the disputed 4,057-kilometer Himalayan frontier and in aggressive patrolling.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a century.
inp: Bien sûr, d’autres facteurs entrent en jeu, mais l’atomisation sociale résultant de cette activité ne devrait pas être minimisée.
ref: Of course, many other factors are at work, but television-driven social atomization should not be understated.

cands: These are the reasons why British Conservatives do not agree with the draft Constitution.
inp: Ce sont les raisons pour lesquelles les Conservateurs britanniques ne sont pas d'accord avec le projet de Constitution.
ref: It is on this basis that British Conservatives oppose the proposed constitution.

cands: The world has seen that the practical consequences would be minimal.
inp: Le monde a pu constater que les suites pratiques seraient minimes.
ref: The world could see that there would be little practical follow-up.

cands: Authoritarian regimes do not have the conflict management institutions inherent in democracies.
inp: Les régimes autoritaires n'ont pas les institutions de gestion des conflits inhérentes aux démocraties.
ref: Authoritarian regimes lack the institutions of conflict management that democracies provide.

cands: Europe needs clean energy and will not be able to produce enough of it on its territory.
inp: L’Europe a besoin d’énergies propres et ne sera pas en mesure d’en produire suffisamment sur son territoire.
ref: Europe needs clean energy, and will not be able to produce enough on its own territory.

cands: They are affordable, and in any case would provide considerable net benefits in the end.
inp: Elles sont abordables, et dans tous les cas fourniraient des bénéfices nets considérables au final.
ref: They are affordable, and in each case would ultimately deliver large net benefits.

cands: At the same time, smallholder farmers need more direct access to markets to sell their crops at a fair price, rather than relying on
inp: En même temps, les petits exploitants agricoles ont besoin d’un accès plus directs aux marchés pour vendre leurs récoltes à un prix équitable, plutôt que de se fier à des intermédiaires coûteux ou à des organismes d’État inefficaces.
ref: At the same time, smallholder farmers need easier access to markets to sell their crops for a fair price, rather than relying on expensive middlemen or inefficient government bodies.

cands: I fear that it is because the US has been deprived of its supremacy to impose global policy on Iran.
inp: Je crains que ce ne soit parce que les Etats-Unis se sont retrouvés privés de leur suprématie à imposer la politique globale sur l’Iran.
ref: I fear it is because the US found itself denied its primacy in setting global policy on Iran.

cands: In Iraq, the British have said, the insurgents have managed to confront their enemy’s technological superiority in three years,
inp: En Irak, de l’aveu des Britanniques, les insurgés sont parvenus en trois ans à faire face à la supériorité technologique de leur ennemi, à un niveau que l’IRA en Irlande du Nord n’a jamais atteint en 30 ans.
ref: The insurgents in Iraq, as the British admit, were able in just three years to cope with their enemies’ technological superiority in a way that the IRA in Northern Ireland was unable to do in 30 years.

cands: Before taking this decision, the international community must provide humanitarian aid and medicine to the rebels in eastern Libya.
inp: Avant de prendre cette décision, la communauté internationale doit apporter une aide humanitaire et des médicaments aux rebelles dans l’est de la Libye.
ref: Before that decision is reached, the international community needs to provide humanitarian assistance and medical supplies to the rebels in eastern Libya.

cands: Investment has suffered.
inp: Les investissements en ont souffert.
ref: Investment suffered.

cands: British Prime Minister Gordon Brown is aware of the problem and has put it on the G20 agenda.
inp: Le Premier ministre britannique Gordon Brown est conscient du problème et il l’a inscrit à l’agenda du G20.
ref: British Prime Minister Gordon Brown recognized the problem and placed it on the G-20’s agenda.

cands: It will be a global call for action.
inp: Ce sera un appel mondial en faveur de l’action.
ref: It will be a global call to action.

cands: The US is now in a position to take a more proactive role in the global financial crisis.
inp: MILAN – Bien que la crise financière perde peu à peu de son intensité, les perspectives de croissance de l’économie mondiale resteront sans doute moroses, ce qui est, en partie, inévitable.
ref: MILAN – Although the financial crisis is winding down, the prospects for growth in the global economy are unlikely to pick up. This is, in part, inevitable.

cands: There is no mistake about the impact of this situation on China.
inp: Il ne faut pas se tromper quant à l'impact de cette situation sur la Chine.
ref: The world should not misjudge the effect of such troubles on China.

cands: Similarly, the establishment of an air exclusion zone in Syria would allow the Syrian government’s weapons of mass destruction delivery systems to be quickly
inp: De même, l’instauration d’une zone d’exclusion aérienne en Syrie permettrait d’entraver rapidement les vecteurs d’armes de destruction massive du gouvernement syrien.
ref: Likewise, a no-fly zone in Syria would immediately restrict the Syrian government’s means of delivery of weapons of mass destruction.

cands: Meanwhile, the Bush administration will attribute these missing funds to poor economic health, lack of opportunity, and unintended miscalculation.
inp: Pendant ce temps, le gouvernement Bush attribuera ces fonds disparus à la mauvaise santé économique, au manque de chance et aux mauvais calculs involontaires.
ref: Meanwhile, the Bush Administration will blame the sinking economy, bad luck, and unintentional miscalculations for the vanished surplus.

cands: From the point of view of the current Member States, would the early, rather than the late, admission of Hungary, Latvia, Poland or Slovakia weak
inp: Du point de vue des états membres actuels, l'admission de la Hongrie, de la Lettonie, de la Pologne ou de la Slovaquie, plus tôt que tard, affaiblirait-elle l'euro comme le redoutent beaucoup?
ref: From the standpoint of current member states, would admitting Hungary, Latvia, Poland, or Slovakia, sooner rather than later, drag down the euro as many fear?

cands: Denuclearization at a very short distance!
inp: Une dénucléarisation à très petits pas !
ref: A Weak Start for START

cands: The two leaders can count on each other not to create additional problems, and even to contribute passively to resolving geopolitical issues.
inp: Les deux dirigeants peuvent compter l’un sur l’autre pour ne pas créer de problèmes supplémentaires, et même pour contribuer passivement à résoudre les questions géopolitiques.
ref: Both leaders can count on the other not to create additional problems, and even to help passively on geopolitical questions.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy since the mid-1990’s, and has been a major contributor to the world economy since
inp: Le 6 avril 2009, un séisme de magnitude 6,3 a frappé L’Aquila et les villes des alentours, causant la mort de plus de 300 personnes et en blessant 1 500 autres.
ref: On April 6, 2009, a 6.3 magnitude earthquake struck L’Aquila and nearby towns, killing more than 300 people and injuring more than 1,500.

cands: Europe and North America in fact maintain a fundamentally common view.
inp: L'Europe et l'Amérique du Nord conservent en réalité un point de vue essentiellement commun.
ref: Europe and North America do retain a fundamental common outlook.

cands: For example, Russia, which is helping Iran build a nuclear reactor at Bushehr, should offer Iran a guarantee of low-enriched uranium
inp: Par exemple, la Russie, qui aide l'Iran à construire un réacteur nucléaire à Bushehr, devrait offrir à l'Iran la garantie d'un carburant d'uranium faiblement enrichi et de traitement du carburant usé du réacteur en le renvoyant en Russie si l'Iran accepte d'abandonner l'enrichissement et le traitement.
ref: For example, Russia, which is helping Iran construct a nuclear reactor at Bushehr, should offer Iran a guarantee of low enriched uranium fuel and reprocessing of the reactor's spent fuel by sending it back to Russia if Iran agrees to forego enrichment and reprocessing.

cands: The people running these large firms were often unscrupulous, and in some cases used their market dominance to eliminate competition – allowing survi
inp: Les personnes qui dirigeaient ces grandes entreprises étaient souvent peu scrupuleuses, et dans certains cas, utilisaient leur position dominante sur le marché pour éliminer la concurrence – permettant aux entreprises survivantes de réduire les réserves pour faire monter les prix.
ref: The people who ran big business were often unscrupulous, and in some cases used their dominant market position to drive out their competitors – enabling the surviving firms subsequently to restrict supply and raise prices.

cands: And unemployment in the euro area is at record levels, with almost one in two young workers unemployed in Spain and Greece.
