inp: Et le chômage de la zone euro atteint un niveau record, avec presque un jeune travailleur sur deux sans emploi en Espagne et en Grèce.
ref: And eurozone unemployment is at record highs, with nearly one in two young people jobless in Spain and Greece.

cands: In recent weeks, the war in Iraq and the divisions within Europe that it has brought to light have attracted the world's attention.
inp: Durant ces dernières semaines, la guerre en Irak et les divisions intra-européennes qu'elle a mis en évidence ont retenu l'attention du monde.
ref: For the past several weeks, attention was focused on the war in Iraq and on the fault lines within Europe that the conflict exposed.

cands: The company has challenged any basis for these allegations.
inp: L’entreprise a contesté tout fondement à ces allégations.
ref: The company denied that there was any substance to these allegations.

cands: Finally, even the most rational people have become receptive to certain conspiracy theories because for the past eight years we have witnessed very sophisticated
inp: Enfin, mêmes les personnes les plus rationnelles sont devenues réceptives à certaines théories conspirationnistes parce que depuis huit ans nous avons été témoins de conspirations très sophistiquées.
ref: Finally, even rational people have become more receptive to certain conspiracy theories because, in the last eight years, we actually have seen some sophisticated conspiracies.

cands: The US government’s fiscal deficit is expected to rise by $1.5 trillion in 2009, and the US economy will be in a deep recession.
inp: Lorsque le projet deviendra loi, les régulateurs fédéraux auront le droit et la responsabilité de limiter l’envergure des grandes banques et, si nécessaire, de les démanteler lorsqu’elles représenteront un « risque grave » pour la stabilité financière.
ref: Once the bill becomes law, federal regulators will have the right and the responsibility to limit the scope of big banks and, as necessary, break them up when they pose a “grave risk” to financial stability.

cands: Some royal members recognize this situation and know that a complete overhaul is imperative.
inp: Certains membres royaux reconnaissent cette situation et savent qu'il est impératif de procéder à un remaniement total.
ref: Some royals recognize this and know that a more thorough housecleaning is needed.

cands: Since 2003, national vision and commitment, coupled with international assistance, have enabled Liberia to hold democratic elections, rebuild some basic public services, restore
inp: Depuis 2003, une vision et un engagement à l’échelle nationale, couplés à une aide internationale, ont permis au Libéria de tenir des élections démocratiques, de remettre sur pied une partie des services publics de base, de rétablir un système de gestion des finances publiques et de progresser dans l’élimination d’une corruption endémique et dans la reconstruction des institutions et des infrastructures nationales.
ref: Since 2003, domestic vision and commitment, together with international support, have enabled Liberia to hold democratic elections, reintroduce some essential public services, reestablish a public-finance management system, and make progress in addressing endemic corruption, rebuilding public institutions, and reconstructing national infrastructure.

cands: Similarly, supranational institutions cannot continue to bail out troubled states that are insolvent rather than illegitimate.
inp: De même, les institutions supranationales ne peuvent continuer à renflouer les états en difficulté qui sont insolvables plutôt qu’illiquides.
ref: Similarly, super-sovereigns cannot continue to bail out distressed sovereigns that are insolvent rather than illiquid.

cands: This loss is particularly severe for poor countries seeking to integrate into the world economy.
inp: Cette perte est particulièrement lourde pour les pays pauvres qui cherchent à s’intégrer à l’économie mondiale.
ref: This is an especially harsh loss for poor countries seeking to gain a foothold in the global economy.

cands: Why should the only region, and the only people, which lead a disciplined government, not be involved in murders, attacks on mosques and suicide
inp: Pourquoi la seule région, et le seul peuple, qui dirigent un gouvernement discipliné, ne sont pas impliqués dans des assassinats, des attaques sur des mosquées et des attentats suicides à la bombe d'écoliers, devraient-ils être pénalisés ?
ref: Why should the one region - and people - who run an orderly government, are not involved in murder, attacks on mosques, and suicide bombing of schoolchildren, be penalized?

cands: One hectare in Africa yields about one tonne of grain, compared to more than four in China, where farmers use fertilizer intensively.
inp: Un hectare en Afrique donne une tonne de céréales environ, contre plus de quatre en Chine, où les agriculteurs recourent intensivement aux fertilisants.
ref: African farmers produce roughly one ton of grain per hectare, compared with more than four tons per hectare in China, where farmers use fertilizers heavily.

cands: As a result, the household saving rate has increased from 0 to 4% of disposable income.
inp: En conséquence, le taux d’épargne des foyers est passé de 0 à 4% du revenu disponible.
ref: As a result, the household savings rate has risen from zero to 4% of disposable income.

cands: These questions arose sharply when the followers of the Romanian philosopher Constantin Noica legitimised his sympathies for the Iron Guard, a
inp: Ces questions se sont posées de manière aiguë, quand les disciples du philosophe roumain Constantin Noica ont légitimé ses sympathies pour la Garde de fer, un mouvement fasciste, puis sa collaboration avec les communistes, tandis que, dans le même temps, ils laissaient condamner une simple femme de ménage, au motif qu’elle lessivait les sols des bureaux de la police secrète.
ref: An egregious example of this was the way followers of Romanian philosopher Constantin Noica defended his support for the fascist Iron Guard and his later collaboration with the Communists, while at the same time condemning even a generic cleaning woman for mopping the floors in the offices of the secret police.

cands: But there is a need for EU-wide measures to ensure discipline, to launch the development of preventive mechanisms among members, and these initiatives depend
inp: Mais il est nécessaire de prendre des mesures à l’échelle de l’Union garantissant la discipline, pour lancer le développement de mécanismes de prévention entre les membres, et ces initiatives dépendent notamment des grands pays, qui portent par conséquent une responsabilité spéciale quant à l’évolution de la zone euro – et de l’Union européenne.
ref: But EU-wide measures aimed at ensuring discipline are necessary to spur the growth of preventive mechanisms in the member states, and such initiatives are largely dependent on the large countries, which thus bear a special responsibility for the developments within the eurozone – and within the EU.

cands: Expulsion of NGOs exposes more than one million to the risk of epidemics and famine.
inp: L'expulsion des ONG expose plus d'un million d'entre eux aux risques d'épidémies et de famine.
ref: The expulsion of the aid agencies has put over a million Darfuris at risk of epidemics and starvation.

cands: Czechoslovakia and Yugoslavia were created because their constituent elements were no longer considered viable independent states.
inp: La Tchécoslovaquie et la Yougoslavie ont été créées car leurs éléments constituants n'étaient plus jugés comme des états indépendants viables.
ref: Czechoslovakia and Yugoslavia came into existence because their constituent parts were not seen as viable independent states.

cands: A Day for Global Justice
inp: Une journée pour la justice planétaire
ref: A Day for Planetary Justice

cands: Crude oil prices have already fallen significantly since their peaks at the beginning of the year.
inp: Le prix du brut a déjà baissé de manière considérable après ses sommets du début de l’année.
ref: The crude oil price already has dropped substantially from its highs at the beginning of the year.

cands: But reversing these privatizations – such as the expropriation of Mikhail Khodorkovsky and his partners in the Menatep group,
inp: Cependant, l’inversion de ces privatisations – comme l’expropriation de Mikhaïl Khodorkovsky et de ses partenaires du groupe Menatep, principal actionnaire de Ioukos – ne signifie pas l’avènement de la justice sociale, mais, comme disait Lénine, “l’expropriation des expropriateurs” par de nouveaux patrons.
ref: But any reversal of those privatizations – such as the effective expropriation of Mikhail Khodorkovsky and his Menatep partners in Yukos – signifies not the dawn of social justice but rather a new group of bosses “expropriating the expropriators,” as Lenin used to say.

cands: The best way to deal with externalities would be to agree on a global tax.
inp: Le meilleur moyen de faire face aux effets externes serait de s’accorder sur une taxe à l’échelle planétaire.
ref: A global externality can best be dealt with by a globally agreed tax rate.

cands: Effective size limits were imposed by banking reforms in the 1930s and an effort to maintain such restrictions was maintained in the Riegle-
inp: Des seuils efficaces de taille ont été imposés par les réformes bancaires des années 30 et un effort pour maintenir de telles restrictions a été maintenu dans la loi Riegle-Neal de 1994.
ref: Effective size caps on banks were imposed by the banking reforms of the 1930’s, and there was an effort to maintain such restrictions in the Riegle-Neal Act of 1994.

cands: In proposing the creation of an NAUP, we are considering a specific plan to create a wider market by promoting an alliance between the three economies
inp: En proposant la création d'une UPNA, nous envisageons un plan spécifique pour créer un marché plus large en favorisant une alliance entre les trois économies.
ref: In proposing the creation of NAPU, we envision a specific plan to create a larger market by fostering an alliance between the three economies.

cands: Those who consider the euro a failure must remember that it is only ten years old.
inp: Ceux qui considèrent que l’euro est un échec doivent se rappeler qu’il a seulement dix ans.
ref: Those who would write off the euro as a failure should consider that it is only ten years old.

cands: Terrorists captured will be decapitated in the traditional manner.
inp: Les terroristes capturés seront décapités de manière traditionnelle.
ref: Those captured face beheading in the traditional way.

cands: A window of opportunity for European defence
inp: Une fenêtre d’opportunité pour la défense européenne
ref: A Window of Opportunity for European Defense

cands: The challenge facing the al-Saud is to ensure the inclusion at the heart of the system of peoples they have avoided for decades
inp: Le défi auquel les al-Saud sont confrontés porte sur l'inclusion au coeur du système des peuples qu'ils ont évité pendant des décennies.
ref: The challenge facing the al-Saud is to include at the heart of the political system the peoples they have shunned for decades.

cands: The need for new infrastructure is not an excuse to throw caution out the window.
inp: Le besoin de nouvelles infrastructures n'est pas une autorisation de jeter la prudence par la fenêtre.
ref: Countries’ need for better infrastructure is no license to throw prudence out the window.

cands: In almost all candidate countries, further deflation and long-term economic growth require fiscal consolidation, more flexible labour markets and the implementation of privat
inp: Chez presque tous les candidats, une désinflation et une croissance économique à long terme supplémentaires nécessitent une consolidation fiscale, des marchés du travail plus souples et la mise en oeuvre de la privatisation.
ref: In almost all candidates, further disinflation and long-term economic growth require fiscal consolidation, more flexible labor markets, and completion of privatization.

cands: Even if the new START treaty is ratified, this situation should not satisfy anyone.
inp: Même si le nouveau traité START est ratifié, cette situation ne devrait satisfaire personne.
ref: The result, even if new START is ratified, should satisfy no one.

cands: In the coming months, it will become clear whether European decision-makers are capable of compromising and implementing reforms that will curb the threat of a
inp: Au cours des prochains mois, on verra clairement si les décideurs européens sont capables de faire des compromis et mettre en ouvre des réformes qui freinent la menace d’une dislocation de la zone euro.
ref: In the next few months, it will become clear whether European policymakers can compromise and implement reforms that dampen the threat of a eurozone breakup.

cands: It is therefore important to look back and remember that the “lost decade” we are suffering from is not our long-term economic destiny.
inp: Il est donc important de prendre du recul et de nous rappeler que la « décennie perdue » dont nous sommes en train de souffrir n'est pas notre destin économique à long terme.
ref: So it is important to step back and remind ourselves that the “lost decade” that we are currently suffering is not our long-run economic destiny.

cands: Two main problems are currently limiting the availability of drugs.
inp: Deux problèmes principaux limitent aujourd’hui la disponibilité des médicaments.
ref: Two main problems limit the availability of medicines today.

cands: Many Americans attribute Europe's lack of full commitment to its anti-terrorist mission to latent anti-Semitism.
inp: Nombre d'Américains attribuent le manque d'engagement total de l'Europe envers sa mission anti-terroriste comme la preuve d'un anti-sémitisme latent.
ref: Many Americans ascribe Europe's lack of total commitment to its anti-terrorism cause to latent anti-Semitism.

cands: Vote buying became insufficient.
inp: L’achat de voix devint progressivement insuffisant.
ref: Vote-buying became increasingly insufficient.

cands: France’s debt-to-GDP ratio is already around 90%; even if its 2013 budget deficit does not exceed 3.5% of GDP, its debt-
inp: Le rapport dette/PIB de la France est déjà aux alentours de 90%; même si le déficit de son budget 2013 ne dépasse pas 3,5% du PIB, son rapport dette/PIB atteindra 93% à la fin de l’année.
ref: France’s debt/GDP ratio is already around 90%; even if its 2013 budget deficit does not exceed 3.5% of GDP, its debt/GDP ratio will have climbed to 93% by the end of the year.

cands: combating terrorism,
inp: combattre le terrorisme,
ref: fight terrorism;

cands: When our report is delivered in January, Secretary-General Kofi Annan will send a report to the world next spring, which will identify the practical steps
inp: Lorsque notre rapport aura été remis en janvier, le secrétaire général Kofi Annan communiquera un rapport au monde entier au printemps prochain, rapport qui identifiera les étapes pratiques qui devront être prises cette année-là.
ref: After our report is issued in January, Secretary-General Kofi Annan will issue a report to the world in the spring, identifying the practical steps that should be taken this year.

cands: But other countries may fear dilution of sovereignty when the new central bank of the West African monetary zone assumes some of the policy-making
inp: Mais d’autres pays pourraient craindre la dilution de leur souveraineté quand la nouvelle banque centrale de la zone monétaire d'Afrique occidentale endossera certaines des responsabilités d'élaboration politique des banques centrales nationales.
ref: Others, though, may fear the dilution of their sovereignty when the new Central Bank of theWest African Monetary Zonetakes over some of the policymaking responsibilities of national central banks.

cands: Expressions such as “apartheid” and “Zionism is racism,” unthinkable in liberal discourse a few years ago, have
inp: Des expressions comme “État d’apartheid” et “le sionisme, c’est le racisme,” impensables dans le discours libéral il y a quelques années, sont devenus des habitudes.
ref: Phrases like “apartheid state” and “Zionism is racism,” unthinkable in liberal discourse a few years ago, have become routine.

cands: But one facet of this brilliant story is bleak.
inp: Mais l’une des facette de cette brillante histoire est ternie.
ref: But one aspect of this shining story is tarnished.

cands: For example, one of the largest wine pots (estimated at $180 million) was paid to Nigeria by Halliburton.
inp: Ainsi, l'un des plus grands pots de vin (il s'élèverait à 180 millions de dollars) a été versé au Nigéria par Halliburton.
ref: Indeed, one of the largest bribes (a reputed $180 million) paid in recent times in Nigeria was by Halliburton, a company tightly intertwined with US political power.

cands: The Cold War had long since ended in 2001.
inp: La guerre froide était terminée depuis longtemps en 2001.
ref: By 2001, the Cold War was long over.

cands: His daughter is proud of her legacy, which marked the beginning of the South Korean economic boom.
inp: Sa fille est fière de son héritage, qui marquât le début du boom économique sud-coréen.
ref: His daughter is proud of his legacy, which marked the beginning of South Korea’s economic boom.

cands: As banks accumulate liquidity, households will try to preserve their wealth by increasing their savings.
inp: De même que les banques accumulent du liquide, les ménages vont tenter de préserver leur patrimoine en augmentant leur épargne.
ref: Just as banks are hoarding cash, households will try to preserve wealth by increasing their saving.

cands: Interventionary measures will not succeed because they are unrealistic and will ultimately be more harmful than beneficial.
inp: Les mesures interventionnistes n’aboutiront pas, car elles ne sont pas réalistes et, au bout du compte, elles seront plus néfastes que bénéfiques.
ref: Its interventionist measures won’t work. They are unrealistic and, ultimately, counterproductive.

cands: It is too early to say whether Iran’s desire to obtain nuclear weapons has been postponed.
inp: Il est trop tôt pour dire si le vou de l’Iran d’obtenir l’arme nucléaire a été ajourné.
ref: It is too soon to tell if Iran’s desire to obtain nuclear weapons has been delayed.

cands: Today, these countries should come together to offer a compromise to Iran (and others).
inp: Aujourd'hui, ces pays devraient se rassembler pour offrir un compromis à l'Iran (et à d'autres).
ref: Today, such countries should join together to offer Iran (and others) a deal.

cands: Contemporary megacities, for example, have already had to cope with dangerous canyons, rising ocean levels, violent storms, chronic
inp: Les mégapoles contemporaines, par exemple, ont déjà eu à composer avec de dangereuses canicules, l’élévation du niveau des océans, des tempêtes d’une violence extrême, la congestion chronique et la pollution de l’air et des eaux.
ref: Today’s mega-cities, for example, already have to confront dangerous heat waves, rising sea levels, more extreme storms, dire congestion, and air and water pollution.

cands: Second, all parties must recognize their interest in restoring balanced growth in advanced countries as much as possible and as soon as possible in order to offset the
inp: Deuxièmement, toutes les parties doivent reconnaître leur intérêt à rétablir une croissance équilibrée des pays avancés autant et dès que possible de manière à contrebalancer la baisse de la demande agrégée.
ref: Second, everyone must recognize their stake in restoring balanced advanced-country growth as much and as soon as possible in order to counter the ongoing shortfall in aggregate demand.

cands: These issues are of vital importance to Obama in the months ahead and beyond.
inp: Ces dossiers sont d’ordre capital pour Obama dans les mois à venir et au-delà.
ref: These are going to be some of the major questions for Obama over the next year and more.

cands: If the West is to help to fulfil the hopes raised by the Arab revolts, it is essential that the transatlantic partnership be as effective as
inp: Pour que l'Occident contribue à la réalisation des espoirs soulevés par les révoltes dans le monde arabe, il est indispensable que le partenariat transatlantique soit aussi efficace qu'il le fut au moment de la Guerre froide ou de la chute du mur de Berlin.
ref: Only if the trans-Atlantic partnership proves effective, as it did to meet the demands of the Cold War and the end of Europe’s division, can the West contribute to realizing the hopes engendered by the Arab uprisings.

cands: From time to time, Arab negotiators re-open the debate on the usual issues that potential neighbouring States would have to resolve, such as
inp: De temps à autre, des négociateurs arabes relancent le débat sur les questions habituelles que les États voisins éventuels auraient à résoudre, telles que les frontières politiques, les mesures de sécurité et les relations économiques.
ref: From time to time Arab negotiators enter into discussions about the mundane issues that prospective neighboring states would need to resolve, such as political boundaries, security arrangements, and economic relations.

cands: This change in the battlefield means that war as a decisive step in an international conflict is obsolete.
inp: Cette mutation du champ de bataille signifie que la guerre comme étape décisive dans un conflit international est obsolète.
ref: This changing nature of the battlefield essentially means that war as a conclusive event in an international conflict has become obsolete.

cands: Such a programme would include, as a first step, internships in European companies, followed by the possibility of working in Europe for a period of 5 to
inp: Un tel programme comprendrait, comme première étape, des stages dans des entreprises européennes, suivis de la possibilité de travailler en Europe pour une durée de 5 à 8 ans.
ref: Such a program would include, first, a traineeship in European firms, followed by the opportunity to work in Europe for 5-8 years.

cands: Obama has emphasized the need for a "green recovery," that is, one based on sustainable technologies and not just a rebound in consumption
inp: Obama a mis l’accent sur le besoin d’un « redressement vert », c’est-à-dire basé sur des technologies durables et pas simplement sur un rebonds de la consommation.
ref: Obama has emphasized the need for a “green recovery,” that is, one based on sustainable technologies, not merely on consumption spending.

cands: The Arab Spring countries need support similar to that of the Marshall Plan, the financial assistance plan that helped rebuild and restart Western Europe after 1945, in order
inp: Les pays du Printemps arabe ont besoin d'un soutien analogue à ce que fut le plan Marshall, le plan d'aide financière qui a aidé à la reconstruction et au redémarrage de l'Europe occidentale après 1945, pour favoriser une transformation démocratique et la stabilité politique.
ref: Just as the post-1945 Marshall Plan consisted of a financial-aid package aimed at reconstructing and re-launching Western Europe’s economies to support democratic transformation and political stability, the countries of the Arab Spring face similar challenges and needs.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a decade.
inp: BERKELEY – Une récession en double creux est une chose terrible, mais une décennie perdue l’est bien plus encore.
ref: BERKELEY – A double-dip recession is one thing, but a lost decade is something far more sinister.

cands: Iran and its international interlocutors must learn from the past and manage expectations accordingly. There will be no quick fixes (if any) given the parties’
inp: L’Iran et ses interlocuteurs internationaux doivent tirer les leçons du passé et gérer les attentes en conséquence. Il n’y aura pas de solutions rapides (si solutions il y a), compte tenu des intérêts diamétralement opposés des parties, des obstacles respectifs au plan national et liés aux alliances et d’une profonde méfiance mutuelle.
ref: Iran and its international interlocutors should learn from the past and manage expectations accordingly. There will not be any quick solutions (if, indeed, there are any solutions at all), given the parties’ diametrically opposed interests, their respective domestic and alliance-related obstacles, and a profound lack of trust on all sides.

cands: The number of countries in this category can only increase as the number of nuclear reactors is expected to double in the next 20 years.
inp: Le nombre de pays entrant dans cette catégorie ne peut qu’augmenter dans la mesure où le nombre de réacteurs nucléaires devrait doubler dans les vingt prochaines années.
ref: The number of countries in this category is bound to increase as the number of nuclear power reactors doubles over the next 20 years.

cands: In addition, new international norms were being established: foreign powers that had previously been unconcerned with coups d’état, military dictator
inp: De plus, de nouvelles normes internationales s’établissaient : les puissances étrangères qui jusqu’alors se désintéressaient des coups d’état, des dictatures militaires et de la répression se ralliaient désormais à la démocratie et aux droits humains.
ref: Moreover, new international norms had come to the fore: external powers that previously turned a blind eye to coups, military dictatorships, and repression now rallied around democracy and human rights.

cands: In the late 1950s, after the Soviet Union launched its first spacecraft, leading Western economists predicted that Soviet income would catch up with that
inp: Vers la fin des années 1950, après le lancement du premier vaisseau spatial par l'Union Soviétique, d'éminents économistes occidentaux ont prévu que le revenu soviétique rattraperait celui des États-Unis en quelques quelques décennies.
ref: In the late 1950’s, after the Soviet Union launched the first spacecraft, eminent Western economists predicted that Soviet income would overtake that of the United States in a few decades.

cands: The reception and adoption of democracy is not a function of sectarian affiliation but a reflection on the multiple political, religious, cultural and
inp: L'accueil et l'adoption de la démocratie n'est pas une fonction d'appartenance sectaire mais une réflexion des identités politiques, religieuses, culturelles et historiques à dimension multiples des Irakiens, individuellement.
ref: The reception and adoption of democracy is not a function of sectarian belonging, but a reflection of the multi-dimensional historical, cultural, religious, and political identities of Iraqi individuals.

cands: There is a marked increase in income and wealth inequality: unemployment, falling wages, or technical unemployment affect poor household
inp: Il y a une nette augmentation des inégalités des revenus et des richesses : le chômage, la baisse des salaires ou le chômage technique touchent plus généralement les foyers pauvres, ce qui entraine une baisse des revenus du travail, tandis que les bonus extravagants de Wall Street font un retour vengeur.
ref: Moreover, income and wealth inequality is rising again: poorer households are at greater risk of unemployment, falling wages, or reductions in hours worked, all leading to lower labor income, whereas on Wall Street outrageous bonuses have returned with a vengeance.

cands: The two methods above make this point very blunt, and unless we sketch at least one working response, we will not be equipped with the right com
inp: Les deux méthodes précitées éludent ce point. Or, si nous n’esquissons pas au moins une réponse en état de marche, nous ne serons pas équipés de la bonne boussole pour gérer notre interdépendance croissante.
ref: Both the ad hoc and the global public-goods schools shy away from this question, and yet without at least some working answer, we will lack the compass needed to navigate our increasing global interdependence.

cands: Trade and foreign direct investment have greatly facilitated the absorption and adaptation by emerging countries of good practices for technologies invented in advanced
inp: Le commerce et l'investissement direct étranger ont beaucoup facilité l'absorption et l'adaptation par les pays naissants des bonnes pratiques pour les technologies inventées dans les économies avancées.
ref: Trade and foreign direct investment have made it much easier for emerging countries to absorb and adapt best-practice technology invented in the advanced economies.

cands: It is now widely accepted that financial assistance alone will not be effective in reducing poverty.
inp: Il est désormais communément accepté que l'aide financière seule ne permettra pas de réduire efficacement la pauvreté.
ref: It is now widely accepted that financial assistance alone will not bring about effective poverty reduction.

cands: More deficit reduction will be inevitable, and if it is not fueled by lower allowances and higher incomes, but by programs vital to economic growth,
inp: Davantage de réduction du déficit sera inévitable. Si celle-ci n’est pas alimentée par une diminution des allocations et une augmentation des revenus, mais par des programmes vitaux pour la croissance économique, le résultat sera un appauvrissement et un affaiblissement des USA – et un monde plus incertain, voire instable.
ref: Unless more deficit reduction, which is inevitable, comes from curbing entitlement benefits and increasing revenues, and less from programs vital for economic growth, the result will be a poorer, weaker US – and a more uncertain, if not unstable, world.

cands: The main challenge now is to move away from a model of cooperation in which donor country Governments or agencies determine priorities, actions and funding needs.
inp: Le principal défi est maintenant de s'éloigner d'un modèle de coopération dans lequel ce sont les gouvernements ou les organismes des pays donateurs qui déterminent les priorités, les mesures à appliquer et les besoins de financement.
ref: Our major challenge today is to move away from the model of partnership according to which priorities, policies, and funding needs are determined in donor capitals and development partners’ headquarters.

cands: If this is the case, gold may be the most reliable cover.
inp: Si l’on s’inquiète de cette possibilité, l’or pourrait en effet être la couverture la plus fiable.
ref: And if you are really worried about that, gold might indeed be the most reliable hedge.

cands: Our founder was a great constitutionalist and it was after elections that Pakistan was born.
inp: Notre fondateur était un grand constitutionnaliste et c’est suite à des élections que le Pakistan est né.
ref: Our founder was a great constitutionalist, and Pakistan came into being through the vote.

cands: His conscience dictated that he should not obey the king's will.
inp: Sa conscience lui dictait de ne pas se plier à la volonté du roi.
ref: His conscience would not allow him to bend to Henry’s will.

cands: The former will help to break the spiral of public debt, the latter will help to reduce unemployment.
inp: Les premières permettront de sortir de la spirale de la dette publique, les secondes, de résorber le chômage.
ref: The former are necessary to help Union members grow out of their increased public debt, while the latter would help them to address unemployment.

cands: I wonder why they have the opportunity to travel, study, take a holiday, when I cannot go outside my country to learn medicine.
inp: Je me demande pourquoi ils ont la possibilité de voyager, d'étudier, de prendre des vacances, alors que moi, je ne peux pas sortir de mon pays pour apprendre la médecine.
ref: I ask myself why they have the opportunity to travel, to study, to take vacations, when I cannot go abroad even to learn medicine.

cands: Like the Netherlands in the early 1980s, the Brazilian economy today faces the challenge of having to boost employment growth rapidly amid fiscal constraint
inp: De la même façon que les Pays-Bas au début des années 1980, l'économie brésilienne d'aujourd'hui fait face au défi de devoir stimuler rapidement la croissance des emplois dans un cadre de contraintes budgétaires et de taux d'intérêts élevés.
ref: Not unlike Holland in the early 1980s, Brazil's economy today faces the challenge of stimulating rapid employment growth amid fiscal constraints and high interest rates.

cands: By accusing warriors of being traders and traders of being thieves, she rejected her Marxist roots.
inp: En accusant les guerriers d’être des commerçants et les commerçants d’être des voleurs, elle rejette ses origines marxistes.
ref: Accusing warriors of being traders and traders of being thieves, it shuns its Marxist origins.

cands: At a time when public debate in Israel is torn between pseudo-religious nationalist fanatics and anti-Zionists posing as post-modernists
inp: Dans une période où les débats publics en Israël sont déchirés entre des fanatiques nationalistes pseudo-religieux et des anti-sionistes se faisant passer pour des post-modernistes, les certitudes morales d'Eban, imprégnées de savoir-vivre, peuvent sembler superficielles.
ref: At a time when public debate in Israel is torn between pseudo-religious nationalist fanatics and anti-Zionists masquerading as post-modernists, the moral certitudes of Eban, for all their urbanity, may sound shallow.

cands: Why would they not?
inp: Pourquoi ne le feraient-ils pas ?
ref: Why shouldn't they?

cands: This would be a radical change and not just a piece of toilet paper as suggested here and there.
inp: Ce serait là un changement radical et non un simple toilettage comme on le suggère ici ou là.
ref: That is a radical change, not the mere tidying‑up exercise some suggest.

cands: China’s neighbours are increasingly concerned about its growing power and confidence.
inp: Les voisins de la Chine sont de plus en plus inquiets devant sa puissance et son assurance croissantes.
ref: China’s neighbors are increasingly anxious about its growing power and assertiveness.

cands: Child mortality was on the rise among low-income groups in many developing countries, as were inequalities.
inp: La mortalité infantile était en hausse dans les groupes à faibles revenus dans de nombreux pays en développement, ainsi que les inégalités.
ref: Infant mortality rates rose among low-income groups in many developing countries, and inequality increased.

cands: The first thing to measure is the market response.
inp: La première chose à jauger est la réaction du marché.
ref: The first concerns the market response.

cands: At EU level, the (resilient) capital of the European Investment Bank should be substantially increased, as proposed by European Commission President José Manuel Barro
inp: À l’échelle de l’UE, le capital (résiliable) de la Banque européenne d’investissement devrait être fortement augmenté, comme l’a proposé le président de la Commission européenne, José Manuel Barroso, dans son discours sur l’état de l’Union en septembre dernier, afin que la BEI puisse financer une vague importante d’investissements paneuropéens, notamment en infrastructure.
ref: At the EU level, the (callable) capital of the European Investment Bank should be greatly increased, as European Commission President José Manuel Barroso suggested in his State of the Union speech last September, so that the EIB can finance a big wave of pan-European investment, notably in infrastructure.

cands: This puts everyone at risk.
inp: Cela met tout le monde en danger.
ref: That makes everyone less safe.

cands: John Paul II was one of the driving forces behind the erosion of communism in Europe.
inp: Jean Paul II fut l’une des forces motrice de l’érosion du communisme en Europe.
ref: John Paul II was one of the decisive forces in eroding the hold of communism on Europe.

cands: Although it is true that the thousands of civilians killed in Dresden and other German cities were individually innocent victims, there is no doubt about the moral imperativ
inp: Même s’il est vrai que les milliers de civils tués à Dresde et dans d’autres villes allemandes furent des victimes innocentes sur le plan individuel, on ne peut douter de l’impératif moral d’infliger une défaite collective à l’Allemagne.
ref: Although it is true that thousands of the civilians killed in Dresden and other German cities were innocent at an individual level, there can be no doubt it was morally imperative that Germany be defeated collectively.

cands: Politicians failed to implement the 1992 Earth Summit treaties properly.
inp: Les politiciens n’ont pas réussi à mettre en vigueur de façon appropriée les traités adoptés au Sommet de la Terre de 1992.
ref: Politicians have failed to implement properly the treaties adopted at the 1992 Earth Summit.

cands: In Massachusetts, Harvard professor Elisabeth Warren won a Senate seat and is a tireless advocate of reforms to protect citizens from banking abuse.
inp: Au Massachusetts, Elisabeth Warren, professeur à Harvard, a remporté un siège au Sénat. C'est une infatigable battante en faveur des réformes destinées à protéger les citoyens des pratiques abusives des banques.
ref: In Massachusetts, Elizabeth Warren, a Harvard law professor and tireless warrior for reforms to protect ordinary citizens from banks’ abusive practices, won a seat in the Senate.

cands: Politically entrenched since the fall of Saddam and the re-emergence of their allies in Iraq, the Shia have rushed to petit
inp: Politiquement enhardis depuis la chute du régime de Saddam et la réapparition de leurs alliés en Irak, les Shia se sont empressés d'adresser une pétition au prince héritier Abdullah afin qu'il mette fin à leur exclusion de la politique saoudienne et à leur démonisation en tant qu'hérétiques par l'établissement religieux wahhabite.
ref: Politically emboldened since the fall of Saddam's regime and the resurgence of their brethren in Iraq, the Shia wasted no time in petitioning Crown Prince Abdullah to end both their exclusion from Saudi politics and their demonization as heretics by the Wahhabi religious establishment.

cands: The new strategy promoted by Secretary of State Hillary Clinton to stem the sharp rise in drug-related homicides – which, according to Mexican government reports
inp: La nouvelle stratégie promue par la secrétaire d’état Hillary Clinton pour endiguer la montée en flèche des homicides liés au trafic de drogue – qui se porteraient, d’après des rapports gouvernementaux mexicains qui auraient filtrés, à plus de 22 000 depuis fin 2006 – est d’établir « des communautés plus fortes et plus résilientes ».
ref: The new strategy that US Secretary of State Hillary Clinton has been promoting to staunch the upward trend of narco-trafficking-related murders – which leaked Mexican government reports put at more than 22,000 since late 2006 – is to build “stronger, more resilient communities.”

cands: The article stated that "in essence, Chu and Locke are likely to place their priorities in the opposite order of ours."
inp: L’article précisait que « au fond d’eux-mêmes, il est probable que Chu et Locke placent leurs priorités dans un ordre inverse du notre ».
ref: The paper went on to warn that, “In their own hearts, we are afraid that Chu and Locke put their priorities in exactly the opposite order.”

cands: The current financial crisis is different from all the crises we have seen since the Second World War.
inp: La crise financière actuelle est différente de toutes celles que nous avons connues depuis la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
ref: The current financial crisis is different from all the others we have experienced since World War II.

cands: Western governments have been accused of interference, yet it is unlikely that any of them will want to derail relations with China, especially in
inp: Les gouvernements occidentaux ont été taxés d’ingérence. Il est pourtant peu probable qu’aucun d’entre eux souhaite faire dérailler ses relations avec la Chine, surtout en temps de crise économique.
ref: Western governments have been accused of interference, but it is unlikely that any want to derail their relations with China, especially during an economic crisis.

cands: And the same is true of course of politics.
inp: Et il en est bien sûr de même avec la politique.
ref: The same, of course, has happened to politics.

cands: But if there is any basis for it, this case requires careful consideration.
inp: Maissi elle a quelque fondement, cette affaire demande une réflexion approfondie.
ref: Butif it happened, the case calls for a deeper reflection.

cands: However, this process is very complex because funds cannot be repatriated and rebalanced overnight.
inp: Ce processus est toutefois très complexe parce que les fonds ne peuvent être rapatriés et rééquilibrés du jour au lendemain.
ref: This challenge, however, is very complex because deleveraging and rebalancing cannot be completed overnight.

cands: Whether citizens will support politicians proposing labour market, tax and other reforms needed to improve mobility, and whether such reforms will be sufficient
inp: Est-ce que les citoyens soutiendront des politiciens proposant les réformes du marché du travail, de la fiscalité, et les autres réformes nécessaires à l’amélioration de la mobilité, et est-ce que de telles réformes seront suffisantes pour dépasser les barrières linguistiques et culturelles, restent des questions ouvertes.
ref: Whether citizens will support politicians who propose the labor, tax, and other reforms needed to enhance mobility, and whether such reforms will be sufficient to overcome linguistic and cultural barriers, are open questions.

cands: A turning point for the European Constitution
inp: Un tournant pour la Constitution européenne
ref: A Turning Point for Europe\u0027s Constitution

cands: Well, most of the candidate countries have already achieved a high degree of structural convergence with the EU.
inp: Eh bien, la plupart des pays candidats ont déjà atteint un degré élevé de convergence structurale avec l'UE.
ref: Well, most candidate countries have already achieved a high degree of structural convergence with the EU.

cands: There are at least four groups involved in this conflict: moderate and extremist Israelis and moderate and extremist Palestinians.
inp: Il y a au moins quatre groupes impliqués dans ce conflit : les Israéliens modérés et extrémistes et les Palestiniens modérés et extrémistes.
ref: There are at least four sides to this conflict: moderate and extremist Israelis and moderate and extremist Palestinians.

cands: The EU is now called upon to undertake complex missions in difficult circumstances.
inp: Il est aujourd’hui demandé à l’UE d’entreprendre des missions complexes dans des circonstances difficiles.
ref: Today, the EU is being asked to conduct complex missions in adverse circumstances.

cands: An important example has already been given by the decision to clarify the international ambiguity surrounding the Guantanamo detention centre, one of his first presidenti
inp: Un exemple important a déjà été donné par la décision clarifier le flou international autour du centre de détention de Guantanamo ; l’une des ses premières initiatives de président.
ref: An important example is removing the US prison at Guantánamo Bay from international limbo – one of his first initiatives as president.

cands: Without such guidance, the most competent scientists and administrators could be discouraged from taking responsibility.
inp: Sans cet encadrement, les scientifiques et les administrateurs les plus compétents pourraient être dissuadés de prendre des responsabilités.
ref: If they do not, the best qualified scientists and administrators might be frightened away.

cands: I declined the invitation of the then President of the Council on Human Rights, Ambassador Martin Uhomoibhi of Nigeria, to conduct the investigation following
inp: J’ai décliné l’invitation du président du Conseil sur les droits de l'homme à l'époque, M. Martin Uhomoibhi, ambassadeur du Nigeria, à mener l'investigation suite à la résolution du 12 janvier 2009 du Conseil sur les droits de l’homme. En tant qu’ancien haut-commissaire pour les droits de l’homme des Nations Unies, il me semblait clair que la résolution du Conseil était partiale et ne permettait pas une approche équilibrée pour évaluer la situation sur le terrain.
ref: I refused to accept the invitation from the president of the Human Rights Council at the time, Ambassador Martin Uhomoibhi of Nigeria, to lead the investigation following the Human Rights Council’s January 12, 2009 resolution. As a former UN High Commissioner for Human Rights, I felt strongly that the Council’s resolution was one-sided and did not permit a balanced approach to determining the situation on the ground.

cands: The most important thing is that developing countries, concerned about the competitiveness of their modern segments, have time to let their currency appreciate (in real terms)
inp: Le plus important est que les pays en développement, soucieux de la compétitivité de leurs segments modernes, aient le temps de laisser leur devise s’apprécier (en valeur réelle) cependant qu’ils ont accès à d’autres mesures qui mettent en avant les activités industrielles de manière plus directe.
ref: The key point is that developing countries that are concerned about the competitiveness of their modern sectors can afford to allow their currencies to appreciate (in real terms) as long as they have access to alternative policies that promote industrial activities more directly.

cands: It is also vital that vaccines arrive in the right place, at the right time, and in the right condition.
inp: Il est également vital que les vaccins arrivent au bon endroit, au bon moment, et en bon état.
ref: It is also vital to ensure that vaccines get to the right place, at the right time, and in the right condition.

cands: The question today is whether, with periods of crisis passing by and differing circumstances and perspectives from one country to another, the G20 is able
inp: La question aujourd’hui est de savoir si, avec les périodes de crise passant et des circonstances et perspectives divergentes d’un pays à l’autre, le G20 est en mesure de démontrer le leadership dont le monde a besoin pour répondre aux problèmes critiques actuels.
ref: The question today is whether, with the moment of crisis passing and countries’ circumstances and perspectives diverging, the G-20 can demonstrate the leadership the world needs in addressing its ongoing critical problems.

cands: But let us accept that the two-state solution will be adopted in the near future.
inp: Mais admettons que la solution de deux États soit adoptée dans un futur proche.
ref: But suppose a two-state solution were achieved in the not-too-remote future.

cands: The World Bank’s management has for too long imposed American concepts, most of which are totally inadequate for the poorest countries and people.
inp: La direction de la Banque mondiale a depuis trop longtemps imposé des concepts américains, la plupart du temps totalement inadéquats pour les pays et les populations les plus pauvres.
ref: For too long, the Bank’s leadership has imposed US concepts that are often utterly inappropriate for the poorest countries and their poorest people.

cands: The Pope also made a very successful visit to England in September.
inp: Le Pape a en outre effectué une visite très réussie en Angleterre en septembre.
ref: Moreover, the Pope made a very successful visit to Britain in September.

cands: It would be simple and inexpensive to compensate the fishing industry for the time it takes to switch to other activities.
inp: Le chalutage de fond devrait simplement être interdit. Il serait simple et peu onéreux de compenser l’industrie de la pêche le temps d’une transition vers d’autres activités.
ref: Bottom trawling should simply be outlawed; it would be simple and inexpensive to compensate the fishing industry during a transition to other activities.

cands: ·        Do nothing and let the drug traffickers impose
inp: ·        Ne rien faire et laisser les narcotrafiquants imposer leur anarchie à la société ;
ref: ·        Do nothing and let the drug gangs impose their lawlessness on society;

cands: Russia is also clearly suffering from an even deeper identity crisis.
inp: La Russie souffre aussi à l’évidence d’une crise d’identité encore plus profonde.
ref: Russia, meanwhile, is clearly suffering from an even deeper identity crisis.

cands: Is it because they think life is unfair and therefore have little confidence in those around them?
inp: Cela serait-il dû à ce qu'ils considèrent que la vie est injuste et qu'en conséquence ils ne font guère confiance à ceux qui sont autour d'eux ?
ref: Is that just because low-income people feel that life is unfair and therefore distrust those around them?

cands: And don't forget the Big One that will hit California one day.
inp: Sans oublier le Big One qui frappera un jour la Californie.
ref: The Big One will one day strike California.

cands: The occurrence of chemical attacks of the magnitude we are seeing in Syria is a game-changer.
inp: La survenance d’attaques chimiques d’une ampleur aussi grave que celle que nous constatons en Syrie change considérablement les règles du jeu.
ref: A chemical-weapons attack on the scale just seen in Syria must be deemed a game changer.

cands: Like many other economies, the British economy has lost £1.5 billion.
inp: A l’instar de bien d’autres économies, l’économie britannique a perdu 1,5 milliards de livres sterling.
ref: The British economy lost £1.5 billion, and others were similarly affected.

cands: In one country and then in another, this Machiavellian thinking, with its chain of simplifications and manipulations, has only been rebranded to
inp: Dans un pays puis dans l’autre, cette pensée manichéenne, avec son cortège de simplifications et de manipulations, n’a fait que subir un refaçonnage qui lui a permis de servir le nouveau pouvoir en place.
ref: In country after country, that Manichean mindset, with its oversimplifications and manipulations, was merely re-fashioned to serve the new people in power.

cands: Neurologists have also been able to use carefully targeted transcranial magnetic stimulation to surprisingly influence patients’ moral judgments – for example,
inp: Les neurologues sont également parvenus, au moyen de stimulations magnétiques transcraniennes soigneusement ciblées, d’influer de manière surprenante sur les jugements moraux de patients – en leur permettant par exemple de mentir plus facilement.
ref: Neuroscientists have even magnetically “zapped” carefully targeted areas of people’s brains to influence their moral judgments in surprising ways – for example, making it easier for them to lie.

cands: The higher the growth rate, the higher the revenues the government can accumulate without raising taxes; and higher revenues reduce the deficit.
inp: Plus le taux de croissance est élevé, plus les revenus que le gouvernement peut accumuler sans augmenter les taxes sont élevés ; et des revenus plus élevés permettent de réduire le déficit.
ref: The higher the growth rate, the more revenues the government will collect without raising tax rates; and higher revenues enable smaller deficits.

cands: Thus, at its inception, there was only one powerful body, the Security Council, on which the world's major military powers rested.
inp: Ainsi, à sa création, il n'existait qu'un seul puissant organisme, le Conseil de Sécurité, sur lequel reposaient les grandes puissances militaires mondiales.
ref: So, at its foundation, only one powerful body was introduced, the Security Council on which the world's great military powers sat.

cands: This does not necessarily imply that the proposed questionnaires are inaccurate, but rather that they are misinterpreted.
inp: Cela ne met pas nécessairement en cause les questionnaires proposés, mais leur interprétation.
ref: This does not necessarily reflect a problem with the performance of a screening questionnaire, but rather how these scales are used.

cands: This draft also includes an important provision to encourage open research, which would shift the current model of research towards sharing rather than secrecy.
inp: Ce projet inclut également une disposition importante destinée à encourager la recherche ouverte, ce qui orienterait le modèle actuel de la recherche vers le partage plutôt que le secret.
ref: His bill also contains an important provision aimed at encouraging open-source research, which would move the current research model away from secrecy toward sharing.

cands: Having suffered from the abusive practices of the secular Turkish state and recognising that human rights must be protected at all levels, the AKP
inp: Ayant souffert des pratiques abusives de l'État turc laïque et reconnaissant que les Droits de l'homme doivent être protégés à tous les niveaux, l'AKP s'est posé comme un interlocuteur crédible vis-à-vis de l'occident.
ref: Having suffered the oppressive practices of Turkey's "secular" state and recognizing that human rights must be protected across-the-board, the AKP emerged as a credible interlocutor with the West.

cands: Church bells will ring 350 times, 350 cyclists will circulate in cities and 350 trees will be planted in many places.
inp: Les cloches des églises sonneront 350 fois, 350 cyclistes circuleront dans les villes et 350 arbres seront plantés dans de nombreux endroits.
ref: Churches will ring bells 350 times, 350 cyclists will circle towns, and, in many places, 350 trees will be planted.

cands: Improving agricultural productivity would benefit rural areas and allow farmers to benefit from the Union’s growing wealth.
inp: L’amélioration de la productivité agricole bénéficierait aux zones rurales et permettrait aux fermiers de profiter de la richesse croissante de l’Union.
ref: Improved agricultural productivity would benefit rural areas and give farmers a comparative share in the Union’s growing wealth.

cands: But, beyond this well-known problem, something amazing has recently happened: carbon dioxide emissions in the US have fallen to their lowest level
inp: Mais au-delà de cette problématique bien connue, quelque chose d’incroyable s’est récemment produit : les émissions de dioxyde de carbone aux États-Unis ont diminué jusqu’à atteindre leur niveau le plus bas en 20 ans.
ref: But, beyond this well-trodden battlefield, something amazing has happened: Carbon-dioxide emissions in the United States have dropped to their lowest level in 20 years.

cands: Hu’s visit will likely be as successful as Wen’s.
inp: La visite de Hu sera sans doute aussi réussie que celle de Wen.
ref: Hu’s trip is likely follow the example set by Wen.

cands: A little further afield are the new social sciences, which study humans and societies.
inp: Un peu à l'écart se trouvent les nouvelles sciences sociales, qui étudient les humains et les sociétés.
ref: Slightly apart from these are the new social sciences, which deal with humans and societies.

cands: We must all understand that saving our planet, lifting people out of poverty and improving economic growth are one and the same battle, and we must link the
inp: Nous devons tous comprendre que sauver notre planète, extraire les populations de la pauvreté, et améliorer la croissance économique constituent une seule et unique bataille. Nous devons lier les questions du changement climatique, de la rareté de l’eau, des pénuries énergétiques, de la santé globale, de la sécurité alimentaire et du renforcement du pouvoir des femmes.
ref: The first and greatest of these imperatives is sustainable development. We all must understand that saving our planet, lifting people out of poverty, and advancing economic growth are one and the same fight. We must connect the dots between climate change, water scarcity, energy shortages, global health, food security, and women’s empowerment. Solutions to one problem must be solutions for all.

cands: Will we be prepared to take them if they become available one day?
inp: Serons-nous prêts à en prendre si elles deviennent disponibles un jour ?
ref: Will we want to take them if they ever become available?

cands: Unless the ADB member governments reverse their current policies, they too will be blamed for ignoring the urgent needs of the poor.
inp: À moins que les gouvernements membres de la BAD n’inversent ses politiques actuelles, eux aussi se verront reprocher d’avoir ignoré les besoins urgents des pauvres.
ref: Unless the ADB’s member governments reverse its current policies, they, too, will be blamed for ignoring the urgent needs of the poor.

cands: In some cases, appropriate government action could even double or triple their food production in a few years.
inp: Dans certains cas, des gestes gouvernementaux appropriés pourraient même permettre de doubler ou tripler leur production alimentaire en quelques années.
ref: In some cases, with appropriate government action, they could double or even triple food production in just a few years.

cands: The G8 announcement reflects these years of effort, not to mention the leadership provided by President Barack Obama, Spanish Prime Minister Jose Luis Zapatero
inp: L’annonce faite au G8 est le reflet de ces années d’effort, sans oublier bien sûr l’impulsion donnée par le président Barack Obama, le premier ministre espagnol Jose Luis Zapatero, le premier ministre australien Kevin Rudd, le président de la Banque mondiale Robert Zoellick, le commissaire européen Louis Michel, le parlementaire Thijs Berman et tant d’autres.
ref: The G-8 announcement reflects these years of effort, and of course the boost from the leadership of US President Barack Obama, Spanish Prime Minister Jose Luis Zapatero, Australian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd, World Bank President Robert Zoellick, European Commissioner Louis Michel, European Parliamentarian Thijs Berman, and others.

cands: Even the nationalization of Yukos’ assets may mean little more than a lack of other buyers, given political obstacles, legal constraints
inp: Même la nationalisation des actifs de Ioukos ne signifie peut-être guère plus qu’une absence d’autres acheteurs, compte tenu des obstacles politiques, et des contraintes légales et des problèmes de réputation pour les investisseurs étrangers.
ref: Even the nationalization of Yukos’s assets may reflect little more than the absence of alternative buyers, given the obvious political obstacle passing those assets on to other domestic private-sector players (i.e., oligarchs), and the legal and reputational barriers to foreign investors.

cands: A project of such importance can only be carried out in coordination with a strong political will.
inp: Un projet d'une telle importance ne peut être mené à bien qu'en coordination avec une volonté politique qui s'affirme.
ref: Such a grand project can be achieved if the political will exists and asserts itself.

cands: Any delay in implementing reforms will ultimately slow down the process of real convergence that EU officials rightly cherish.
inp: Tout retard pris dans la mise en oeuvre de réformes ralentira en fin de compte le processus de convergence réelle que les officiels de l'UE chérissent à juste titre.
ref: Any delay in completing reforms will ultimately slow the process of real convergence that EU officials rightly hold dear.

cands: When the Atlantic community is united, it can achieve great things.
inp: Quand la communauté atlantique est unie, elle peut réaliser des exploits.
ref: Great achievements are possible when the Atlantic community is united.

cands: A privately funded initiative led by the State Department will send 300 frogs to Japan this spring to be planted in the tsunami-affected
inp: Une initiative financée de manière privée menée par le Département d’Etat va envoyer 300 cornouillers au Japon ce printemps, pour être plantés dans la région affectée par le tsunami et à Tokyo pour exprimer le soutien du peuple américain au peuple japonais. Une autre enverra des enseignants d’anglais dans toute l’Asie du Sud-Est.
ref: One privately-funded initiative spearheaded by the State Department will send 300 dogwood trees to Japan this spring, to be planted in the tsunami-affected region and in Tokyo to express the American people’s support for the Japanese people; another will send English teachers throughout Southeast Asia.

cands: This is good news, but what is really needed is aggressive and multifaceted reform of the regulatory process so that all new genetic constructions have a
inp: C’est une bonne nouvelle, mais ce qui est vraiment nécessaire est une réforme agressive et à multiples facettes du processus de réglementation pour que toutes les nouvelles constructions génétiques aient une chance de réussite.
ref: This is good news, but what is really needed is a multi-faceted, aggressive reform of the regulatory process so that all new genetic constructions will have a chance to succeed.

cands: This is necessary to prevent more private debt from being placed on governments’ balance sheets, which would cause a fiscal breakdown.
inp: Ceci est nécessaire afin d’éviter que davantage de dette privée ne se retrouve sur le bilan des gouvernements, ce qui causerait un éclatement fiscal.
ref: This is needed to prevent even more private debt being put on government balance sheets, causing a fiscal blowout.

cands: Skills were lost, and the unemployed were mostly stigmatized and demoralised. A famous 1933 study of the Austrian city of Mariental by
inp: Les compétences ont été perdues, et les chômeurs étaient pour la plupart stigmatisés et démoralisés.  Une étude réputée de 1933 sur la ville autrichienne de Mariental effectuée par le sociologue Paul Lazarsfeld faisait un bien triste portrait de cette situation.
ref: Skills were lost, and the hard core of unemployed were stigmatized and demoralized. An influential 1933 study of the Austrian town of Marienthal by the sociologist Paul Lazarsfeld painted this dismal picture in detail.

cands: Palestinian extremists have vowed to fight until Israel, perceived as a colonialist abuse of the Islamic world, is destroyed.
inp: Les extrémistes palestiniens ont juré de se battre jusqu'à ce qu'Israël, perçu comme un abus colonialiste sur le monde islamique, soit détruit.
ref: Extremist Palestinians vow to fight until Israel--viewed as a colonial imposition on the Islamic world--is destroyed.

cands: By holding these commemorations on Red Square, thereby highlighting the Soviet victory, today's Russia is also celebrating the benefits it has gained
inp: En organisant ces commémorations sur la Place Rouge, soulignant ainsi la victoire soviétique, la Russie d'aujourd'hui célèbre également les avantages qu'elle a retirés de cette guerre.
ref: By holding these celebrations in Red Square, and thus highlighting the Soviet victory, today’s Russia is also celebrating its gains in that war.

cands: MONROVIA, Liberia – The 27 members of the High-level Panel of Eminent Persons on the Post-2015 Development Agenda, which advises UN
inp: MONROVIA, LIBÉRIA – Les 27 membres du Panel de haut niveau des éminentes personnalités sur l’Agenda pour le développement post-2015, chargé de conseiller le Secrétaire général des Nations unies Ban Ki-moon, se réunira à Monrovia, au Libéria, cette semaine.
ref: MONROVIA, LIBERIA – This week, the 27 members of the High-level Panel of Eminent Persons on the Post-2015 Development Agenda gather in Monrovia, Liberia, to advise United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.

cands: It should be possible for both parties to respect each other’s positions, without abandoning their own, and to find common ground.
inp: Il devrait être possible à chacune des deux parties de respecter les positions de l’autre, sans abandonner les siennes, et de trouver un terrain d’entente.
ref: It should be possible for each side to respect the other’s position without abandoning its ownand to find common ground.

cands: Financing the next development agenda
inp: Financer le prochain programme de développement
ref: Financing the Next Development Agenda

cands: But it would be extremely irresponsible not to seize the unexpected opportunity created by the election of Rohani with all the will, good faith and creativit
inp: Mais il serait extrêmement irresponsable de ne pas saisir l’occasion inattendue créée par l’élection de Rohani, avec toute la volonté, la bonne foi et la créativité dont nous pouvons faire preuve.
ref: But it would be the height of irresponsibility not to seize the unexpected opportunity created by Rowhani’s election with all the strength, good faith, and creativity we can muster.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a century.
inp: Bien sûr, ce n’était peut-être que le temps ; un été splendide s’est enfin installé après un printemps maussade.
ref: Of course, it could simply have been the weather; a gorgeous summer has finally settled in after a miserable spring.

cands: I suppose Donald Rumsfeld’s good idea a few years ago, his attempt to divide Europe into an “old” and a “young” Europe
inp: Je suppose que la bonne idée qu’a eue Donald Rumsfeld il y a quelques années, je veux parler de sa tentative de mettre la division entre une “vieille” et une “jeune” Europe, n’est pas étrangère à la réapparition de cette attitude de dédain.
ref: I suppose that Donald Rumsfeld’s misguided bid a few years ago to incite a divide between “new and old” Europe contributed to the re-emergence of that disdainful attitude.

cands: The main objectives of employment, growth and research are considered legitimate from an equal standpoint when they are described in general terms.
inp: Les objectifs principaux d’emploi, de croissance et de recherches sont considérés comme légitimes d’un point de vue égalitaire quand on les décrit en termes généraux.
ref: The main targets – jobs, growth, and research – are considered legitimate from the standpoint of fairness when described in general terms.

cands: He was, in the true sense of the word, a "self-made man" whose courage, ambition, dynamism and deep faith in his destin
inp: Il était, dans le vrai sens du terme, un " self-made man ", dont le courage, l'ambition, le dynamisme et une foi profonde dans son destin ont mené au sommet.
ref: He was, in the true sense of the word, a self-made man, whose pluck, ambition, drive and inner belief in his destiny carried him to the pinnacle of his achievements.

cands: It must be based on a well-thought-out global citizenship, a system of conscious responsibilities that we already assume and rights that we already
inp: Celle-ci doit reposer sur un civisme mondial mûrement réfléchi, soit un système composé de responsabilités conscientes que nous assumons déjà et des droits qui s’y rapportent et exigeons déjà.
ref: That framework has to be based on global civics, a system of conscious responsibilities that we are ready to take on – and corresponding rights that we are ready to claim – after due deliberation.

cands: Knowledge, scientific advances, travel and global communications offer us many opportunities to find solutions to the world's major problems.
inp: Les connaissances, les avancées scientifiques, les voyages et les communications mondiales nous offrent de nombreuses opportunités pour trouver des solutions aux problèmes majeurs du monde.
ref: Knowledge, scientific advance, travel, and global communications give us many opportunities to find solutions for the world's great problems.

cands: Near the Russian border, a form of criminalized diplomacy is taking root.
inp: Près des frontières russes, une forme de diplomatie criminalisée est en train de s'enraciner.
ref: Across Russia’s near abroad, a form of criminalized diplomacy is taking root.

cands: It is possible that one day the Arab States will agree among themselves on the usefulness of a tactic whereby the creation of a Palestinian State that com
inp: Il est possible qu'un jour les États arabes s'accordent entre eux quant à l'utilité d'une tactique où la création d'un État palestinien qui s'engagerait à mener une existence pacifique aux côtés d'Israël semblerait salutaire.
ref: It is possible that at some point the Arabs will agree among themselves that the creation of a Palestinian state that claims to be committed to peaceful coexistence with Israel will be a useful tactic.

cands: But it is not the rise in oil prices per se that will lead the ECB to take advantage of the interest rate slump.
inp: Mais ce n’est pas la hausse des prix du pétrole en elle-même qui va entraîner la BCE à tirer sur la gâchette des taux d’intérêt.
ref: But higher energy prices, by themselves, will not cause the ECB to pull the interest-rate trigger.

cands: Obama blurred his message by adding that he did not expect nuclear weapons to disappear in his lifetime.
inp: Obama a brouillé son message en ajoutant qu'il ne s'attendait pas à voir la disparition de l'armement nucléaire au cours de son existence.
ref: Obama muddled his message further by admitting that he did not expect to see abolition in his lifetime.

cands: This is due to the imperfection inherent in psychiatric diagnosis.
inp: C'est dû à l'imperfection inhérente au diagnostic psychiatrique.
ref: Such is the nature of the imperfect reliability of psychiatric diagnosis.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a century, and has been a major contributor to the world economy since the early
inp: BRUXELLES – Nul n’ignore ce dicton bien souvent utilisé dans l’interprétation des relations internationales, selon lequel les ennemis de mon ennemi seraient mes amis.
ref: BRUSSELS – There is a saying, too often used in interpreting international relations, that my enemy’s enemy is my friend.

cands: Growth alone is not enough to ensure poverty reduction in the Asia-Pacific region.
inp: La croissance en soi ne suffit pas à garantir la réduction de la pauvreté dans la région Asie/Pacifique.
ref: Growth on its own is not sufficient to guarantee poverty reduction in Asia and the Pacific.

cands: The Internet, one of the great inventions of the modern Western world, has proved to be a very effective weapon in incentivizing and training those who
inp: Internet, l’une des grandes inventions du monde moderne occidental, s’est révélé être une arme très efficace dans l’incitation et la formation de ceux qui entendent faire le mal autour du monde.
ref: The Internet, one of the great inventions of the modern Western world, has shown itself to be a weapon that can be used to incite and train those who wish to cause harm to that world.

cands: The latter represent a crucial opportunity for the international community to set clear and binding standards of behaviour for states and businesses.
inp: Ces derniers constituent une occasion cruciale offerte à la communauté internationale pour fixer des normes de comportement claires et contraignantes pour les Etats et les entreprises.
ref: The SDGs offer a critical opportunity for the world to set clear, compelling standards for government and corporate behavior.

cands: Yes, India’s economy has slowed down considerably, the rupee has collapsed, and scandals and demonstrations are making headlines.
inp: Oui, l’économie indienne s’est considérablement ralentie, la roupie s’est effondrée, et les scandales et les manifestations font les gros titres de la presse.
ref: Yes, India’s economy has slowed sharply, the rupee has plunged, and scandals and protests dominate the headlines.

cands: Ironically, it is the business world that is slow to accept this generational renewal.
inp: Ironiquement, c’est le monde des affaires qui tarde à accepter ce renouvellement générationnel.
ref: Ironically, it is the world of business that remains slow to change.

cands: Let us call on the rich and powerful to take concrete action to help the poor, the weak and the suffering.
inp: Engageons-nous à ce que les riches et les puissants prennent des actions concrètes pour aider les pauvres, les faibles et les personnes qui souffrent.
ref: Let us pledge that the rich and powerful should take real actions to help the poor, the weak, and the suffering.

cands: Reducing unemployment is, of course, desirable, but many terrorists are not born of poverty.
inp: La réduction du chômage est bien sûr souhaitable, mais beaucoup de terroristes ne sont pas issus de la pauvreté.
ref: Reducing unemployment is desirable, of course, but many terrorists do not come from poverty.

cands: The question raised in October 2003 by US Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld still makes sense today: "Are we catching, killing, deter
inp: La question soulevée en octobre 2003 par le Secrétaire américain de la Défense, Donald Rumsfeld, garde aujourd’hui encore tout son sens : « Sommes-nous chaque jour en train de capturer, de tuer, de dissuader et de décourager davantage de terroristes que les madrasas et les radicaux religieux ne sont en train d’en recruter, d’entraîner et de déployer contre nous ? » Toutes choses étant égales par ailleurs, c’est probablement ce que nous faisons.
ref: The question raised in October 2003 by then US Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld is no less relevant today: “Are we capturing, killing, or deterring and dissuading more terrorists every day than the madrassas and the radical clerics are recruiting, training, and deploying against us?” All things being equal, we probably are.

cands: The US has a long history of being a major contributor to global warming, and it is a major contributor to global warming.
inp: Même la part qui n’est pas financée par le gouvernement ne constitue par un marché classique ; la plupart des achats de prescriptions par les particuliers étant couverts par les assurances.
ref: Even the part that is not government-financed is not a conventional market; most individuals’ purchases of prescription medicines are covered by insurance.

cands: GAZA – This was supposed to be my first year of medical school.
inp: GAZA – Ce devait être ma première année d'école de médecine.
ref: GAZA – This was supposed to be my first year of medical school.

cands: There is not much more risk of future large corrective price swings as the vast majority of prices are fully liberalised.
inp: Il n'existe pas beaucoup plus de risques de futures grandes oscillations correctives des prix étant donné que la quasi-majorité des prix est complètement libéralisée.
ref: Nor is there much risk of large, future corrective price swings because all but a few prices are completely liberalized.

cands: The NPT has, of course, been violated or circumvented on numerous occasions by States that have never signed it.
inp: Le TNP a bien sûr été violé ou contourné à de multiples reprises par les États qui ne l’ont jamais signé.
ref: Of course, the NPT has repeatedly been violated or circumvented by states that never subscribed to it.

cands: At the Rio+20 Summit in June, world governments agreed to adopt a new set of sustainable development goals for the period after 2015, building on the success of
inp: Au Sommet de Rio+20 en juin dernier, les gouvernements du monde ont convenu d’adopter un nouvel ensemble d’objectifs de développement durable pour la période après 2015, pour construire sur la réussite des objectifs du Millénaire pour le développement dans le but de réduire la pauvreté, la famine et les maladies.
ref: At the Rio+20 Summit this past June, the world’s governments agreed to adopt a new set of goals on sustainable development for the period after 2015, to build upon the Millennium Development Goals’ success in reducing poverty, hunger, and disease.

cands: They are free to choose, and the European stock exchanges are an attractive alternative.
inp: Ils sont libres de leur choix et les Bourses européennes constituent une alternative séduisante.
ref: They're free to choose where to put their money. Europe's stock markets will begin to look like an attractive alternative.

cands: Despite uncertainties about the President's intentions, this is still possible.
inp: Malgré des incertitudes quant aux intentions du président, cela reste encore possible.
ref: Despite uncertainty about Putin’s intentions, that prize is not out of reach.

cands: But the US has not yet been able to take the lead in the battle against the Chinese military.
inp: Si Fukuda a abandonné les discussions qu'avaient entamées Abe au sujet d'un "arc de la liberté" - dans le but de rassembler en un bloc solidaire les USA, l'Australie et l'Inde - le Japon reste préoccupé par l'armée chinoise qui se modernise à grands pas.
ref: Fukuda has dropped Abe’s talk about an “arch of freedom” – an effort to forge a bloc with the United States, Australia, and India.

cands: If there is anyone who is "holding the brakes", it is Mr Berlusconi himself.
inp: S’il y a « quelqu’un qui appuie sur le frein », c’est bien M. Berlusconi lui-même.
ref: If anyone is “pushing down on the Italian growth brake” it is Berlusconi himself.

cands: They do not provide solutions to current economic and social problems, nor do they represent a new societal approach for Europe towards its Mediterranean neighbours
inp: Ils n’apportent pas de solutions aux problèmes économiques et sociaux actuels, ni ne représentent une nouvelle approche sociétale de l’Europe envers ses voisins méditerranéens.
ref: They do not address today’s social or economic problems, nor do they signal a new society-oriented approach by Europe towards its Mediterranean neighbors.

cands: China’s leaders, for their part, will want to know why the market-economy champions in Washington are threatening protectionism.
inp: Les responsables chinois, pour leur part, voudront savoir pourquoi les champions de l’économie de marché à Washington brandissent la menace du protectionnisme.
ref: China’s leadership, for its part, will want to know why free-market champions in Washington are threatening more protectionism.

cands: Student groups are now forming on many campuses, and a handful of major schools and universities have already committed to stopping fossil fuel investment.
inp: Des groupes d’étudiants se forment aujourd’hui sur de nombreux campus, et une poignée de grandes écoles et universités se sont d’ores et déjà engagées à cesser d’investir dans les combustibles fossiles.
ref: Student groups have formed on many campuses, and a handful of colleges and universities have already pledged to end their investment in fossil fuels.

cands: SDRs are extremely complicated and difficult to understand, but they are used in summary to create money at the international level.
inp: Les DTS sont extrêmement compliqués et difficiles à comprendre, mais ils servent en résumé à créer de la monnaie au niveau international.
ref: SDRs are highly complicated and difficult to grasp, but they boil down to the international creation of money.

cands: In the negotiations on the Bonn Agreements in 2001, Iran acted pragmatically and sought to achieve results – a positive approach for which the United States
inp: Lors de la négociation des Accords de Bonn en 2001, l’Iran s’est comporté de manière pragmatique et a cherché à obtenir des résultats – une approche positive pour laquelle les Etats-Unis n’ont offert aucune contrepartie.
ref: During the Afghanistan conference in Bonn in 2001, Iran behaved in a pragmatic, results-oriented way – an approach that went completely unrewarded by the US.

cands: Sustainable results require more informed foreign policies that respond to the legitimate concerns of crisis-ridden civilizations.
