inp: Pour des résultats durables, il faut mener des politiques étrangères plus éclairées, capables de répondre aux préoccupations légitimes de civilisations en crise.
ref: Only better-informed foreign policies that can address the genuine anxieties of civilizations in crisis will yield more sustainable results.

cands: They are also less likely to follow the flow – to buy or sell because everyone else is buying or selling.
inp: Ces gestionnaires ont aussi moins tendance à suivre le mouvement – à acheter ou vendre parce que tout le monde achète ou vend.
ref: This means that they have less incentive to herd – to buy or sell a currency just because everyone else is buying or selling it.

cands: They could even make a positive contribution to European integration by recognising the merits of an electoral college.
inp: Ils pourraient même contribuer positivement à la construction européenne en reconnaissant les mérites d'un collège électoral.
ref: Beyond that, they can do genuine good by recognizing the merit of the proposal for an electoral college.

cands: But do not count on a stable euro-dollar exchange rate – much less an even stronger euro – for the coming year.
inp: Mais ne comptez sur un taux de change euro-dollar stable – et encore moins sur un euro encore plus fort – pour l'année à venir.
ref: But don’t count on a stable euro-dollar exchange rate – much less an even stronger euro – in the year ahead.

cands: The main objective of the ADB, however, seems to be to increase private sector support from 15% to 50% of total banking operations.
inp: Le principal objectif de la BAD, cependant, semble être de faire passer le soutien par le secteur privé de 15% à 50% des opérations bancaires totales.
ref: ADB’s major goal, however, seems to be to scale up private-sector support from 15% to 50% of total bank operations.

cands: In the United States, the US has a stronger economy than the European Union, and the US has a stronger economy than the European Union.
inp: Au total, l'équation montre du côté positif plus d'emploi maintenant, 500 milliards $ en consommation accrue de biens et services pour les deux années qui suivent et un flux annuel accru de 40 milliards $ de revenu et de production par la suite.
ref: In sum, on the benefits side of the equation: more jobs now, $500 billion of additional consumption of goods and services over the next two years, and then a $40 billion a year flow of higher incomes and production each year thereafter.

cands: We must establish and enforce laws that restore the credibility of the financial markets.
inp: Nous devons établir et appliquer des lois qui restaurent la crédibilité des marchés financiers.
ref: We must write and enforce laws that restore credibility to our financial markets.

cands: China’s officials ridiculed proposals to negotiate with Tibetan exiles live on a national TV channel last November.
inp: En direct sur une chaîne nationale en novembre dernier, des officiels chinois ont ridiculisé les propositions de négociation d’exilés tibétains.
ref: In November, Chinese officials, live on national TV, ridiculed Tibetan exiles’ proposals for negotiation.

cands: In essence, the form of government we want for Germany and the rest of Europe is based on moral discourse and decisions rather than abstract political concepts supposed
inp: En substance, la forme de gouvernement que nous voulons pour l'Allemagne et pour le reste de l'Europe est basée sur un discours et des décisions fondés sur la morale plutôt que sur des concepts politiques abstraits supposés exprimer une soi-disant vérité éternelle.
ref: In essence, the form of government we seek within Germany and across Europe is built on a sense of moral discourse and moral decision-making rather than on the supposedly eternal truth of some abstract political concept.

cands: Some see Khan's network as an effort to spread an "Islamic bomb," but since North Korea is on the list of beneficiaries, along with
inp: Certains considèrent le réseau de Khan comme un effort pour diffuser une " bombe islamique " mais dans la mesure où la Corée du Nord fait partie de la liste des bénéficiaires, avec la Libye et l'Iran, on ferait mieux de l'appeler la bombe de la corruption.
ref: Some call Khan's network an effort to spread an "Islamic bomb," but given that North Korea was on the list of recipients along with Libya and Iran, it might better be termed a corrupt bomb.

cands: The US has been a major contributor to the global economy for more than a decade.
inp: PRISON DE LUKYANIVSKA, KIEV - Il n’y a pas d’athées dans les tranchées ; c’est ce que dit le fameux adage.
ref: LUKYANIVSKA PRISON, KYIV – It has been said that there are no atheists in a foxhole.

cands: NEW YORK – After a fierce election campaign that cost more than $2 billion, many observers feel that little has changed in American politics: Obama
inp: NEW-YORK – Après une campagne électorale féroce qui a coûté plus de 2 milliards de dollars, beaucoup d'observateurs ont l'impression que la vie politique américaine n'a guère changé. Obama est toujours président, les républicains contrôlent toujours la Chambre des représentants, tandis que les démocrates conservent la majorité au Sénat.
ref: NEW YORK – After a hard-fought election campaign, costing well in excess of $2 billion, it seems to many observers that not much has changed in American politics: Barack Obama is still President, the Republicans still control the House of Representatives, and the Democrats still have a majority in the Senate.

cands: But Bush, after the terrorist attacks of 2001, turned away from conservatism and sought to radically reinvent the Middle East, not only by over
inp: Mais Bush, après les attaques terroristes de 2001, s’est détourné du conservatisme. Il a cherché à réinventer radicalement le Moyen-Orient, pas seulement en renversant le régime taliban en Afghanistan et celui de Saddam Hussein en Irak, mais aussi par le biais de son appel acharné à la démocratisation.
ref: But Bush, following the terrorist attacks of 2001, turned his back on conservatism.  He sought to radically reinvent the Middle East, not only by overthrowing the Taliban regime in Afghanistan and Saddam Hussein’s regime in Iraq, but also through his strident calls for democratization.

cands: An argument is all the more valid if it is put forward in a posed way – and if it values those to whom it is addressed.
inp: Un argument est d'autant plus valable s’il est exposé posément – et valorise ceux à qui il s'adresse.
ref: It dignifies an argument – and those to whom it is addressed – to set it out thoughtfully.

cands: If the President of the Supreme Court and the judges are reinvested, we can move towards a true democratic system.
inp: Si le président de la Cour suprême et les juges sont réinvestis, nous pourrons nous diriger vers un vrai système démocratique.
ref: If the Chief Justice and the judges are reinstated, we can move toward a genuine democratic system.

cands: Today, the opposition to the new START Treaty is fuelled by the same fears.
inp: Aujourd'hui les mêmes appréhensions nourrissent l'opposition au nouveau traité START.
ref: Today, similar apprehensions stoke opposition to New START.

cands: The US is likely to face a similar situation in the near future, with the eurozone’s central banks likely to be more likely to default on their
inp: Selon une étude récente de Goldman Sachs, le niveau des prix du pays devrait baisser d’environ 20 % par rapport à la moyenne de l’euro – c’est-à-dire se déprécier en valeur réelle – pour que l’économie retrouve une compétitivité au sein de la zone euro.
ref: According to a recent study by Goldman Sachs, the country’s price level must drop by an estimated 20% vis-à-vis the euro average – that is, depreciate in real terms – if the economy is to regain competitiveness within the eurozone.

cands: Another IMF accounting aberration concerns the stabilization funds.
inp: Une autre aberration comptable du FMI concerne les fonds de stabilisation.
ref: A second IMF accounting distortion involves stabilization funds.

cands: Greece is clearly insolvent.
inp: La Grèce est manifestement insolvable.
ref: Greece is clearly insolvent.

cands: In 1998, when France won the Cup for the first time, the three colours of the French flag (blue, white, red) were celebrated in
inp: En 1998, lorsque la France a remporté la Coupe pour la première fois, les trois couleurs du drapeau français (bleu, blanc, rouge) furent célébrées au même titre que les trois couleurs (noir, blanc etbeur, cette dernière évoquant les Nord-africains nés en France de parents immigrés) des membres de l’équipe française.
ref: In 1998, when France won the Cup for the first time, the three colors of the French flag (blue, white, and red) were celebrated alongside with the three colors (“black, white, andbeur,the skin color of North Africans born in France to immigrant parents) of the members of the French team.

cands: Generally speaking, accession to nuclear power status is achieved through so-called "civilian" nuclear programmes.
inp: En règle générale, l’accession au statut de puissance nucléaire passe par des programmes nucléaires dits « civils ».
ref: As a rule, the path to nuclear-power status always begins with so-called “civilian” nuclear programs.

cands: It is also not appropriate to reduce public and private spending to increase private savings and to apply fiscal austerity measures.
inp: Diminuer les dépenses publiques et privées pour accroître l'épargne privée et appliquer des mesures d'austérité budgétaire ne convient pas non plus.
ref: Lowering private and public consumption in order to boost private savings, and implementing fiscal austerity to reduce private and public debts, aren’t options, either.

cands: But does the value of a work excuse artists and intellectuals who have been tainted by the rejection of their past conduct, and can ordina
inp: Mais la valeur d’une œuvre excuse-t-elle des artistes et des intellectuels salis par l’abjection de leur conduite passée? Peut-on, à l’inverse, stigmatiser des gens ordinaires pour des délits souvent moins graves?
ref: But can we justifiably defend morally compromised artists and intellectuals on the basis of their work’s merit, yet condemn ordinary people for often less grave offenses?

cands: Some believe that a nuclear Iran is the worst of all possible scenarios, even worse than the consequences of a preventive strike.
inp: Certains sont convaincus qu’un Iran nucléaire est le pire de tous les scénarios possibles, pire encore que les répercussions d’une frappe préventive.
ref: Some are convinced that a nuclear Iran is the worst of all possible scenarios, worse even than the fall-out from a pre-emptive strike.

cands: It incorporates what is most important to achieving a peaceful state and society: commitments to peace and state-building to improve the participation of national
inp: Il intègre ce qui importe le plus pour parvenir à un Etat et à une société pacifiés : des engagements en faveur de la paix et du renforcement de l'Etat pour améliorer la participation des partenaires nationaux et internationaux des pays affectées par la violence et une trop grande fragilité de l’Etat.
ref: It enshrines what matters most in building peaceful states and societies: commitments – the Peace- and State-building Goals – to improve how national and international partners engage in conflict-affected and fragile contexts.

cands: The reorganisation of the world order must go beyond the financial system alone and include the United Nations, and above all the Security Council.
inp: La réorganisation de l’ordre mondial devra aller au-delà du seul système financier et devra inclure les Nations Unies, et surtout le Conseil de Sécurité.
ref: Reorganizing the world order will need to extend beyond the financial system and involve the United Nations, especially membership of the Security Council.

cands: And with housing prices continuing to fall, GDP growth shaking, and unemployment still desperately high (one in six Americans who would
inp: Et avec le prix de l'immobilier qui continue à chuter, la croissance du PIB qui est vacillante et un taux de chômage qui reste désespérément élevé (un Américain sur six qui voudrait un emploi à temps plein n'en a pas), ce n'est pas l'austérité mais davantage de relance qui serait souhaitable - et cela irait aussi dans le sens d'un redressement budgétaire.
ref: And, with housing prices continuing to fall, GDP growth faltering, and unemployment remaining stubbornly high (one of six Americans who would like a full-time job still cannot get one), more stimulus, not austerity, is needed – for the sake of balancing the budget as well.

cands: The Chinese have thus come to accept Chu and Locke in a contradictory way: as high-level representatives of the US government on the one
inp: C’est ainsi que les Chinois ont fini par accepter Chu et Locke de manière contradictoire : d’une part comme représentants de haut niveau du gouvernement américain et de l’autre comme des compatriotes avec lesquels ils partagent le lien de leur ethnicité commune.
ref: So, the Chinese ended up embracing Chu and Locke in contradictory ways: as high-ranking representatives of the US government and as compatriots with whom they share the common bond of Chinese-ness.

cands: Indeed, the study could well underestimate the impact: for example, climate change would lead to time instability, the possible disappearance of the
inp: En fait, cette étude pourrait même nettement sous-estimer les répercussions : par exemple, le changement climatique entraînerait une instabilité du temps, la disparition éventuelle du Gulf Stream – particulièrement préoccupante pour l’Europe – et la prolifération de maladies.
ref: Indeed, the study may actually significantly underestimate the costs: for instance, climate change may lead to more weather variability, a possible disappearance or major shift of the Gulf Stream – of particular concern to Europe – and a flourishing of disease.

cands: Moreover, both candidates embody continuity (with Chirac and the left for Sarkozy and with François Mitterrand’s socialism for Royal) as
inp: En outre, les deux candidats incarnent la continuité (avec Chirac et le gaullisme pour Sarkozy et avec le socialisme de François Mitterrand pour Royal) autant que la rupture.
ref: Moreover, both candidates embody continuity – with Chirac’s Gaullist side for Sarkozy and with François Mitterrand for Royal – as much as rupture.

cands: Instead of writing for literary critics, they began to use simpler language, inserting phrases from Indian phrases.
inp: Plutôt que d’écrire pour les critiques littéraires, ils ont commencé à utiliser un langage plus simple, en insérant des tournures de phrase indiennes.
ref: Rather than write for literary critics, they began to use a simpler language, including Indian turns of phrase.

cands: The eight Millennium Development Goals were adopted in 2000 at a UN meeting where leaders agreed to halve extreme poverty and undernutrition; and also to fight disease
inp: Les huit objectifs du Millénaire pour le développement ont été adoptés en l’an 2000, lors d’une réunion aux Nations unies où les dirigeants se sont entendus pour abaisser de moitié la pauvreté extrême et la sous-alimentation; et aussi combattre les maladies, améliorer l’assainissement des eaux potables et usées, développer l’éducation et renforcer l’autonomie des jeunes filles et des femmes.
ref: The eight MDGs were adopted in the year 2000, when leaders meeting at the United Nations agreed to cut extreme poverty and hunger by half, fight disease, improve water safety and sanitation, expand education, and empower girls and women.

cands: This has been a revolutionary change, but is this 20-year trend expected to continue?
inp: Ceci a constitué un changement révolutionnaire. Mais cette tendance de 20 ans est-elle censée continuer ?
ref: This has been a revolutionary change, but will this 20-year-old trend continue?

cands: Two items are therefore to be at the top of the global economic agenda in the coming months.
inp: Deux points doivent ainsi figurer en tête de liste de l’ordre du jour économique mondial dans les mois à venir.
ref: So, two crucial items must claim priority at the top of the world’s economic agenda in the months ahead.

cands: The necessary political framework must be a regional framework and, fortunately, it exists.
inp: Le cadre politique indispensable doit être un cadre régional et, par chance, il existe.
ref: The necessary political framework also needs to be regional and, fortunately, it exists.

cands: The Thai population has also changed.
inp: La population thaïlandaise a aussi changé.
ref: Thailand’s demographics also changed.

cands: Politicians do not really listen to individual scientists, but they are forced to listen when hundreds of scientists speak with one voice.
inp: Les politiciens n’écoutent pas vraiment les scientifiques individuels, mais ils sont obligés d’écouter quand des centaines de scientifiques parlent d’une même voix.
ref: Politicians don’t listen very well to individual scientists, but they are forced to listen when hundreds of scientists speak with a united voice.

cands: That is why no one in the Union has to fear that the Czech Republic will try to impose any nostalgic or particularist programme on it.
inp: C’est pourquoi personne dans l’Union n’a à craindre de la République Tchèque qu’elle tente de lui imposer un quelconque programme nostalgique ou particulariste.
ref: So no one in Europe needs to fear that the Czech Republic has some nostalgic or idiosyncratic agenda that it wants to impose on the Union.

cands: The participants included nomads, farmers and students, who in theory should have been very grateful to China for modernizing their country’s economy.
inp: Ont pris part : des nomades, des fermiers et des étudiants, qui auraient en théorie dus être très reconnaissants à la Chine d’avoir modernisé l’économie de leur pays.
ref: Participants included nomads, farmers, and students, who in theory should have been the most grateful to China for modernizing Tibet’s economy.

cands: It turns out that the complaints were duly dropped and the case could have been stifled if President Obama, frustrated and tired after weeks
inp: Il se trouve que les plaintes ont dûment été abandonnées et que l’affaire aurait pu être étouffée si le président Obama, frustré et fatigué après des semaines de combat pour réformer le système de santé, ne s’était pas manifesté au nom de son « ami » Gates et n’avait pas qualifié la police de « stupide ».
ref: As it happens, the charges were duly dropped, and there the case might have rested if President Obama, tired and frustrated after weeks of fighting for his healthcare bill, had not weighed in on behalf of his “friend” Gates, and called the police “stupid.”

cands: Inequalities have increased from a moderate level to second (behind the US) among the OECD's advanced countries.
inp: Les inégalités ont augmenté, passant d'un niveau modéré au deuxième rang (derrière les USA) parmi les pays avancés de l'OCDE.
ref: Inequality in Korea rose from moderate levels to second highest (behind the US) among advanced OECD countries.

cands: The conflict between Armenia and Azerbaijan is more delicate.
inp: Le conflit entre l’Arménie et l’Azerbaïdjan est plus délicat.
ref: The Armenian-Azerbaijani struggle is more precarious.

cands: These points are far from being excessive criticisms of the European Union's efforts to create a common foreign and security policy.
inp: Ces différents points sont loin d'être des critiques excessives des efforts de l'Union européenne pour créer une politique étrangère et de sécurité commune.
ref: These points are far from a blanket criticism of the EU’s efforts to create a common foreign and security policy.

cands: Many have denounced Sharon's plan as a strategy.
inp: Beaucoup ont dénoncé le plan de Sharon comme étant un stratgème.
ref: Many denounced Sharon's plan as a trick.

cands: The G20 will take a number of important steps to stabilise the global economy and financial system and address the root causes of the crisis.
inp: Plusieurs mesures importantes destinées à stabiliser l’économie et le système financier mondial, et à remédier aux causes premières de la crise, seront prises par le G20.
ref: Many of the important steps taken to stabilize the global financial system and economy, as well as to address the root causes of this crisis, will be achieved through the G-20.

cands: The Wahhabis may once again be corrupted by oil money, but the sect’s powerful judges are eagerly awaiting
inp: Alors que les Wahhabites pourraient à nouveau se laisser corrompre par l’argent du pétrole, les juges avides de pouvoir de la secte attendent avec impatience la prochaine décapitation, lapidation ou les prochains coups de fouets infligés sur la place publique de Riyad.
ref: While the Wahhabis could yet be bribed again with oil money, the sect’s power-hungry judges eagerly await the next beheading, stoning, or lashing in Riyadh’s public square.

cands: But such partnerships cannot be taken for granted on a continent where the quest for natural resources has fuelled decades of violent conflict.
inp: Mais de tels partenariats ne peuvent être pris pour acquis sur un continent où la quête des ressources naturelles a alimenté des décennies de conflits violents.
ref: But such partnerships can’t be taken for granted on a continent where the quest for natural resources has fueled decades of violent conflict.

cands: In this case, they can continue their economic catch-up, at least for the next decade or more.
inp: Dans ce cas, ils peuvent poursuivre leur rattrapage économique, au moins pendant la décennie suivante ou davantage.
ref: In that case, they can continue to catch up, at least for the next decade or more.

cands: At the World Summit on Sustainable Development in Johannesburg in 2002, America committed to protecting the global ecosystem, but little has been seen or heard from
inp: Lors du Sommet mondial sur le développement durable à Johannesburg en 2002, l'Amérique s'est engagée à protéger l'écosystème mondial, mais depuis, on n'a pas vu ou entendu grand chose à ce sujet de la part des politiciens américains.
ref: At the World Summit on Sustainable Development in Johannesburg in 2002, America committed itself to protect global ecosystems, yet little has been seen or heard from US policy makers on this issue since then.

cands: The Israeli government’s failure to act on the Palestinian people’s demands for a just and lasting peace has been a source of deep concern
inp: Des affiches apposées partout, avec le décompte des jours depuis son enlèvement. Mais c’est à ses parents que revient l’essentiel du mérite : ils ont quitté leur maison d’un petit village de Galilée pour camper pendant plus d’un an devant la résidence du Premier ministre à Jérusalem, un rappel constant pour l’opinion publique israélienne des épreuves endurées par leur fils et de la nécessité pour le gouvernement d’accepter les conditions du Hamas.
ref: Demonstrations and meetings were organized. Posters were hung everywhere to remember the number of days of his ordeal. But the Shalit family is given the most credit: they left their home in a small village in Galilee to camp out for more than a year near the prime minister’s residence in Jerusalem, reminding the Israeli public of the victim’s suffering and pushing the government to accept Hamas’s conditions.

cands: This idea of an elite seeking to soften the will of the people is not limited to the Netherlands.
inp: Cette idée d'une élite qui chercherait à amollir la volonté de la population ne se limite pas aux Pays-Bas.
ref: This notion of the elitist appeaser is not confined to the Netherlands.

cands: Expanding the tax base, improving tax administration and narrowing the value added tax gap could really change the fiscal situation in low-income countries,
inp: L’élargissement de l’assiette fiscale, l’amélioration de l’administration du fisc et le resserrement des lacunes relatives à la taxe sur la valeur ajoutée pourraient vraiment changer la situation budgétaire des pays à faible revenu, où les recettes fiscales ne comptent que pour 10 à 14 % du PIB, au lieu du 20 à 30 % du PIB dans les pays à haut revenu.
ref: Broadening the tax base, improving tax administration, and closing gaps in the value-added tax could make a significant difference in lower-income countries, where tax revenues account for only about 10-14% of GDP, compared to 20-30% of GDP in high-income countries.

cands: HAGUE – Modifying climate change is often presented as a trade-off between the economy and the environment.
inp: LA HAYE – Modérer le changement climatique est souvent présenté comme un compromis imposé entre économie et environnement.
ref: THE HAGUE – Mitigating climate change is often presented as imposing a trade-off between the economy and the environment.

cands: The November elections that brought the ruling Development and Justice Party (AKP) to power were preceded by disagreements among the then-ruling coa
inp: Les élections de novembre dernier qui ont mis au pouvoir le Parti pour le développement et la justice (AKP) furent précédées de désaccords entre les membres de la coalition alors au pouvoir au sujet de la mise en place des réformes exigées par l'EU.
ref: The elections last November that brought the Justice and Development Party (AKP) to power were preceded by a dispute between the members of the then-ruling coalition over enacting the reforms demanded by the EU.

cands: Republicans should therefore retain control of the House and regain the majority in the Senate.
inp: Les Républicains devraient donc préserver le contrôle de la Chambre et récupérer la majorité au Sénat.
ref: Republicans are expected to retain control of the House and regain a majority in the Senate.

cands: But when children are healthy, families are relieved of the burden of medical expenses, allowing them to spend more on food and education.
inp: Mais lorsque les enfants sont en bonne santé, les familles sont soulagées du fardeau des frais médicaux, leur permettant de dépenser davantage sur la nourriture et l’éducation.
ref: But when children are healthy, families are freed from the burden of costly medical care, allowing them to spend more on food and education.

cands: In fact, many observers believe that the absence of a common tax system is the main problem in the euro area.
inp: En fait, de nombreux observateurs sont d’avis que l’absence d’un système fiscal commun est le problème principal de la zone euro.
ref: Indeed, many observers argue that the eurozone’s lack of a common fiscal system is its main problem.

cands: But, as always, additional resources alone cannot solve problems related to inadequate policies.
inp: Mais comme c’est toujours le cas, des ressources additionnelles ne peuvent à elles seules résoudre les problèmes liés à des politiques déficientes.
ref: As is always the case, however, resources alone cannot solve problems rooted in weak policies.

cands: It is difficult to draw a line of principle in a given field and to determine whether certain knowledge will provide relevant information about a politician’s moral character
inp: Difficile de dresser une ligne de principes dans un domaine donné et de déterminer si certaines connaissances vont fournir des informations pertinentes sur le caractère moral d’un politicien.
ref: It is hard to draw a line of principle around any area and determine if knowledge of it will provide relevant information about a politician’s moral character.

cands: Our research has focused on the benefits of more short-term-focused policies, such as the purchase of nets and the treatment of malaria with
inp: Nos recherches ont notamment porté sur les avantages de politiques plus ciblées sur le court terme, comme l’achat de moustiquaires et le traitement du paludisme par la thérapie de réhydratation orale pour les enfants des pays les plus pauvres victimes du changement climatique.
ref: Our analysis investigated, for example, the merits of more targeted policies for the near term: purchasing mosquito-resistant bed nets and oral re-hydration malaria therapy for children in the poorest nations affected by climate change.

cands: In short, we cannot rely solely on structural reforms to boost growth in 2012.
inp: En gros, nous ne pouvons compter uniquement sur les réformes structurelles pour stimuler la croissance en 2012.
ref: In short, structural reforms alone cannot be relied upon to stimulate growth in 2012.

cands: Many people rightly feel that the media are not investigating as they should.
inp: Beaucoup de gens estiment, à juste titre, que les médias n'enquêtent pas comme ils le devraient.
ref: Many citizens believe, rightly, that their mass media are failing to investigate and document abuses.

cands: For example, US support for Mexico’s anti-cartel campaign appears to be in jeopardy, with Congress saying it is ready to provide $
inp: Par exemple, le soutien que les Etats-Unis apportent à la campagne mexicaine contre les cartels paraît être gravé dans la pierre, le Congrès se disant prêt à fournir 300 millions de dollars cette année encore pour améliorer la sécurité et la présence militaire.
ref: For example, US support for Mexico’s campaign against the cartels looks set in stone, with Congress apparently ready to provide $300 million for another year of military and security upgrading.

cands: In Europe, politicians will continue to fight to restore confidence in the euro area.
inp: En Europe, les responsables politiques continueront de lutter pour restaurer la confiance dans la zone euro.
ref: In Europe, officials will continue their struggle to restore confidence in the eurozone.

cands: Does the work she was doing for the survival of her family, her children and her own deserve less indulgence?
inp: Le labeur que cette femme accomplissait pour la survie de sa famille, de ses enfants et la sienne propre mérite-t-il moins d’indulgence?
ref: Shouldn’t that cleaner’s drudgery to support her family, children, and her own survival be taken equally into account?

cands: This is no longer the case today.
inp: Ce n’est plus le cas aujourd’hui.
ref: Not anymore.

cands: From this perspective, the privatizations of the 1990s were nothing more than a scam for the powerful.
inp: De ce point de vue, les privatisations des années 90 n’étaient qu’une escroquerie au service des puissants.
ref: On this view, the privatizations of the 1990’s were a scam serving only the powers that be.

cands: The more Ukraine trades with other countries, the better it is, and if more of that trade is to be with Russia, so be it.
inp: Plus l'Ukraine commerce avec l'étranger, mieux elle se porte et si une plus grande partie de ces échanges doivent se faire avec la Russie, qu'il en soit ainsi.
ref: The more Ukraine trades abroad, the better; if more of that open trade goes Russia's way, so be it.

cands: Is the need for developing countries to significantly increase their supply of industrial products necessarily incompatible with global intolerance of trade imbalances?
inp: Est-ce que le besoin des pays en développement d’augmenter considérablement leur fourniture de produits industriels est forcément incompatible avec l’intolérance mondiale pour les déséquilibres commerciaux ?
ref: Will developing countries’ need to generate large increases in the supply of industrial products inevitably clash with the world’s intolerance of trade imbalances?

cands: Until recently, Russia's fierce opposition to this idea was a serious obstacle because it exacerbated the idea that Russia regarded its
inp: Jusqu'à récemment, l'opposition féroce de la Russie à cette idée représentait un obstacle sérieux parce qu'il exacerbait l'idée que la Russie considérait « sa proche ceinture » comme une zone spéciale d'intérêt et d'influence.
ref: Until recently, Russia's robust opposition to the idea posed a serious obstacle, because it sharpened the impression that Russia regarded its so-called "near abroad" as a zone of special interest and influence.

cands: The American Academy of Pediatrics recently stated that television can be dangerous to the brain development of young children, and advises parents to keep children under two years
inp: L’Académie Américaine des Pédiatres a récemment déclaré que la télévision peut être dangereuse pour le développement cérébral des jeunes enfants, et conseille aux parents d’écarter les enfants de moins de deux ans du petit écran et des moyens électroniques de même type.
ref: The American Academy of Pediatrics recently warned that TV viewing by young children is dangerous for their brain development, and called on parents to keep children under two away from the TV and similar media.

cands: I therefore suggest an alternative strategy that is already enshrined in American history, albeit largely unknown.
inp: Je suggère donc une stratégie alternative déjà inscrite dans l'Histoire américaine, bien que largement méconnue.
ref: I suggest an alternative strategy, one already embedded in America history, though largely unrecognized.

cands: Indeed, the North Korean threat today stems more from the regime’s internal weaknesses than from the aggressiveness of its foreign policy –
inp: En effet, la menace nord coréenne provient aujourd’hui plus des faiblesses internes du régime que de l’agressivité de sa politique extérieure – cette dernière constituant la réponse apeurée des autorités aux premières.
ref: Indeed, the North Korean threat nowadays derives more from the regime’s internal weaknesses than from its aggressive external posture – the latter being the authorities’ fearful response to the former.

cands: Such success stories provide every reason to be optimistic.
inp: De tels exemples de réussite donnent toutes les raisons d’être optimiste.
ref: Such experiences provide grounds for optimism.

cands: It is therefore impossible to deal with them separately.
inp: Il est par conséquent impossible de les traiter séparément.
ref: In this instance, it is impossible to pry them apart.

cands: The answer should be clear: it is certainly in the EU’s interest to further consolidate Turkey’s democracy and economy.
inp: La réponse ne devrait pas faire de doutes : il est certainement dans les intérêts de l’UE de consolider davantage la démocratie et l’économie turques.
ref: There should be no doubt about the answer: it is clearly in the EU’s interest to see Turkey’s democracy and economy continue to strengthen.

cands: International law is the conscience of humanity.
inp: Le droit international est la conscience de l'humanité.
ref: International law is the conscience of mankind.

cands: The following table shows the number of cases of non-compliance with the requirements of the Protocol:
ref: This can happen in a number of ways.

cands: The king, like Metternich and the Austrian kaisers, understood the Tocqueville principle that the most dangerous moment for a regime was when
inp: Le roi, à l’instar de Metternich et des kaisers autrichiens, comprend le principe de Tocqueville selon lequel le moment le plus dangereux pour un régime est celui où il entreprend des réformes.
ref: The King, like Metternich and the Austrian Kaisers, understands de Tocqueville’s dictum that the most dangerous moment for a regime is when it starts to reform.

cands: Finally, long-standing tensions in the Middle East between Israel and the US on one side and Iran on the other over nuclear proliferation could reach their pe
inp: Enfin, les tensions qui couvent depuis longtemps au Moyen-Orient entre Israël et les USA d'un coté et l'Iran de l'autre sur la question de la prolifération nucléaire pourraient atteindre leur paroxysme en 2013.
ref: Finally, long-simmering tensions in the Middle East between Israel and the US on one side and Iran on the other on the issue of nuclear proliferation could reach a boil by 2013.

cands: The Turkish Government has even launched a regional peace initiative to resolve the crisis, an effort that no current EU member would have envisaged.
inp: Le gouvernement turc a même lancé une initiative de paix régionale pour résoudre la crise, un effort qu'aucun membre actuel de l'UE n'aurait envisagé.
ref: The Turkish government even attempted a regional initiative for a peaceful solution to the crisis, an effort no current EU member could have contemplated.
